name: Dot Parsons
text: I ordered flowers for my daughter. I called and explained what flower I wanted and gave creative license to him to fill in the rest. I AM SO HAPPY with the outcome. This was my first time using them and will always use them. THANK YOU SO MUCH❤

name: Daniel Thompson
text: Just wanted to say that Gerald florist knocked it out of the park for my 24th anniversary and having the roses delivered to the Trojan Mexican grill they were fabulous and my wife loved it

name: Laura Thompson
text: My husband surprised me today at Trojan's Mexican Grill with the most stunning red long stem roses, 24 of them for our 24th wedding anniversary! Thank you so much!

name: Felicia Darby
text: Excellent flower shop to find exactly what you need in floral arrangements. If Gerald can't do it. It simply can't be done.

name: mahrie wood
text: Only florist open in Troy until 6pm. Made a small arrangement in 15 minutes with nice service.  Thanks.

name: Renee Kimbrough
text: Love, love, love this shop! It is definitely worth the short drive to get there. So many items to choose from! If your looking for a unique gift or something for your own home, you'll find it here. Prices are very reasonable too! They have some of the prettiest flower arrangements and if you don't see what you want, you can pick from their flowers and they will make it for you! Everybody is friendly and very helpful. It's rare to find a place that truly appreciates your business.

name: Andrea Cross
text: Beautiful home decor, reasonable prices, sweet and helpful employees.

name: Connie Sisk
text: I love this market! The staff is so helpful & kind! From flowers for funerals or decoration day to wonderful antique items to crafts!!

name: Ruth McBrayer Roberts
text:
So many treasures & surprises in this store!  Beautiful antiques, flea market items & silk floral arrangements for funerals/cemetery.
But the staff makes you feel right at home....& that’s a rarity these days.

name: Eyvon Hopkins
text: Love this place.

name: Blake Dempsey
text: They have gifts for every occasion and the staff is extremely nice.

name: Stephen Downs
text: A very good shopping experience.  We will be going back soon😍

name: Deborah S Epperson
text: Great hidden place. Lots to see with friendly staff.

name: Princess Creative Productions LLC
text: Thank you Flower Fantasies Florist and Gifts for the beautiful job y'all done on my sister's casket spray. Mrs. Pat Law was easy to work with and delivered the flowers to the funeral home in a timely manner.

name: Emily Holland
text: My brother and I ordered flowers for my grandmother for mother's day. They were scheduled to be delivered on the Saturday before and they were not delivered. We received an email that says they would be delivered by that next Tuesday and we would get 10% back from our purchase. So she was disappointed. THEN when she received them the card said "Happy Valentine's Day"!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We then rechecked our confirmation email to make sure we submitted the correct thing for the card to say and we did. Very disappointed in this flower shop. Used two others for my mother and other grandmothers and their's came on time and written perfectly. Would not recommend.

name: Maysen Matthews
text: Terrible experience. I order flowers for my mom for Mother’s Day and they were supposed to get there the Saturday before. They never showed up, so I called and I was told they had a lot of deliveries and they would be there the next day which was Mother’s Day. Again they don’t show up. I live in Ohio and that’s all I had sent her and she didn’t get anything. Then some lady from the shop called my mom and she was rude and said we could celebrate Mother’s Day any time. They showed up today finally and are not at all what I ordered. I paid $81.99 to get ripped off. Needless to say I will not be using this place ever again. They gave us a $10 off coupon and I can assure you it’s going in the garbage. Use some place else if you don’t want to be disappointed.

name: Josh Noname
text: I ordered a corsage and boutonniere for my senior prom and had it delivered to my school.  Upon delivery I saw that not only was the flower the wrong type, but that I hadn't received my boutinerre at all.  They charged me 35 dollars total, and cannot be reached for a refund after calling for 3 straight days.

name: A G
text: Horrible customer service and low quality flowers. I was expecting a delivery of two dozen roses on a Saturday for an important occasion. Patricia called mid-day Saturday to tell me the driver returned the flowers to the shop and they would have to re-deliver the next day??? She then went on to say the driver was new and she shouldn’t have sent him. The problem is that I was home and had been anticipating the delivery all day long. No one attempted delivery. That was a lie! This caused a major inconvenience. I explained that to Patricia; however, she was unapologetic and her tone was rude. The next day the roses arrived with open petals and many had already wilted. I’ve used many florists and this is by far the worst yet. This place is a joke and should be shutdown.

name: Kylee Alexander
text: WARNING!!!! I will NEVER use this florist again. My flowers were not delivered on the day they were supposed to, we ok'ed another delivery date, they were not delivered on that day and I never received a phone call. They were delivered the next day and were completely different than what I ordered. Communication was horrible, actually non existent (on their part), product was not what I purchased, nor was it delivered on the day it was supposed to.

name: Teneshia Nelson-Hodges
text: I placed an order through FTD for a same day delivery that was for a very special occasion. The order was contracted through Flower Fantasies and was definitely not the arrangement that I ordered through the online site. The arrangement that was received was awful...very unesthetic; not at all the flowers that were pictured in my confirmation; flowers were already wilted. I am extremely disappointed in this company’s customer service; I will make sure I do not transact business with them again in the future.

name: Amanda Odle
text: My 1st complaint was the driver tried to deliver my flowers to the wrong address. The address was clearly written on the envelope when I finally received them.  2nd complaint...I received flowers August 27, 2018  and on Friday August 31, 2018 most of the flowers were dead. The roses never opened. I called and spoke with someone on the phone that was very rude and not a bit concerned at all. She ask that I send her a picture of the flowers so I did that immediately. She has yet to respond to my text. Do not waste your money at this place! I had to rate them a 1 but actually they don't deserve that. BEWARE OF THIS PLACE!!

name: Dianna Lee
text: I have used this company for three years in a row to send my daughter, who is in college in Mobile, a snack basket each year on her birthday.  Each year I have been treated well over the phone, I had no problem placing each order, and my daughter has been delighted every year!

name: Vicki Durst
text: Don't waste your time or money. Patricia Law the owner is extremely rude and unprofessional. This behavior does not stop with her customers. She treats anyone she comes in to contact with in the same manner. She will deliver floral arrangements late, pitiful wilting flowers. Best advice go somewhere else. There are plenty of other honest hard working florist in the area who actually care about their customers. No need to waste your energy and efforts on the trash ones.

name: Karen Mc McMahon
text: I'm sad to see this place has such bad reviews because my experience with them has been amazing. A lovely lady named Patrishia took my order on a SUNDAY over the phone. She was very helpful and patient as I undecided to what to order. I told her my budget and she walked me through everything. The flowers were gorgeous and she even sent me a picture them. I recomend them highly. Thank you again Pat.

name: Eric Hawsey
text: Ordered flowers for my wife for our 2 year anniversary and I selected the florist design and it came out beautiful, it was delivered in time and the delivery lady was very kind and sweet picture was uploaded in the pictures section.

name: gamer nuk
text: My partner ordered a same day bouquet online and this place was chosen to prepare and deliver the arrangement on Tuesday. My girlfriend later received a email stating that the flowers had been delivered. When she reached out to the company the flowers were ordered from they stated that Flower Fantasy stated that they attempted twice to deliver the flowers and that they will try again but this time leave them on the porch. Mind you I was home all day yesterday and today but no-one has knocked on my door, let alone entered my yard. I have a dog who's better than any alarm system and he would have alerted me if so. My address was verified several times, I live on the main street, not a hidden back road. The arrangement was supposed to be a pick me up suprise because Im having a major surgery Thursday. The suprise has become added stress because my girl is out of town and at work so to set her at ease Im calling around trying to locate the arrangement.  Flower Fantasies this is unacceptable.  You have been provided with my number and still I have not heard anything back from you guys. I've even attempted to call only to be directed to  voicemail. I honestly don't even want the flowers now after reading such bad reviews but my Sweets took the time to order them so I will remain thankful for her.

name: Kristin DuPerron
text: We placed a order before noon on Tuesday. We wanted them to be delivered that day, guess what I find out today that they had never been delivered. There customer service is awful, not sure how you run a business this way!W

name: Jody Paar
text: Picture this a mother who is about to give birth and she is so excited! Now picture this that baby is a  still born. Did your heart just break? Ours did in so many ways! I would NEVER do a bad review because I also am a business owner. Rules change when a business just flat out doesn't care and I believe it is time to take action. As a business owner in the fashion world I deal with brides a lot. If my staff makes a mistake and sends out a bride the wrong shoes, I personally will take action to fix it. A wedding is a very crucial time for a woman and if that means I have to come out of my pocket to next day those shoes, I will! if that means I have to go out in the hot warehouse and pull those shoes, I will! I will move heaven and earth so I make sure that bride has a special day! The reason is that day is planned and can't be moved.  Now, you are in the flower business! A mother has a still born baby! A whole family is crushed! You would think that a business owner would also move heaven and earth when a mistake is made. This is another crucial day that can't be changed! This business acted like it was NO BIG DEAL that this banner wasn't made in time for this baby's funeral. It was also said that they couldn't deliver the banner to the funeral side. ARE YOU KIDDING ME??? As a business owner I would of driven it out there myself! I would of been so sincere on the phone, and made the banner myself! I would of called other customers and explained that their flowers may be late due to a heartbreaking situation. I would of hired on extra staff or stayed up all night to make this banner. Each time my friend called the owner was RUDE to her as if she was bothering her! I am sorry but this is so unprofessional on so many levels! To own a business is to own up to mistakes and FIX them ASAP! After many phone calls we finally got a banner and it is TACKY and UGLY and honestly I could of done better myself! Shame Shame on this business owner! If you are going to take on the responsibilities of a business you should always put customer service FIRST! So I would suggest any bride or anyone who may have a special day to think twice before putting your special day plans in this business owners hands. Maybe this owner needs to take some classes on how to run a business professionally. To learn customer service and how to treat people who are sensitive to make their day easier not harder. RIP Emmaleah Rain

name: Janice Files
text: My husband has ordered from them three times - every arrangement has been stunning and stayed beautiful for days !

name: Harley Dree
text:
This place should be closed down for Fraud!

1. They didn't send the correct flowers (Cheaper, wrong color, messy bouquet). 2. They delivered 2 days early (while recipient was out of town for the weekend) which led to my flowers sitting outside in the heat for 2 full days wilting horribly. 3. They did not include the balloons that were paid for. 4. The Happy Birthday Message was scribbled on a "Get Well Soon" card (The original order was placed online). 5. When I called to figure out what had happened I had to call THREE Days in a Row before Pat the Owner could figure out a story to tell me it wasn't their fault.

This was an awful experience all the way around. Don't give these lying thieves your hard earned money.

name: Katrina Smith
text: Beautiful flowers! And great customer service!

name: SHEILA FERGUSON
text: If I could give less than 1 star I would! Very unprofessional !! Banner for funeral arrangement never arrived and when we received it, it looked like a 1st grader made it

name: Porshe Austin
text: I called up there for a number to place next to them this ghetto Azz lady answer the phone with her disrespectful Azz got the audacity to tell me she can't help be bihhh its right next to the building I hate my dumb black uneducated women. Its a bad place and they have horrible service its fit right where it needed to be fit straight ghetto and trash... I DO NOT RECOMMEND😠😤😠😤😠😤😠😤

name: Ilona Littrell
text: Flowers not delivered until day after birthday 😔

name: Katrina Smith
text: Beautiful flowers! And great customer service!

name: Frankie Telarico
text: Extremely rude. Don't waste your time here.

name: Keith Bullard
text: Nice place

resp.text: Keith, thank you for leaving such a great review.  We certainly appreciate being your florist of choice and look forward to serving again in the future.

name: Jessica Bates
text: UNPROFESSIONAL

name: Tina Collier
text: Very helpful and friendly.

name: Cathy West
text: Whether you know what you want or if you need ideas Don’s Flower Shop is the best.

name: December Sixx
text: They were super nice and easy to talk to in my mourning the passing of my mom.  I got a beautiful spray for her casket!  All of her favorite colors are in it!  They got a new customer for life!

name: Ann Williams
text: Friendly, ,helpful and courteous!! Best experience ever!! Highly recommended!

name: Michelle Hicks
text: Amazing selection.  Fantastic prices.  Go see them... they are AWESOME!

name: Susan Mays
text: Beautiful arrangements, friendly service. Something for everyone!

name: Suzanne Melton
text: Called and got delivery of a beautiful Christmas arrangement on the same day. Another local place wanted to charge twice as much and was rude.  Would definitely recommend Don's.

name: Jason Husvar
text: Great place to get great flowers!

name: Bonnie Shoultz
text:
I have not had the pleasure to shop at Lush personally. However, after watching Tim’s videos and his heartfelt love and concern for not only his business, but, other small businesses during this time of uncertainty, I would just love to hug him and pledge my business to Lush!
Tim, your heart is absolutely precious and your Mother would be so proud ❣️

resp.text: OMG... you brought tears to my eyes...  it's been such a hard 12 months for so many...  your kindness to take the time to send this is very much appreciated.   Tim

name: Caryn Janecky
text: Highly recommend their class! So fun!

name: Kathleen Kerns
text: I am not local and needed two plant arrangements delivered to two different locations after the loss of a loved one.  I called, and Susan was so helpful - she shared with me in clear detail what my available options were.  Ultimately, I entrusted her with the selection and design.  The recipients sent pictures of the delivered arrangements, and they were exactly what I had in mind!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your positive experience.  We are a small local business and are very grateful for you and so happy you are pleased.

name: cross nic
text: The Lilys bloomed today!!!!!!   I live 1,300 miles away and they helped get an arrangement to my mom. It was beautiful and spectacular and made her smile like she deserves, especially on Mother's Day. THANK YOU

name: Carolyn Davis
text: Gorgeous flower arrangements and the best place to stop for one of a kind gifts.  The candles smell delicious.

name: Sonya Bumpers
text:
All of my floral designs, aromatic candles and delivery experiences with Lush Home and Garden Event Center have been nothing but exceptional.
I live in Birmingham and have placed orders over the phone including my payments and the experience was without fault.
Tim Burt, and his amazing staff have gone above and beyond in surprising my Aunts,  Uncles, Girlfriends and Father.
Thanks, for phenomenal customer service and all the love that is put into each order and delivery.
My Aunt still smiles about the day of her delivery arrived, the  arrangements was beautiful of course, however she seemed more delighted in the handsome youngman in his apron bring the delivery, this made her day.
When your business is so designed to bring joy and delight to others, it is indeed a pleasure when that if filled to the utmost and the purchaser feels good also.
To the Lush Management and Staff.
I Wish You Enough!

Sonya Bumpers

resp.text: Wow!   Thank you Sonya... your support over the years means more than you will ever know and taking the time to review us means a lot..

name: Brock Killingsworth
text: Lush is the best. Always friendly, always great flowers, always fantastic gift ideas.

name: Alexandrea West
text: Lush is my favorite place to shop for everything from candles, to home lighting, to thoughtful and unique gifts. The service is always above and beyond the norm. I appreciate their creative input and always trust that anything I go to them for will be above and beyond my expectations.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us!!  So pleased that you are happy with your experience and we look forward to working with you in the future... we also admire your fabulous work...  Thanks again...

name: Bobbi Sue Thomas
text: Lush is such a breathe of fresh air in Midtown Mobile. The owner, Tim, is so personable and always so kind. I can always find the perfect gift for any occasion and they always go the extra mile to wrap it beautifully. Cannot say enough good things about this store. It is wonderful!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for saying these wonderful things...    As a locally owned business we couldn't make it without the support of our regular customers.  We try hard to go the extra mile with fresh flowers on our gift wrap and walking folks to their car... because we actually love what we do!  So grateful you took the time to rate us!

name: Henry Hudson
text: Thank you so much for arranging a last minute beautiful bouquet and delivering it so quickly with just a phone call!! My best friend loves it and it made her smile when her birthday wasn’t going so great.

name: Sarah Baxter
text: Thank you LUSH!! I had a horrible experience from ordering flowers from FTD.com. I purchased $100 bouquet for my cousin, and they sent a dreadful arrangement (that looked like it came from Walmart). I immediately called LUSH to see if they could send the flowers my cousin deserved. I am still in awe of the arrangement Tim and his team created. I will never make the mistake of using anyone other than LUSH again.

resp.text: Sarah... Thank you so much for taking the time to review us.  We are so grateful we were able to please you and look forward to working with you again...

name: Susan Cook
text: Incredible work with an amazing staff!! Perfectly located in downtown Mobile but flexible with punctual deliveries. 10/10 would recommend!

name: Luke Boothe
text:
I’ve been to Lush numerous times for flowers and gifts and have never had anything that wasn't
nothing but beautiful. Their arrangements are the best in Mobile. The staff is super friendly.
KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK LUSH!!!

resp.text: Thank you Luke for such a great review!

name: Ashley Gunter
text: Absolutely one of the most elegant and beautiful shops in Mobile,Al.

resp.text: What a wonderful thing to say.  We will continue to try and live up to your praise!!   Thank you for taking the time to review us!!

name: Jillian Rosandich
text: LUSH is a beautifully curated space and such a joy to browse (I could spend hours!), especially thanks to the luxe scented candles and floral arrangements. Tim, the owner, is so kind and really knows his stuff. This is a true midtown destination and a must-stop shop for anyone that loves home decor.

resp.text: Oh My Goodness!  Thank you so much for taking the time to express this .  It means so much to me and my team.  As a local business we work hard to be a place everyone enjoys shopping. We want to be known as the "where did you get that?" store.   Again your kind words are much appreciated... Tim

name: Courtney Mcdonald
text: I love this place sooo much!! It’s the perfect place for gifts, or home decor! And the customer service is over the top!! I came in the Friday before Christmas for a last minute gift, and everyone so nice, especially for it to have been as busy as it was! I felt like just hanging out for a while and chatting because everyone was just so friendly!! The gift set I purchased was already wrapped really cute but they took the extra time to “spruce” up the bag even more! It’s the little things like that, that make shopping experiences so much better than other places. This is now my go-to spot for gifts and such!! Thanks Lush!! I have been sure to tell everyone about this little hidden gem!

resp.text: Wow!! Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review.  I have a great staff and we love what we do.  This review will make everyone’s day!!

name: Jennifer Pool
text: What a wonderful experience! Excellent customer service, amazing flower arrangements and a beautiful store full of wonderful gifts!! I cannot say enough about Lush - Tim and Jonathan were just the best! Lush is a jewel - you must visit!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us and we are so grateful for your kind words...  Next time you are in we want to treat you to one of our Coastal Candles   on us!!!  Thanks again.... Tim

name: Boyd McGehee
text: This store is a gem for the state of Alabama! One of a kind.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review .  And such an amazing compliment...because i know you are well traveled and to give us such high praise we are very grateful..

name: sara lee
text: Amazing and different looking arrangements.  Beautiful selection of houseware lighting and furniture too.  I sent their Mardi Gras candle off to my adult kids to remind them of home.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: Hiram Young
text: I went to a boarding school in the area and Lush is my go to place for corsages for school dances. The ones I got always looked MILES better than those of the same price from other local florists, and the people working the desk and making the corsages will talk to you and look at pictures of your dates dress and your tux and discuss your color and design options.

resp.text: Thank you. So happy you were pleased!

name: Laila Boucher
text: The BEST service and store in Mobile! I just love my treasures from this store!

resp.text: THANK YOU SO MUCH!!  So nice of you to take the time to review us!

name: Geaux LSU
text: Gorgeous place with very nice pretty things! But the customer service was not great! Walked in was in awe of how nice the store was...A guy was on the phone he didn't try to acknowledge  my sister-in-law and I ...We stood there for 3 Min and still no "Give me a sec", "It'll be one min"! I would've understood if he would've just at least "Hi, how are you" but nothing was said! So we politely walked out! When we really wanted to purchase things!

resp.text: I saw you look through the windows... I checked our cameras and never saw you enter the store... Would love to speak with ... Thanks  Tim

name: Stephen Page
text: I will try post the picture I just took of the wilted sunflowers delivered by "Lush". Unfortunate that someone within this company decided to deliver wilted flowers to a funeral. They conveniently left the shops name and address for me to find quickly on Google.

resp.text: When the arrangement was delivered yesterday it was fresh and gorgeous. We received a call today from the funeral home that the heat had wilted them. We sent one of our designers out immediately at no cost and completely redid the arrangementNot sure what else we could have done.   Please show that pic.

name: Emma Peace
text: Owner Tim is delightful. He has beautiful items that everyone would love.

resp.text:
Thank you!   We try so hard and we appreciate your continued support!

Tim

name: Rebecca Kramer
text: I received a beautiful arrangement on my birthday this year from my daughter. I can't wait to go purchase something from Lush for her birthday.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We really appreciate your business and we  are glad u loved ur arrangement!

name: Rob Bright
text: Best store in Mobile & Tim is fantastic!!!

resp.text: Thank you Rob..  I appreciate you taking the time to review us!

name: BrotherTy Page
text: The best florist in MOBILE!

resp.text: Thank you so much for saying that.  We really make it our goal on EVERY arrangement to please the customer and put a smile on their face.  I am grateful for your taking the time to give us such a positive review..  Tim

name: Jack Pierre
text: Fantastic candles and extraordinary floral work

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: RegularGamer PlayZ
text: Very rude costumer service! Was told my son could not have a seat in there store! I felt it was a racist comment for sure!!!!

resp.text: So sorry you felt that way.  We have signs posted on most every chair to not sit...mostly meant for children...because we sell upholstery off the floor and must keep it "unused"   Please don't feel that you were singled out... trust me you were not...  we regular ask folk to please not sit unless they are actually interested in purchasing the chair they wish to sit in.

name: Mark Pringle
text: The best florist in Mobile. I've lived here 4 years now and searched and tried other florists then I find this one. This is the best.

name: Outdoors With Shawn
text: Called them for a nice bouquet of roses for my fiance's birthday and they didn't disappoint me or her. Same day delivery of a beautiful arrangement that made her day! The lady on the phone was extremely helpful in helping me order them. I suggest to order on the phone or in person. Highly recommended.

name: Horace & Erica Nix
text: I ordered a casket spray. It was beautiful and fresh. Very professional!!!

name: Nancy Linebaugh
text:
Such nice people to talk to! I was ordering roses from out of state and Jan was extremely helpful and very kind!! Gave her all the info she needed, since my daughter and husband were picking them up on Friday, June 28th. They called to remind me and they called my husband (since he was in Alabama) to remind him as well that the roses were ready! They were for his Mom's funeral.
Well, since it was pouring rain on Friday June 28th, in Alabama,  they did not have the service.
Reminded my husband to water the roses! Finally, on Tuesday 7/2/19, they had the service and the roses were still fresh and beautiful!! It would not have been the same without the beautiful red and white roses!
Thank you everyone at Leroy's Florist for being so kind and making 2 beautiful rose bouquets that lasted 4 days and still looked vibrant and fresh!
Sincerely greatful,
Nancy T. Linebaugh

name: Daniel Payton
text: Paid 230.00 for a standing arrangement for a loved ones funeral. It was very beautiful but it was tiny. I did not get my moneys worth.

name: Wynette Sullivan
text: Last minute mother's day.  The women here are so very helpful and nice. I will be using them from now on for my flower needs.

name: Timothy Johnson
text: Nice and friendly staff , great place for men wit no idea

name: Courtney Graham
text: Parents passed in short period of time of each other.  Very helpful and friendly.

name: Frances Dauster CPDT
text:
TERRIBLE What I asked for was a birthday bouquet, no vase, yellow flowers, don't care what kind of flowers, for $40.00.
What I got: a small sprig of flowers, with crushed lilies, roses with dings, the wrapping tissue wasn't even completely put together (had unraveled by the time I got in the car), loose ribbon. and they charged me $44.00.  I asked for a $40.00 item. $40.00 was my budget, not 44.
I was a Winn Dixie around the corner just minutes before and saw flowers there for under $15.00 with better quality but they didn't have something what I wanted, so I went with this florist (I'd been there before with a friend, so I felt I would get something nice).
I never gave this sorry excuse for a $40.00 bouquet to the birthday recipient, I was ashamed to! Normally florists put their stickers on bouquets etc. - there was no such on this thing, and no wonder - I'd be ashamed to pass these out to the public, too! I kept it to show my referring friend this disaster. I took pictures when I got home. My friend was shocked, and she won't be coming back, either.
Why did I pay and walk out of there with this travesty? I have no idea. I was so stunned I was speechless and then went through the paces.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best place in Mobile for all your flower needs.

name: James Wallace
text: Great florist

name: Peggy Macdonald
text: Caring

name: WK Cook
text: Ordered and arrangement for same day delivery. Never delivered. Called and was told they cancelled order. Why wouldn't you bother calling? Said they sent an email. NEVER AGAIN

name: Jason Shepard
text: Awesome staff and wonderful flower arrangements.

name: Haley Gossett
text: I used them for my wedding. I hired them 8 months before my wedding.  We had agreed on the colors of the flowers & possible substitutions the week prior to go with the theme of our wedding. When it came wedding day, our delivery was made three hours too late, the colors didn’t coordinated with what we discussed, arrangements weren’t made as discussed even with pictures that were emailed to them of what I wanted. We were missing boutonnières & my bridal arrangement ended up only being 2 flowers bigger than the bridesmaids ($120 difference ) The excuse was “it’s not our fault you got married on this weekend” word for word in a text I received from them. Very poor customer service & they will not take responsibility for their slip up.

name: Stacey Williams
text: I’m sad that I can’t post pictures of what I ordered and what I received. I was super disappointed.

name: Phillip
text: Ordered flowers to be delivered to the funeral home on a Friday. The arrangement never made it. Then I received a notification hours after the funeral on Saturday stating that the flowers had been delivered. I attempted to contact the florist by phone but could never get through.

name: Rickesha Banks
text: This company has lost all values, morals and respect for its customers. I ordered a fruit basket that looked amazing,had a variety of fruits and well priced. Upon delivery I quickly realized I had been given the incorrect fruit basket.I quickly called House of Flowers to inform them of the mishap which was quickly retired to a text message to what I assumed would be to rectify my problem .I then again explained my concerns; which then an employee of this company informed me for better lack of words the photos are misleading,and basically depends on what's in stock when orders are being crafted .You will get what's given.I am very sorry I had to experience this type of customer service during the pandemic. This matter has not been resolved and I have been trying to upload our text conversations but unavailable.

resp.text: Our website states that we are allowed to make substitutions depending on availability of product as does all other websites.  The basket online was more expensive than what you ordered therefore yes there will be a difference in what you saw versus what was received.

name: Dianne
text: The arrangement of roses with the cupcake candles were gorgeous! My mother loved them! Thank you so much!! You really did an excellent job!

resp.text: Thank you so much.  It was our pleasure.

name: Tina Anderson
text: Great people to make arrangements with. I recommend them to anyone!

name: Stephanie Smith
text: I am so very disappointed in my experience with Valentine's Day flowers from here. Ordered a small bouquet to be delivered to my daughter at her work. Well it cost me $60.00. At 3:00 on Valentine's Day, she had still not gotten her flowers. I kept calling to check but phone was off the hook. I then left my job to go check on the order. When I got there they were very rude about the fact that I was there looking for the arrangement,  which was by the way on the floor at the front door with some of the flowers broken from being walked past, I assume as much. The lady did say they were trying to deliver as fast as possible, but you DONT deliver broken flowers. I took them with me and gave them to my daughter. Needless to say that will be the last time I use this florist.

resp.text: On any major holiday a specific time of delivery cannot be guaranteed.  orders are filled according to the order they are received.

text: I love flowers its clean and nice in not expensive

name: Kali Hardy
text: I am extremely disappointed in the bouquet my mother received for Mother’s Day. I ordered a large bouquet, I specified colors and told her I didn’t want to pay over $100.00 with delivery. She had another call come in while I was on the phone with her so it felt a bit rushed, but I feel we were on the same page when I hung up. She ended up calling me a few days later to say she got the dates mixed up and she needed the delivery date from me again - mistakes happen so no harm done there. The woman I dealt with on the phone and the woman who delivered the flowers were both pleasant. However, the disappointment lies in the bouquet itself. While beautiful in design looks like a $45.00 bouquet filled with inexpensive flowers. I know for a fact, that I could pick this same thing up from Publix for under $50.00. I tried to support a local business and ended up paying $90.00 for a small bouquet of very ordinary flowers (daisies, carnations, a few roses). Unfortunately, I will have to try another local (Enterprise, AL) florist or will reluctantly use a larger online company.

name: Mark Perez
text: I went in the store kinda last minute, not expecting them to be able to help me. But the staff was very friendly. They were able to put together what I needed. I will definitely go back.

name: Brittany Childs
text: We submitted for next day delivery. The owner had to make the arraignment close to the original due to not having the flowers requested. As I wasn’t satisfied with the arrangement the owner and I talked and he apologized several times and wanted to make me happy. My sister in law just finished her last week of Chemo and he recreated the arrangement and it was perfect.. basically over perfect!! I will definitely use this company again if needed on the future. If you order online I would say specify i. Detail what you’re looking for and wanting even though you’re selecting a certain arrangement. My feedback :) thank you again for the great customer service- Brit

name: Shae Strickland
text: I ordered a deluxe bouquet to be delivered for my mother for her birthday. When it arrived it was so small in size it looks like it would have cost me $30, not the $80 I spent. Also when it got there half of the flowered were brown and half dead, while the the other half of the flowers shown in the picture online were not in the bouquet. I will not be ordering from this company again, I am so so upset!

name: Tricia Kirk
text: Thank you for working with us to create the perfect corsage and boutonnière for prom!

name: Jacqueline O
text: I called Ivywood from NJ to send a birthday arrangement (after another local florist refused to work within my small budget.) Bethany was extremely accommodating and Pete went above and beyond to create a stunning sunflower arrangement for my best friend’s 60th Birthday. She loved it and I just found a great florist in Enterprise! Thank you so much!

name: Jena Hughes
text:
Ivywood has been my go-to place for years. Pete the owner goes way above and beyond to make you the Customer happy. Each year I receive flowers on my Birthday from this shop. They are always gorgeous and brighten my day and I to the next few weeks.
The smells, color and work that goes into these arrangements are done with love. Definitely recommend Ivywood for any of your floral needs.

name: Lynn O'Meara
text: A year ago I ordered flowers for my mom's funeral, and Pete did a FANTASTIC job with the table and main arrangements. This year when my dad went to join her, Pete again went above and beyond, calling me to make sure he knew what I had in mind. Again he excelled at his craft. The arrangements were beautiful and noteworthy.  Thank you.

name: Amy Klein
text: When I walked in needing a bouquet within the next couple hours, I wasn’t sure if they’d be able to help me. I was relieved that they were more than happy to prepare a rush order for me. I didn’t know what to expect for the finished product, but it turned out beautifully. Very grateful that they were able to accommodate me and the staff are very sweet!

name: Charles uh60m
text: This place is great! They helped me pick out a perfect bouquet for my wife on our 15 year anniversary. The flowers lasted long and looked amazing!

name: Mark Caldwell
text: Rude staff, unable to deliver as promised,  not their responsibility, it's your fault, Like paying for a Thanksgiving dinner and getting the turkey the day after. So what! Go to another florist , should be less than 1 star review!

name: Allyson Anger
text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY OR TIME HERE!! This business was HOURS late delivering flowers to my home. The only reason my mother was not there when the flowers FINALLY arrived is because I asked her to stop somewhere to buy us some time. This man was rude, his staff was rude. I have never been more appalled at a business's customer service. I was asking him (before he went off on a tantrum ) why he would tell me that the flowers would be there that morning at 10:00am if they couldn't get them there until 1:20pm. WITHOUT EVEN A CALL!!  It didn't seem right that I was paying $5.00 more for a delivery to be there at a certain time, when there was no indication that they couldn't perform that. I wouldn't send my worst enemy here. The owner was just full of excuses and even cursed at me! He said it didn't even matter if they were late if my mom hadn't arrived yet. I was not out of line asking for a service that I PAID FOR to be carried out. If I could give this place negative stars, I would.

name: Winifred Margolis
text: Beautiful bouquet of white roses.

name: Angie Bailey
text: VERY dissatisfied! My grandson ordered homecoming corsage and boutonniere on Tuesday for pick up on Saturday morning.  He had to make three trips to the shop before it was finally ready! Apparently they were busy with funeral arrangements..not my problem...sounds like poor management. To make matters worse, the corsage started falling apart before they even got to the dance!

name: Melissa R. Mock
text: Ivywood Florist is the only florist my family uses. Pete Jackson and the rest of the staff there are some of the most caring, giving and compassionate people you will ever meet. Genuinely good people. Not to mention their talent is second to none when it comes to floral arrangements!

name: Kathleen Viar
text: I needed a memorial arrangement for a local Pastor of a church in honor of my late father ... Pete went above and beyond to incorporate special touches of personalization to the design. He even made sure that the delivery connection was on point ... the recipients were very pleased and it meant a lot to not only the family but the church is well. Thank you so much for making this happen and you have definitely earned my trust.

name: Carson Danley
text: Awesome is the best way to describe Pete and Ivywood Florist. I live out of state he was more then willing to help me. I will be calling Pete for all my Floral bussiness!!!! Thank you

We went back and forth a little more about it and when I asked for a refunded the Manger said don't ever call them again for service and hung up on me.

name: Catherine “Catie” Currie
text:
I ordered flowers through a delivery service and they sent an email confirming the delivery, but the recipient had not received them. I called the 3rd party's customer service line and expected to be playing phone tag with a corporate office for days.

I did not expect to get a call from Ronny personally, who did all of the follow up himself and made sure that the delivery was made on his own time and well after his normal business hours. For someone who lives in a completely different state and had no way of following up myself, knowing someone cared this much that his flowers got to their intended destination on time made me feel like I was the most special person in the world.

Every time I have business in Clanton that calls for flowers, I'm not even going to bother with a 3rd party if I can help it. Not when I know this shop is there!

I ordered them at about 3 am Central Time this morning, and my mom got them by early afternoon today, mere hours after I placed the order! And she said they are the prettiest I've ever sent. Belle Bouquet has a new loyal customer. Thank you!

name: Kelley Ray
text:
This past Valentine's Day, one of the busiest flower days of the year, I thought I had experienced a nightmare. FTD delivered the flowers to me. I opened the box and they were completely ruined. In a panic, I searched for and contacted the nearest florist, which just so happened to be Lackey's.

They told me to bring the flowers by to see what they could do and they totally restored, revived, and made my flowers look brand new. They even added something to make them look extra special. Needless to say, my Valentine's Day was a major success thanks to these ladies!

There were several other arrangements from other florists in the Birmingham area that were much more impressive.  I don't plan on being a return customer.

Professional, on time, and exactly what I asked for.
I showed them a pic that found online of what I wanted and they nailed it.
I also needed them next day and that was no problem.
They even hooked me up with a few extra roses for no extra charge just to make the bouquet full and complete.
Would definitely use again.

text: I had a fruit basket delivered.  The fruit was perfectly picked and delivered in a beautiful basket!  Thank you!

name: Amanda dutton
text: I ordered my sister birthday flowers and they were delivered a couple of hours later and were so.full and beautiful...exactly what I asked for.

name: Cynthia Pearson
text: I found the website as I was searching for a way to send my son and his family a fruit basket for Valentines Day. As it was the day before, I thought I might not be able to get it there on time. But it got there in the afternoon and it is absolutely beautiful, and full of mixed fruit.  I love it and I will remember Kimberlee's for my next delivery. By the way I live in North Carolina.

name: Brenda Breece
text: The arrangements KimberLee’s created were perfect. Very thoughtful and courteous employees. I truly appreciated Brooklyn’s helpfulness in the delivery process.

name: Janet King
text: When ordering flowers from out of state you never know. Kimberlee's Flowers never fails to deliver exceptional flowers. I ordered flowers for my in laws 67th wedding anniversary and they are simply beautiful. A wide variety of flowers and colors. This is now my go to florist.

name: Doug
text:
Kimber Lees DEFINES customer service!  I’ve used them for years!  They know me and my family and always provide the freshest and finest arrangements for any occasion and often times on very short notice (sorry ladies)!

I’d you need a LOCAL service provider that you absolutely can rely on call Kimber Lees and let them get to know you!  Believe me, you’ll be glad you did!

name: Tyler Bonts
text: Always beautiful flowers.

name: Cassie Bauer
text: I am from out of state and needed to order a wreath for a funeral. I called and received the best customer service. I explained what I wanted and I was assured they could handle it. I even received a text from the florist with a photo of the finished product. I have never received such excellent customer service from an out of state florist. Thank you so much for your kindness to me and for the excellent service I received.

name: Cara Rose
text: Kimberlee’s exceeded my expectations each time I’ve called and ordered! I live in WV and they have been so kind, and in one case, super ready to help on a special occasion bouquet on short notice. Love them and highly recommend. As long as I need flowers delivered in the Fort Rucker area, they have my business!

name: Kelly Cyr
text: Beautiful arrangements each and every time!  Extremely pleasant and caring.while placing orders. Delivers as promised!  Will not be disappoint! If I could rate you a 10 I would! Thank you so much  Kelly & Ivan

name: Amanda Underwood
text: As a fellow florist at The Honey Pot in Benton, TN, this place is so extremely helpful.  I placed an order for a dear friend who lived out of state and the staff at Kimberlee's Flowers were super nice! Definitely go check these fine folks out!

name: Justin (Carthe)
text: Would've appreciated a call letting me know they where out of stock of an item so I could exchange out for something else instead of a total cancellation after charging me. I appreciate the email, but while prompt with a 8 minute response, didn't think to check if after getting an order number and approved payment processing. When I called I was told if I ordered something else before 12 I would've been okay, given by the time I was on lunch to check my emails it was 12:09. Again would've really appreciated a call instead of an email so I could've hastily made another decision. I don't mean to review badly, but again I never got a product after it was implied it was in stock and ready for same day shipping.

name: Crystal Perry
text: Just ordered from Texas! The customer service was excellent!! I love dealing with nice helpful people! It was a joy to talk to the lady taking the order! I am sure the flowers will be just as nice as her!!!

name: Stacie Diaz
text: Gorgeous  arrangements for a very affordable  price. Fast and friendly service.

name: Glenda Richards
text: Great customer service

name: Robbin B
text: I was looking for a florist for a funeral. One of my friends, her father, had passed away. I called the funeral home asking for recommendations and they recommended Simply Southern -at first. I called and the man was so rude to me over the phone I just did not want to do business with someone who acted like I was bothering them. So I called the funeral home back and asked for another good florist and they recommended Kimberlee's and I had read where they would work with your budget. I called and spoke to a women named Judy and she was so kind, because I didn't know what I was doing or what I wanted. This was my first time buying a funeral arrangement for a friend. I gave her a budget and we came up with an arrangement that I could afford that was still lovely and classy. It meant so much to me to find a florist that was kind and considerate to their customers! Please use them if you are looking for a florist!

name: Gretchen Cordy
text: I don’t even know where to begin! I live in TN and needed something special delivered to my daughter who lives on Ft Rucker. The employees are so kind and accommodating (and funny). They went so far above and beyond that 5 stars doesn’t even come close to the rating they deserve. I can’t thank them or recommend them enough. THE BEST!!!

text: Very friendly and awesome people. Only took a few minutes and they turned out amazing. Will be back very soon.

name: John Hawron
text: Super fast service and did a great job. They took less than 3 hours from when I placed the order online to deliver it and politely answered my questions on the phone and gave me an estimated time of delivery. Very happy!

name: Tim Jones

They look real and when we go to change them out, they still look like the day we bought them. People are extremely compassionate and very friendly. Highly recommend. name: Emily Mcduffie
text: Nice

name: T Young
text: We've used Treasure Shack for floral arrangements on several occasions including: funerals, Mother's Day, birthdays, and for two different proms. They are very helpful and accommodating. You tell them what the occasion is and the types of flowers you would prefer, show them any colors they need to match or include and your price range. After that you don't have to worry about a thing but coming back to pick up flowers. They can do same-day service if you call early enough and they're not too busy. In that case, it's next day pick-up. Not sure if they deliver because we've never needed that.

name: Cheryl Martin
text: They went all out.  I realized it after I talked directly to them and not the 800 number involved with our order.  The product...plant and fruit were beautiful and tasty.  The owner was very professional and the driver nice.  I plan to use them for local arrangements.   We live on the mountain and the driver walked a block, climbed a mountain, and was still nice.  The 800 number referring them wouldn't listen for directions.   When Lackey called directly all the problems were solved.  I am glad I found them.

name: Laura Whitten
text: I called and talked to a professional,but friendly and helpful lady who asked what I wanted, gave me choices and told me she'd text me a picture before they sent the arrangement. She did and I was very pleased with the price, value and timeliness. It was a pleasure doing business with business and I will again, as I;m sure I will need a florist for UAB hosp. at some time in the future.

name: J McManus
text:
Lackey Floral Co appeared to be the only florist that was actually located in Birmingham and delivered on Sunday (I could be mistaken about them being the only florist offering Sunday delivery.. but after much searching they appeared to be the only reliable florist available and as mentioned the only ones truly located in Birmingham).

They called me to make sure that a change in the vase was ok  and stated that they actually never have had the flowers/materials for the bouquet that I had ordered (they were going to use a cheaper vase, a blue tin with white poka-dots, and put more of the money towards the flowers) and I stated that was fine with me. The flowers were delivered on Sunday ~11:45am and my friend loved them! She sent a picture of the bouquet and they were definitely not close to what I had ordered HOWEVER I think they did an amazing job tailoring the bouquet to make it an appropriate gift to a new first time mother and her newborn son! In all honesty if they had the bouquet that was sent to my friend on their website I probably would have picked it in the first place!

Overall--some people may have been upset what they ordered wasn't sent as pictured, however for me I'm thankful that they deliver on Sunday, called me to let me know what was going on (Angela was very courteous) and provided an even better product than I had expected!

Thank yal!

name: Corrina Edge
text: I ordered my mother some flowers today for her birthday and they were gorgeous! Will definitely use their services in the future!

name: Kendall Barnes
text: It's my neighborhood florist , just wish they were open on hump day..lol

name: Kimberly Battles
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral held there locally in Piedmont. I had ordered an arrangement in a basket on purpose so if one of the family wanted to take it home it would be easy to transport. What I got was in a vase, NOT a basket. And even though I ordered the Premium version, what I got was not even the number of blooms shown in the standard pic, not a single yellow rose at all. If I can figure out how to attach pics here I will. I guess that because I was from out-of-town, they though I'd never see it. Even though I placed the order online with the funeral home, I understand that the order was fulfilled by Foothills florist and I place the blame squarely on them. I have never been so very VERY disappointed and VERY embarrassed

name: Corrin Mohon
text: Although my mother in law received a beautiful flower arrangement today for a 1 year anniversary of my son's passing. There was one flower that I requested to be in the arrangement.  I received pictures today and there were no iris any where to be found. That was  her husband's favorite flower and had lots of meaning behind it.   I own a floral business of my own and I know there are times when you just cant get some items. It would have been nice if they could have told me they didn't have any. Unfortunately this is the only florist in this town.

name: Angela Cleckler
text: They ought to be ashamed of themselves. If I could give them zero stars, I would. I ordered a "premium" greenery basket to be sent to a memorial service at Thompson's funeral home. Even though they guaranteed delivery in time, they didn't get the arrangement to the service. THEN, they blamed it on the deceased's wife, stating that she requested the arrangement be sent to her home the next day instead...she did not request this. They then claimed they misunderstood the date of the deceased's service, but they sent other flowers there on the correct date. The premium greenery basket they sent was simply a green plant, not a greenery arrangement as I'd requested and they promised to deliver. And, they say they won't refund my money for the wrong arrangement sent to the wrong place on the wrong day that they tried to blame on the widow. We'll see.

text: The worker was ok... Prices are extremely high!!

text: I have called on Blossoms Florist and Gifts many times for my floral needs.  Their arrangements are always fresh and beautifully arranged.

text: I paid $50.00 for a Piece Lilly and it was pathetic looking.  I will never use them again.

resp.text: A 50.00 dollar peace Lily is our smallest peace lily.  That is what every florist gives you for this price range. Our plants arrive fresh weekly from Florida and I have never had a complaint before. I suggest you order a larger size from any florist next time if you expect better. Or ask for an upgrade to your plant order. Sorry you were not satisfied. Best wishes and God bless.

text: I had an amazing experience with The Olive Branch! I googled and came across 3 options. One of which was permanently closed...I called The Olive Branch and was overly pleased by the excellent customer service offered by store employee Marshea and store owner, Robin. They were extremely patient with me (I am super picky) and clearly wanted to make sure that I was satisfied with the final product. If I ever need an arrangement in this  part of Alabama again, they will no doubt be the ONLY place that I call.

name: Tara Dixon
text:
Placed an order for anniversary and it was suppose to be delivered today April 16, 2021. When I called the store, worker said it was in transit. Arrangement never arrived.

I expect a full refund first thing in the morning. If they couldn’t provide the service why take my money and then lie like it’s in transit.

Adding insult to injury, Cory Lewis, if that’s even his name called the recipient to say that the delivery address was outside of their delivery zone. However, no one called this morning to say that was the case, and even when I called at 4:49 pm, the woman who answered did not state this, she said the delivery was in transit.

Then to put icing on the cake, Cory Lewis called me to say they tried to deliver the order but the man didn’t expect the order, there was no man at the address all day and someone was literally sitting home waiting on the order all day. Then he tried to add yet another lie to that.

Professionalism and truthfulness is not a big ask when doing business, this placed missed big. I expect a refund and a call from management.

name: Monica Bray-Grant
text: Placed an order on Wednesday for an arrangement to be delivered on Friday for my Mother In Law's birthday. Called Thursday afternoon to see about adding some additional instructions to her delivery. The rep informed me that they are not doing deliveries to Tuskegee that weekend but will deliver to that area next weekend? What kind of business are they running here? No one had even called me to let me know that it was not going to be delivered. Shabby business!

name: Beverly Butler
text: Fabulous and quick service! Order online even if you need delivery for a birthday the next day. I was able to order and have this wonderful gift delivered even though I couldn't be there to celebrate the event. I hope your experience goes as well as mine!

name: Shay G
text: I am 32 weeks pregnant an had a craving for their chocolate covered strawberries. The cashier was extremely rude as I was ordering my 6 strawberries. It had just turned 2pm an she said it would take 20-30 minutes and as I’m looking at the smoothies she tells me we close at 3pm and i don’t have any fruit chopped for smoothies (rolls her eyes and gasps for air). I honestly didn’t appreciate her whole attitude and decided not to even purchase here.

name: Takeya Wilkins
text: I called in to place an order over the phone. My call was answered quickly and professionally. I was not sure what exactly I wanted but the representative gave me multiple options based on the information I provided of who I was sending it to. The call took less than 10 minutes to get me taken care of. I appreciated the expedient service! My mom LOVED her arrangement. The fruit was fresh and actually looked like the photo! I will be ordering again from this store!

text: Thank you NIKKI for your amazing customer service!! Very well spoken and catered to my edible arrangement needs!!

text: I must say my husband ordered several boxes from this location and each time they never failed on quality.  Excellent politeness from the clerk but when I asked for a bag she stated she didn't have any.  Great products! !!

text: Poor phone customer service and they do not deliver. Selection is also very slim. Not living up to the Edible Arrangement stores I have used in the past.

name: Pooka Jay
text: I love the Opelika location great arrangements and nice staff

name: Sarah Davis
text: If I could give this place less than one star I would. Courtney (the owner) is a consistent liar. He makes promise after promise when confronted and never delivers. If this place stays open for the next 6 months I will be SHOCKED with poor management like that.

name: Tamara Williams
text: Excellent customer service.  Beautiful arrangement. I will definitely order from this store again.

name: Kent Whitaker
text:
Horrible experience. My wife and I are not in Auburn so we chose this company to deliver an arrangement for Valentines Day for my mother-in-law in Opelika. We ordered a higher dollar item other than the lower priced special. Specifically for the reason of having more fruit and less chocolate as we were hoping for something a bit healthier because of health issues. They charged our credit card for the higher priced item we ordered but delivered the lower price special with added chocolate and it was a smaller item. In addition to the wrong item - they did not deliver it on Valentines Day. We called several times and they acted nice at first and promised to deliver the item the next day. Late in the day mom called and said it was never delivered. We called back and it was being delivered late in the day - a day late - and it was the wrong item, not the higher priced one we paid for.

We called again and one of the employees admitted they went to the wrong house on Valentines day so somebody got the higher priced item. My wife called again to at least get a refund for the overcharged amount or to have the right item delivered. We were promised the right item would be delivered. The next day, no delivery.

At this point, several days after Valentines Day my wife gave up so I started calling, was promised a refund or a deliver of the right item. There was no refund or proper delivery. I was then promised at least a call back from the owner, then another promise, another promised call back. I never heard back.

My mother in law never received the correct item and and we never got the refund. We finally tried to cancel payment with credit card and to get a refund but they disputed it - said that the item was delivered. Did not mention that it was the wrong item, and that it was late, missing Valentines Day. I'm sorry that they delivered the item, possibly twice, to the wrong house, and then the wrong item to the right address. That's three deliveries, three trips, three items. However, those mistakes are not our fault. All I know is that my mother in law never received what was ordered.

I would not recommend this company to another person.

I would probably have written a different review if the owner would have called me back as promised by the several employees.

name: C. K.
text: Fresh and on time delivery. Good customer service. I highly recommend this business.

name: Kate Dorsey
text: Placed an order well in advance enough to have delivered on mother in laws birthday, followed the ‘track your order’ the entire day of said scheduled delivery, and it finally changed to “arranging your order now” around lunchtime, and never changed again after that. I called several times, contacted via the live chat and email on website, had an automated reply sent with my “case number” saying I’d be contacted by the store. Never was. 3 days later on Monday I finally got someone on the phone and all she said was “yeah i don’t even what happened with that order haha. Do you want me to send it today?” (Never even got an apology or any type of discount offer or even an explanation) 4 days after her birthday? ummm yeah, no thanks. Never again. WAY too overpriced for quality of product and customer service

name: billy chapman
text: Fantastic work and highly pleased with my wifes mothers day gift

name: Demitri Sargent
text: What a beautiful healthy way to brighten someone's day. I had a great experience. Fruit was super fresh and the customer service was awesome!  #ediblearrangements #fruitbouquet

name: Tramon Woodson
text: When i get there my order was ready on time and since its my first time I'm pleased with the product

name: Anna Bradham
text: Took them 30 mins over the phone to take my order! They won’t make it in this town very long if they don’t get it together. Sad, because I love sending this kind of thing!

text: They did not deliver the edible arrangement that my bf ordered for me even though he paid for deliver. When he asked them about it, they said they were too busy. They never gave him a courtesy call to let him know that they were not going to be able to deliver the order. From what I have read about other peoples review,  they do not deliver anyone's arrangements so what are they so busy doing? They should just close the Auburn store down because they give Edible Arrangements a BAD name!

Stay FAR FAR away....

They said they had my order and they were behind because of traffic. And yet i did not get my order. And they charged me. Now i have to was days to get my money back. I will never use this the store in auburn alabama again. I will never recommend them to anyone.

Worst experience. Don’t open when they should- those hours on the website mean nothing!!

text: I know there are a couple of good florists in town, but Sherry is my favorite.  She had always gone the extra mile for me.  I've worked in a school for the last ten years and seen many arrangements come in on Valentine's Day.  I can tell which flowers come from her, because the quality sets her apart.

name: tj bailey
text:
I ordered flowers on the website, payed with my credit card, then got a call from the shop saying they  needed more money to fill the order. I told them I was not paying anymore money to just cancel the order. The employee told me that they could not and that I would have to cancel the order myself. The website has nowhere to cancel the order on it and the only phone number on the website was the shop.

Very poor customer service.

text: I have used the Jolly Green Thumb several times to send flowers locally and ALWAYS get a phone call about how beautiful the arrangement is!  They have good prices and wonderful service.

name: Joy Suttles
text: Simpson's Florist just decorated for my daughter's wedding 0ct 17 and I must say they really outdid themselves. The flowers were fresh and perfect in every way. With a few guidelines from my daughter, Kristen and her team made the wedding reception perfect. Also, they were very easy to work with.

name: Margaret Keith
text: Just ordered a plant online for my sister. Website advertises FREE delivery for local online orders. They charged me $8 for delivery. I called and they said it must be "out of range." Mapquest shows distance to my sisters house is 2.8 miles and 7 minutes. She does live in the Decatur. So their range must be so limited it is worthless. I feel this is deceptive business practices.  Please consider printing the fine print rules on your website.

name: Crystal Littlejohn
text:
Simpson did a wonderful job and went out of their way to deliver for a special occasion!
So appreciative of their kindness and beautiful flowers!

name: Lynn Clemons
text: After seeing the arrangement I paid almost $100 for, I was embarrassed.  I feel that the arrangement was more in the $30 or $40 range.  Do not know if the flower broker is over charging or this florist.

resp.text: Hi Ms. Clemons, I am so sorry you were not happy with the arrangement we sent out from you.  I have looked through my records and I can't find the order that you are upset about.  Can you please give me a call so we can hopefully regain your trust in sending with Simpson's?

name: Jennifer Warren
text: Simpson's Florist responded very promptly to my request for flowers on short notice for a memorial service and they did a beautiful job with the arrangement. They were very friendly and customer focused. I would definitely use them again in the future.

name: Shane Keenum
text: Great local shop. I’ve been using them for years and my wife is always very happy with their results!

name: Dustin Gibbs
text: Good customer service good people

name: Michelle Odom
text: Absolutely LOVE Simpson’s Florist !  I had used them for my grandparents anniversary party and they surpassed all expectations.  The flowers, the greenery, everything was just perfect .  I loved every minute working with them !

name: Kenny Barber
text: Order my flowers online for same day and the arrangement looked 10x better than what was shown on their site.  Very impressed with them, they have all my future business.

name: Jennifer Adcock
text: Called to order candy and a stuffed  animal for Valentine’s Day and I asked if they could deliever  after 4:30 cause no one would be home before then. The lady on the phone told me she couldn’t give a specific time but she would make sure it was later than that before they would bring it. We got home at 3:50 I went to take the trash out, and the stuff I ordered was sitting in the window sill . It was misting rain and the card and everything got wet. I will not be using them again.

name: trm0608
text:
Growing up in Decatur, Simpson’s is one of few well known florists in town. I, along with my parents and even my grandparents, have used them for a number of occasions over the years. We often used them in Student Council at DHS as well. However, I won’t be using them again going fruther.

I currently live in a different city, but I recently called Simpson’s to inquire about having flowers sent to my mother for Mother’s Day and had an encounter with a employee by the name of Anne that left me dissatisfied. While she might have appeared quite polite by her tone, she came across fairly condescending when I asked if they might be delivereing on the day of the holiday this year. I consider it extremely poor customer service to make any customer feel as if their questions are unwarranted, especially if they’re legitimate. Many florists do deliver on Mother’s Day even if they are normally closed on Sunday because it’s a popular holiday for flowers. She even infomred me they themselves did previously deliver the day of Mother’s Day, but no longer do. So it couldn’t have been that absurd of a question.

Previously, I had no particular preference for either Simpson’s or their other main competitor in town, but going forward I will be doing all of my business with their competitor. It’s not only important to sound polite when interacting with customers, but also it’s just as important to connect and be personable when engaging with customers. Evidently, now there seeems to be a disconnect with some of the employees at Simpson’s and their customers.

name: Patrick
text:
David and Kristen always take good care of me!

Thanks for all that you do!

name: Ann Bentley
text: January,  awesome selection of fresh cut flowers....unique varieties.

name: Lisa Dodson
text:
My family called to order flowers for my aunt's funeral. When my sister arrived at the viewing,
She was so embarrassed! It was just a few flowers in a vase and cost $70.00. We will NEVER use this florist again. Shame on you taking advantage of someone from out of town!

name: Dana Womack
text: Great service

name: Toshia Hanson
text: Good

text: Sandy put together a beautiful sympathy bouquet for me with little instruction from myself other than "short white roses" and "blue flower highlights". My friend loved it. It was a little more expensive than I'd hoped, but in the end worth it to get that professional touch. Thank you Kaleidoscope!

resp.text:
thank you sandy. i appreciate your business. anytime we can assist you please let us know
joey

text: Showed the guy a picture of exactly what I wanted. Instead of telling me he didn't have enough white lilies to make it he filled in the rest with a bunch of other stuff I didn't want or ask for. He offered to take it back but that's not the point. Be honest up front instead of wasting someone's time making an arrangement they didn't ask for.

text: Hands down THE best Florist in the Shoals & Florence area!  Amazing work with exceptional quality every single time!

name: Carrol Steakley
text:
I rarely order flowers and I am not happy with the whole teleflora website/florist experience. I feel that I should be able to pick out  a picture of the flowers and container that I would like to purchase, pay for it, and have it delivered. When I order an item, let's say a new chair,  I can see a photo of the  chair and know what I am paying for ,and when it arrives it should be the chair I ordered. I don't like paying for something that is NOT what I ordered. While I understand fresh flowers may need to be substituted the arrangement should resemble the photo. Flowers should be similar and the container should be exact.  A container should not be in a photo on the website if it is not " in stock". This is false advertising. Each individual florist probably doesn't have what is pictured on the Teleflora websites.
I called the florist and expressed my concern and followed up with an email with pictures of what I ordered and what was delivered.  I ordered a beautiful sturdy white wicker basket with flowers and what I got was a cheap multicolored Easter egg basket. They substituted the basket and after I complained they were willing to offer me a credit of $2.50. What a joke!  I will not use this florist in the future for any reason and will never use a site that is managed by Teleflora. My thoughts are that the Teleflora company has way too many florist and they do not know what each flower shop has in stock. So when you order from a site like this one, you NEVER KNOW WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO GET. BEWARE. I wish I could put a photo on this commentary. I paid $45.73 for something that was NOT what I ordered.  Here is the response from the florist:

Thank you for your recent order. We pride ourselves on delivering the best, most fresh and most similar arrangements that we can for our customers and we have been doing so for over 38 year in the Shoals area! I am very glad you were pleased with the flowers that we provided for you and your mother.

In response to your recent request for a 50% refund here is our answer:
The basket chosen was unavailable and a similar value was substitute per our substitution policy.
We were also instructed to call and leave on the front porch if no one was available. Which we did. Our standard policy is to call and if there is no response, and no one is home, we leave a message as to where the flowers are. Since we were instructed, by you, to leave them, they were; only after a phone call was made. Had you not told us to leave the arrangement, and weather was not good for our arrangement, we would have left a message detailing where the arrangement could be picked up.
Also, you did not order from a 3rd party person. You placed your order on our website, which is managed and updated by Teleflora. They are our wire service and website managing team. They have thousands of florists that they service and we all obviously have different items in stock. They do a generic picture, and when a picture is chosen we try to fill the order as best we can with the flowers we have on hand at that particular time. Flowers are very seasonal and have a high turnover because of spoilage. Next time, a  call directly to the florist could save you a substitution since you would know immediately what they had available at that time.

As far as using another florist, they would offer the same substitution policy as us, so I don't know that you would've been happier.

Since you were happy with the flowers provided in the arrangement and they were Pretty and Fresh I can NOT offer you a 1/2 refund of the product, being as though you were please with it. I will however refund you the "basket" charge since you were not pleased with the substitution chosen. I will be adding a refund of the Full container charge of $2.50 to your card. I hope this helps.
Thank you for your business.

text: After viewing the website I called to get a price on a product that was listed on the website and was told they do not make corsages.  I mentioned they might want to update their website if they do not make everything listed on there and the lady I spoke with was extremely rude and hung up on me.

name: Walker Mobley
text: Beautiful Flowers and Service

name: Tami Haynes
text: Beautiful flowers

name: Nena Jorden
text: If I could rate this place NO STARS I would. First, let me say if there is a slither of snow, ice or slush on the ground you will NOT get your delivery the same day even if the roads are clear. Secondly, my order of pink roses arrived  one day later after my mom's birthday with wilted and brown edges. I immediately called the vendor who contracted with these people who informed me they spoke with the owner who told them the flowers were "fresh" because they were "delivered by the owner". This was a "fresh lie" and I have pics of the roses to prove it. Don't waste your money here...go somewhere else where your money is valued and you're guaranteed to receive a "fresh" quality and timely delivery.

resp.text:
I'm very sorry you feel this way. The week of2/15---2/19 we had ice and snow with roads in the county closed.
We received your order 2/18 with a delivery date of 2/19.....Our fresh flower trucks did not run until Friday 2/19 at which time we got the pink roses off that truck for your order.
Your order was delivered on 2/19 at 2:05 pm and received by a man at the door. When the driver got back to the shop he was told the wire service had called that customer was dissatisfied with the order. The wire service asked if we could redeliver the order, but they would of been roses from the same truck and pack.
Again,  I'm sorry you feel this way but we have looked at the remaining roses and see not problem. They have all since been used.

name: Trish Blackwell
text: First of all, let me say I am not a complainer.  However, after getting shafted several times by wiring flowers with Teleflora, and getting a picture of what I ordered from this florist, my patience has reached an end.  I ordered flowers for my friend's birthday from Teleflora who chose this florist.  Upon receiving the flowers, my friend called me and told me she knew I would not have sent the quality of flowers she received.  I then asked her to send me pictures.  I was appalled.  The flowers looked like they had been dropped and shoved back in the vase.  I could have gone to the grocery store, bought a $9.99 bouquet of flowers and let my 6 year old granddaughter arrange them and they would have looked better.  The bouquet was lopsided and poorly arranged.  I complained to Teleflora who basically were not concerned and made no effort to get the problem corrected.  I then called the florist directly and asked them about it.  The lady answering the phone said she would talk to the owner and get back with me.  That was one month ago, and still no response.  I am through with Teleflora and with Ardmore Florist.  Would you pay $65.00 for this bouquet?

resp.text:
In response to your review...your order was delivered on 12/29 @2:00pm and Elesa received at the door. At that time nothing was said about the condition of the arrangement. Your arrangement included two Mylar balloons. I personally know this arrangement did not leave my shop the designers hands or the drivers hands in bad condition since I was the one that delivered.
Since the order come thru teleflora we responded back to them.
