name: Malia Gohier
text:
I ordered a Money Tree from their website, the Friday before Mother's Day. I ordered late but before their closing time. I wanted it to be delivered that Saturday, it never came. I waited, I thought that maybe they were busy and would deliver it Monday. It wasn't delivered, so I called, they took my number and said they would call back.

When they called back they said they cancelled the order. I didn't ask for it to be cancelled, I didn't want it cancelled, they gave no reason for it being cancelled.

This was the first time I had ordered from them, but my mother, the one who the Money Tree was for, had ordered cut flowers for my grandmother. She had ordered over the phone.

On the day they were to be deliver my mother called, because it was getting late and the flowers hadn't been delivered. They had the flowers to be delivered on a different day then the on my mother specified.

I will not be ordering anything from this florist again, neither by phone nor online.

name: Jennifer S
text:
UPDATED: I needed to come on here and update my review after the owner of the flower shop, Sarah, personally called me and texted me in regards to my original review.  My parents purchased a beautiful bouquet of red roses to be delivered to my office on campus after I passed my defense. In my previous review, I had been concerned about the black dots on the greenery of the bouquet and the lack of rose food provided. Sarah informed me that the black dots on the under side of the leaves are the reproductive spores of the plant. She clarified that you usually see them this time of year since this is their pollination season. I had been concerned about it being mold since I am allergic to mold and mildew and I immediately throw out anything that looks suspicious. (I have decided to leave the pictures here so that others can see that this is normal and is not mold, fungus, disease, etc.!) Sarah explained the reason that rose food is not provided is because their flowers are processed in a special solution in the shop so that the additional flower food is not needed. In addition, the roses live 5-7 days minimum. the flower solution is also in the water that is in the vase that the bouquet comes in.

I want to emphasize the customer service. I have legitimately never had a business personally take the time to read a review, find out specifically who I am, and then personally call and text me  in order to discuss my review and answer my questions. Customer service isn't dead. This is a small, local business in Tuscaloosa and I am glad they take their customer service and customer satisfaction so seriously. They value communication and are willing to go the extra mile to work with you.

text: I ordered a bouquet for my mom and I am absolutely over the moon on how they turned out. They look absolutely beautiful and my mom loved them. The ordering process was very easy and staff was very helpful over the phone. I will definitely be ordering again!!

text: Overall, the florist has a friendly customer service feel but I experienced a few problems. I was contacted a couple hours after I placed my order to tell me that they did not have certain flowers in inventory. The order form online has a place for recipient phone number but apparently they did not have it to call my daughter to make the delivery (this was for her 21st birthday). My daughter called saying she was on her way out and I had to tell her to stay home because I knew they were on their way to make the delivery. The delivery person wanted to leave the flowers, balloons, and chocolates at the leasing office of my daughter's apartment which could be locked at any time. It is simple enough to call my daughter to be buzzed in at the gate. The delivery person also had to ask my daughter for her apartment number which I placed on the delivery address. I would say the delivery process was very unprofessional! I hope they will take my review and understand that I am only hoping to use them more in the future and there is room for improvement.

name: Julie Mitchell
text:
We were recommended to Sarah in November 2018 as someone who could create our wedding arrangements.

My husband and I lived in the Middle East at the time but had clear views that we wanted a classic modern theme - meeting Sarah, she fully understood what we needed, offered a variety of options as well as suggestions.  We finally agreed on our needs.

Our event was 26th November - Sarah's fantastic arrangements enhanced our venue,  whereby all our American guests (I'm Scottish), were blown away by the modern simplistic table decor.  In addition to the this, the thistles for our gentlemen and wristlets for our ladies were astonishingly beautiful.

Working with Sarah was awesome, between Sarah and our cake provider (Sara at Mary's Cakes), we got exactly the theme and beauty we wanted.  Every guest commented on the beauty.  We can't thank you Sarah enough, truly beautiful.

Once we have my wedding pictures, we will upload some pictures to demonstrate the beauty.

name: Jack Ryan
text:
If you want the best flowers and the best service in Tuscaloosa look no further than the Tuscaloosa
Flower Shoppe. The roses I ordered for my wife for Valentines Day were delivered right on time and lasted over a week. What more can you expect?  Well, believe it or not there is more.  The people at Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe greet you with a smile and remember to thank you for your business. What's more, they support causes in the community like Arts n Autism. This year they gave Arts n Autism all the delivery fees and tips from Valentines Day and that adds up to a lot of money. Thanks Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe!

name: ken knight
text:
We have used Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe many times, the flowers are always AWESOME! People always carry on about how beautiful the flowers are. Sarah and the gang at Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe are simply THE BEST when it comes to your floral needs.I would highly advise anyone to use them.

Ken Knight, DC  CCN

name: Destiny Duncan
text: They have beautiful flowers and excellent, friendly customer service! Will definitely use again!

name: Riley O'Rear
text: Always the most friendly service and the most beautiful flowers! I would highly recommend Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe! They are wonderful!

name: Craig Worley
text: I would highly recommend Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe.  Sarah and her staff do a great job helping you find the perfect arrangement for the occasion.

name: Ryan Dowling
text: I love the awesome staff and the shoppe's beautiful creations! Highly recommend to anyone!

name: Sherry Montgomery
text: Beautiful designs and great customer service!

name: Susan Banks
text: Event and party flowers from 50 people to several hundred have been creative and beautiful. We now use Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe exclusively.

name: Tyra Hoggle
text: Flowers arrangements are always gorgeous and goodie baskets are plentiful & always yummy!  Every time I call to place an order, there is always a friendly voice on the other end.  Thank you!!!

name: Susan Ellis
text: Sarah provided very fast service, with the most beautiful flowers.  My flowers were delivered same day, and they were gorgeous!

name: Rachel Hallman
text: Just the other day I was lucky to recieve flowers from my loved one. There was no real reason why. BUT! The arrangment that was delivered was AMAZING! They were very bright and colorful, and they lasted longer than I expected. What a value and a joy to be able to enjoy them for an extended period. The delivery man was very professional too. I would recomend Tuscaloosa Flower Shoppe to all my family and friends.

name: Jennie Hughes
text: Best Flower shop in town.  We call Sarah anytime we need to send flowers.  :)  She always takes care of our flower needs.

name: Justin L. Smith
text: Sarah does an excellent job.  I highly recommend.

name: Ashley Jones
text: My first time ordering flowers from this business was last month for Mother's Day. I selected flowers online and I also selected to have them delivered for a fee that I also paid for. I live in Georgia so I have never visited this business but from the reviews it seemed like a good place. Wrong! The day when my flowers were supposed to be delivered, the delivery driver called me so that I could give her directions to the address where they were supposed to be delivered. I told her that I did not live in that state and I was unfamiliar with how to get to the address. I then asked her if she had a GPS to use and she said that she did not. That was my first concern. My second concern was that she had already called my mom to tell her that she couldn't find the address and that she was delivering flowers. So that alone just ruined the whole point of having a special delivery. She totally ruined the moment. And then on top of it all she never found the address and my dad had to meet her somewhere to pick up the delivery himself. How terrible is that?!! A few days later I called to report the experience and the associate who listened to my complaint basically told me that I should not have a concern because they have voluntary delivery drivers who take the time out of their day to help them with the deliveries and not all of them have a GPS system. (Soooo...is it my problem that you don't provide your drivers with the equipment that they need to carry out the functions of their job?) So I then asked to speak with the manager who called me back the next day and she understood my concern and therefore credited my account for $40 (even though my purchase was over $65). So for Father's Day I decided to use my credit to have my father's flowers delivered to him for this holiday. When the flowers were delivered, my mom informed me (because my dad was embarrassed to tell me) that the vase that the flowers were in was so small that the flowers would not even stand up on their own. (Again another disaster!) I then called the business and told them of the situation and I spoke with an associate named Emily. Without getting my name or number or any type of information she told me that she vividly remembered the order and that the flowers were standing up perfectly fine when they left the business. She then spoke with her manager, Sarah (who was out of town), and her manager informed her that they would gladly go back and pick up my order and refund the amount if I was not satisfied. So rather than make the situation right by correcting their faulty product, they would rather just lose my business altogether, pick up my order and refund the purchase. (Some great customer service, right?) After Emily told me my options I was still confused as to how a delivery could be made without ensuring that the flowers were standing up. That seems kind of impossible. She then said, You only ordered three roses. What do you expect?!!" (Sooo...it appears that your order has to be a certain size in order for quality to be present...👀) Very frustrated I told her, "I expect my flowers to stand up!" She then hung up on me (or so she thought). I heard her then tell another associate that I raised my voice at her so that's why she hung up on me. So basically to sum it all up, my order was a disaster and when I called the business to try to get some kind of resolution the associate decides that hanging up on a paying customer was the best solution. Giving this business a one star rating is one star too many.

name: Patricia Key
text: Extremely overpriced. Embarrassed over the size of the funeral arrangement .

name: Boopathy Sivaraman
text: DONT BUY FROM HERE!! WORST SERVICE EVER

name: Taylor Lemire
text: Flowers never were delivered

name: Michelle Crowley
text: Amazing, the Rose's were absolutely beautiful, and the chocolate covered stawberries were delicious. My son wants another box of the strawberries.... Thank you so much. My parents bought me the flowers from Alaska..

name: Anne Hallman
text: Terrible customer service!!  I ordered flowers from them online and received an e-mail confirmation.  I called them the same day to ask about the delivery, they didn't answer the phone so I left a message.  They NEVER returned my call.  The flowers didn't arrive so, I emailed and called again.  Once again, they did NOT return my phone call or respond to the email.  Terrible management.   I do NOT recommend this florist.

name: Morgan Tyson
text:
*Photos to come* Wow... WORST FLORIST I HAVE EVER SEEN!! We ordered a full white cross with white roses and we got DEAD white AND PINK carnations with ZERO roses. I mean, who was putting this arrangement together? Someone clearly with no experience and sympathy for a family losing a loved one. Pretty sure they took the arrangement from another grave and just gave it to us reused.

NEVER EVER EVER EVER trust this business!!!! They thought the Louisiana and Texas family wouldn't see, but 3 orders are now being refunded thanks to their terrible work.

How could 1-800-Flowers ever want to have any connections with them, I don't know??

name: Becky White
text: Ordered a basket for a family members funeral that was so very pretty.  I could not have been more pleased.  Her daughter said they reminded her of her Mom because they were so pretty.

name: L Robertson
text: Cyndal, the owner, went out of her way to help me when the recipient of my floral gift left town unexpectedly.  And the arrangement was just beautiful!!!  Thank you, thank you, thank you❤️

name: Adam Gooch
text: Every arrangement purchased here has been a hit ! They take great care of me when I only have a vague notion of what I want.  I trust them to provide a great arrangement at any price range.

name: Angela T.
text: I now see why you'd like to keep your garden secret. The flowers this shop uses are all dead or dying. How disgusting that a shop would have the audacity to send dead flowers AND the incorrect arrangement to a funeral. Shame on this shop.

#SeniorProm2021

While we do appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts, we hardly believe that someone who has not used our services or can not use our services warrants a one star review.

Because of Jackie and her team, we were able to attend our daughters’ wedding and be “present.”  What a gift they provided to us!  Thank you, Jackie!  Thank you Dana's Floral. name: Pat D
text:
An out of state friend has used Parker's to send me a number of arrangements recently.   I am amazed at how long these arrangements have stayed fresh even after I forgot to add water to them for a few days..  Another out of state friend ordered flowers from a website that came from different local florist(I have posted a google review on that florist, too)that barely lasted 24 hours.

EDITED by adding photo 1 week later after thinning out blossoms that withered.  Still plenty of life in the remaining blossoms.

name: Teri Moore
text: I live out of state and ordered sympathy flowers for a family member.  Problem is I gave incorrect delivery address and flowers were delivered.  When I contacted Parker's Florist and asked if someone returned an order, they said no, but assured me they would send flowers out to the correct address.  And they DID!  Thank you!  Thank you!  Thank you!  It was my mistake and I feel very foolish.  But very grateful for shops like this.  Its a busy world and we make mistakes, and they understand that.  The flowers were received and very beautiful!!!  Thank you!

name: Christopher Ragland
text: Fast, reliable service. Always friendly and cordial, also well knowledgeable. Would highly recommend.

name: J Cowan
text: I have been using Parker’s Florist in Madison for years. They always go above and beyond, and their selection is always top notch. They actually did all the flowers for our wedding and they were so beautifully done. They are very helpful, and attentive. I highly recommend Parker’s.

name: Betsy Gifford
text:
Skimpy arrangement and completely not worth the money. They took great liberty with "allowed substitutions" from FTD.

My SO sent a Valentine's arrangement on the Wednesday before the holiday through FTD.com. Two roses that were nice and far too many cheap mini carnations. When I sent pictures, I got back a photo of what the arrangement was supposed to look like and they were not even close. The "best" option was was purchased with 3 or 4 roses, daisies and a few carnations and what I received would barely qualify as their "good" tier.

name: Whitney Oroz
text: I had previously ordered fake flowers for my wedding that had been delayed by USPS. When I  was 1 week from my wedding and had lost hope on them I decided I needed to find a local florist who could prepare flowers for my wedding on super short notice. This florist was very willing to help prepare beautiful flowers for me using my color choices and style preference within the timeline I needed. The fake flowers ended up arriving just in time before I finalized my order with this florist so I was unable to go through with my order, but based on her helpfulness and what she had planned for my bouquets I believe they would have turned out beautifully. I plan to order any flowers I need for future events from this florist! Anyone willing to help out a panicked bride the week of her wedding deserves all my business haha.

name: Jemison Metals
text: Such incredible customer service!!  Definitely recommend!! I placed an order on September 8th late in the day.  I picked same day delivery and shortly after I received a call. The woman told me that the order wouldn’t go out that day but wanted to know when the baby was delivered.  I wasn’t exactly sure nor was I sure how long the mother would be in the hospital- so I was concerned about them getting the order.  The woman on the phone said “Don’t worry, I’ll call the hospital and find out and we will get it to her”.  Wow!  Later that evening we got a message from the mother - the flowers were delivered that day!!  She also loved them and said they were beautiful! :)

name: The Safe Guy BR
text: Parker's Florist did an AMAZONG job for me. My Mom was so happy with her Birthday Flowers. She was so impressed that they delivered them even in a down pour of rain. Great local company!!!!

name: Jason Lai Hipp
text: I’ve used them for years now, 4-5 orders for various single arrangement occasions. I like the new location but be aware you have to drive around back as the direct street access is exit only. The owner is always friendly and helpful in getting the arrangement you want, happy with the prices I’ve paid for what I’ve received.

name: ROBERT ECKARD
text: Parker’s did a wonderful Mothers Day arrangement for me and delivered it to my Wife.   A beautiful arrangement just as I had visualized during my discussion with them on what I thought I wanted.  Great job.

name: Michelle Mikulka
text: One of the houses I clean for had a bouquet Christmas tree from your location given as a gift. And I just wanted to say that it is the most beautiful arrangement I have ever seen!!!Such a wonderful gift! Kinda want one for myself!

name: Thomas Florio
text: Parker's Florist is my first stop for all of my floral needs in Madison! They've always made absolutely lovely arrangements, and they've even helped me out in a pinch with some last-minute orders that I placed over the phone. The last time I called, I spoke with Theresa, and even though the phone connection wasn't great (I was calling from overseas), she was pleasant and kind and helped me get exactly what I needed!

name: Nancy Yater
text: I was in a pinch and needed a beautiful colorful bouquet on the fly and they far exceeded my expectations. On top of that, it was created within 20 minutes! Please please go see these ladies!! You will not be disappointed!!

name: Reggie Warner
text: Great experience ordering flowers 2 1/2 days out from V-Day.  Very polite and helpful.

name: Roy
text: Great service and fast

resp.text: Thanks! We are always pleased with a happy customer!

name: Kimberly Gordon
text: If I could give zero stars, I would. My usual florist informed me that she was retiring and closing shop so she recommended Parker’s florist. I ordered flowers on 12/20  to be placed upon my Mother’s grave on 12/21. I live on the west coast or I would personally deliver the flowers myself. I was charged an additional $15 delivery fee. Parker’s Florist called back and asker that since it was raining and the cemetery office was closed and they weren’t sure where my mother’s marker was, could they deliver it on Monday? I did tell them the location of my mother’s maker (there is a locator kiosk at the Veteran’s Cemetery as well), but nevertheless, I told them Monday would be fine.  This morning, Tuesday, my father went to visit my mother and the flowers were not delivered. I cannot get the florist to answer their phone or return my call.  The website says they are open. I cannot even express how difficult this season is with the loss of my mother for my entire family. Since I live so far away, I am unable to visit my mother on this very holy holiday, which coincidentally is also her birthday. This was my way of gifting her a birthday and Christmas gift. I am still awaiting a reply. Buyer beware of this very unreliable and unresponsive company.

name: Heath Campbell
text: Parker florist is locally owned they do an awesome job on floral arrangements and they give back to the local community. I highly recommend them.

name: Shampoo
text: I am out of state and wanted to send my mother a beautiful arrangement for mother’s day. I needed it to contain a sunflower and the lady who took my order was so accommodating and actually included an extra sunflower with the arrangement. My mother cried tears of joy and I will definitely be giving Parker’s florist my business in the future.

name: Ashley H
text: Great quality & lasted longer then expected. Very happy with the purchase & would recommend to others.

name: JL G
text:
Parker's is my new HERO!  With faux flowers that I provided, in about ~20 minutes, Parker's created 2 lovely flower girl bouquets, just as I envisioned they should look.
Another florist caused me 3 weeks of stress just trying to get the status of my 'order',  then what they finally produced was exactly what I said I did NOT want.
For all things floral, make Parker's your 1st choice. I am confident you won't be disappointed.

name: sharon Lewis
text: I needed a table centerpiece and 4 small bouquets. I went in at 10:30 a.m. and told them I needed by 2:00 p.m.  Everything was absolutely gorgeous!  The arrangements were for my parents 70th anniversary., and my mom asked where did I get them and to “use this florist for my funeral when the time comes.” No higher praise!

name: Megan Gorman
text: A friend ordered flowers for me from FTD website. When they didn't have the vase that was shown online, they called my friend to confirm that the substitute was workable. The arrangement was delivered when she requested and the arrangement was beautiful and lasted 2 weeks. I couldn't have been more pleased with them!

name: Sean Gallagher
text: Quality flowers at a good price. Friendly staff that will help you out with any of your arrangement needs

name: James W. Ricci, Jr.
text: Great selection of flowers to choose from for any occasion.

name: Grant Anderson
text: Great, friendly service.  Have made really nice custom arrangements for me.

name: patrick mcnorton
text: Rude as hell over the  phone. Best to call the other florist in Madison Heritage florist and gifts to make a order over the phone.

name: Michael Conniff
text: Very nice people with a good location

name: Woody Westmore
text: Very good service. They were busy but handled my request as if I was the first customer of the day.

name: Karen Newman
text: I ordered a cut flower arrangement for my sister-in-law today,  They were beautiful and arrived on time.

name: Joshuah Pippin
text: I've been a customer of Parker's Florist for about 5 years now and I have never been disappointed. The flowers are always great and they are always willing to work with me to get the perfect arrangements!

name: TINA FINLEY
text:
Yesterday I ordered an arrangement and balloons to be delivered to a friends daughter who has been sick.   The arrangement online was absolutely beautiful but what she got was vaguely similar to the picture.  I know they always show the largest arrangement but I ordered the medium one which I expected would be somewhat smaller, however, it was miniscule in comparison to the online image.  One of the balloons was partially deflated.  All that for $113!

We have used this florist to send arrangements for funerals and birthdays but now that I have finally seen what is being sent I will never use them again.  So disappointed.

name: ilya Gendler
text: I live in Boston, MA every time i need send flowers to my aunt in Madison, AL and twice they had done outstanding job

name: Lexie Robinson Austin
text: My husband ordered a $70 bouquet of flowers from the FTD website, with the order carried out by Parker's Florist.  When the flowers arrived they were awful- nothing like the FTD website advertised.  The flowers were much smaller than advertised, there were broken stems, cheap filler flowers, a cheap vase, and a tacky looking ribbon (all which was totally different from the FTD website).  Honestly, it looked like the $5.99 manager's special you could pick up at a grocery store on the way home.  I wish Hubby had saved the $65 and done just that!  I'm also entering a complaint with FTD so they know that Parker's screwed up so badly.

name: Robert Wittmann
text: Superb florist! Timely and great product!

name: Kevin Turner
text: Very friendly and super helpful.

name: John Cooley
text: Wonderful service

name: Travis Travesty

name: Alecia Henninger
text: I can't say enough good things about Lil Orphan Annies!!  If you need flowers for ANY occasion you won't be sorry for choosing Angel to take care of you!!  She has taken care of the flower needs of our church for years.  She just did the flowers for our daughter's wedding and they were SO beautiful!  I highly recommend Lil Orphan Annies!!

name: Jennifer Adkins
text: Angel is so dedicated to making her brides feel understood and taken care of. Her floral work is absolutly beautiful and was exactly what I pictured my wedding  would look like.

name: Kayla Gann-Beaty
text: Absolutely loved the flowers Angel did for my wedding in October! They were beautiful.Thank you again!

name: Katelynn Nicole
text: Angel is truly a flower magician. She tells you that she is not an artist, but her work could be put in museums it’s so beautiful. She was wonderful to work with and made all my dreams come true. I hired her as my wedding coordinator and florist and I knew she would do a great job but I was not prepared for the magic she had created. You would do yourself a disservice to not pick Angel. The absolute very best.

name: Michelle Dowdy
text: Wonderful florist!  When my mother-in-law passed away, the florist noticed we had 3 peace lilies from my Father’s funeral 3 months before and offered to bring us something we could plant instead.  She delivered the most beautiful hydrangea ever!  So wonderful for her to go out of her way for us!

name: Laura Haynes
text: Angel is great at what she does! There was a specific color that I wanted in my bridal bouquet that was out of season, but she made it happen! I still, 3+ years later have friends call and ask me who did my flowers for my wedding. Love her work & her personality!

name: Sheila Kay
text: Lil Orphan Annie's is my absolute go to for any floral needs I have. I have known Angel for about 10 years and she has always gone above and beyond to not only please her customers but she never settles for anything less than what she would want for herself if she were the customer. She was the wedding planer, coordinator and flower lady for my son and his wife's wedding. She worked so hard to make our kiddos vision come to life in a way that was so magical. It was one of the most beautiful weddings I've ever witnessed. I had no idea that she had made a bouquet for me as mother of the groom. It was such a sweet gesture and one I'll never forget. If you're thinking of hiring someone for a wedding, special event or in need flowers for someone special in your life please give her a call.

name: Dana Phillips
text: Angel did an outstanding job on my daughter’s wedding flowers.  Her bouquet was the prettiest that I have ever seen.  Her prices are very reasonable as well.  She was such a joy to work with.

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Jordyn Wheeler
text: Angel did SUCH a fabulous job as our florist AND day of coordinator at our wedding. The flowers were beautiful and she is such a joy to work with. She made everything so easy for us on our big day!

name: Kenneth Tipton
text: Pretty flowers

name: Mindy Sanford
text: Phenomenal arrangements! Everything always has a personal touch and is always stunning! Very reasonable on pricing. I would definitely recommend to others and I will forever be a repeat customer!

text: The flowers were perfect and beautiful. But I ordered white chocolate covered strawberries and my mom ended up with chocolate strawberries. She doesn't eat regular chocolate.

name: Todd Moore
text: Angel is the perfect name for her! She is an angel and made my daughter and son-in-law’s wedding the enchanted vision they dreamed about! They were SO happy with everything! She went above and beyond and the level of service couldn’t beat ANYTHING you’d find anywhere! Worth EVERY penny and more. We heard so many people say it was the prettiest wedding they ever attended and they were blown away with all the little details. Angel can do it all. Maybe best of all was the blessing she was in just her assurance. She is amazing at what she does. Will never use anyone else!!!

resp.text: Todd and Tracy, it was my absolute pleasure. I enjoyed every minute of working you all. I am so glad that you guys loved EVERYTHING and we were able to give your baby girl the wedding of her dreams!

We showed her a PowerPoint of Pinterest pictures and ideas  and she completely brought it to life! We could not be more pleased! If you need someone to trust and rely on and get the job done, Angel is your girl!

resp.text: Torey,  I am so Happy that you guys loved EVERYTHING! Thank you so much for you kind words!

name: Wendy Wallace

The best sevice you could ask for.

I never received the receipt and I have called numerous times the following day with no answer and voicemail is full.  This is definitely poor business practice and will not be using them again.

text: This is the absolute worst place to purchase a floral arrangement from.  A order was sent to them on 10/6 and it was was scheduled to deliver  on 10/26.  As of today at 5:40PM I have not received it.  The manager totally  lied and tried to blame the company that sent the wire for their incompetence.  I will never do business with Austin Flowers and I have informed all my family and friends.

text: I am very disappointed in the service that Scottish Rose provided. Not only were the flowers "wild type" flowers for $65 the delivery was a day late. I will never use their florist again. I contacted the owner in regards to this situation and requested a refund considering the flowers weren't delivered and they happened to show up about 30-45 minutes later. She refused to refund the money even though the product wasn't received. Very disappointing service!

name: Aaron Graffius
text: Aug 2015 the Scottish rose closed and owners moved to Georgia. Mr Jeff of Sonshine Florist & Gifts answered taking over the phone number based in Wetumpka was very courteous, gracious & friendly to work with for a same day delivery. He was quite informative about the area, servicing the Millbrook funeral home and surrounding area. He is a blessing and I would be happy to do business with again.

name: Aaron Graffius

name: Melissa Murphy
text: I don't usually write reviews, but for several years and multiple occasions I have called C & B Florist to send my mom flowers.  They are always absolutely beautiful and last longer than other florists which I have used.  Also to mention the customer service through ordering over the phone has always been very easy and appreciated.  I am not in the state and to know that my mom always gets arrangements that are more beautiful than I even expected and to make her smile without the worry of typical "big business" problems is why I will continue to use C & B Florist.  Thank you so much for all you do!

name: zeake13
text: Very nice and very helpful. Thank you.

name: earlljuren Santillan
text: This shop is pretty and they offer the best customer service!! Flowers were beautiful also <3

name: Fran Yerkes
text: I called Kim on Saturday evening needing a floral arrangement for a viewing on Sunday and Funeral on Monday.  I did not specify what flowers to use, I just gave her a dollar amount I wanted to spend.  She sent me pictures of the arrangement which did not do it justice.  The flowers were beautiful.  My daughter was able to attend the funeral and sent me additional pictures.  The flowers were delivered in plenty of time for the viewing.  If ever I need flowers in the Birmingham area, I would not hesitate to contact Kim again.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Opal Hall
text: Kim was so pleasant to speak with. My mom ordered birthday flowers to be delivered to my job in Ensley. She placed the order from Northern KY, and told me how exceptional Kim’s customer service was, and how nice the experience was. Lovely to have such nice people close to the Five Points West business district. Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Donald Williams
text: The lady who delivered my dad's  funeral basket was very nice, but I was disappointed in the quality of the flowers. They were already wilting and by the next morning I had to remove several of the daisies and roses. And there weren't that many flowers in there to begin with, so when I removed the really wilted ones, it now looks rather pathetic.

resp.text: I am sorry for your loss of your dad but you did not get your flowers from us you bought your flowers offline   we just got the order to deliver them to you we was helping out the online service but we did not do your flowers you know you ordered them from the internet so to put this up under our business is unfair next time when ordering flowers order from your local florist that way you can guarantee your flowers we'll be fresh and delivered on time when you order offline there is no guarantee of the quality of flowers that you will receive but people try to save money and go online it is a reason why the prices are so low  online but the quality of the flowers is always not fresh we stand behind the quality of our product if there was any problem with flowers that we provided you we would have replaced them

name: Emily Bear
text: Rude

name: Kim Knight
text: I ordered Flaming Lilies.  I asked if they could add (not substitute) sunflowers. I got something much less spectacular.  When I tried to order something similar from another florist, at least they were honest enough to tell me they didn't have the burgundy lilies. We didn't even get the butterfly as pictured. Very disappointing as a gift for a dear friend who just had a death in her family.

name: Jean Smith
text: I have ordered flowers from Trojan for a few years now. I don't live in the area. But, received excellent customer service.  And, the arrangements were beautiful. I will definitely continue to order and visit when I am in Hazel Green.

name: J C

text: Love Trojan Florist they are awesome people! They ALWAYS make beautiful arrangements for me I do all my flower shopping with these wonderful people!! I give them a review of 10 + +. I highly recommend Trojan Florist

I couldn’t be more proud and thankful of the arrangement they put together. I asked for cheery, bright, and fun! And it’s as if I picked the whole thing out! Great job, beautiful & fresh flowers! we so appreciate you all making this happen same day with incredible work!

name: Angel Boldin
text: Jenilyn's Creations is amazing. I went to place an order for a sympathy arrangement and saw online they do not deliver on weekends. I called the store and was informed the arrangement would be delivered that day. Thanks so much!

My mom has said over and over again how beautiful her flowers are, “I love them.  I love them!  There’s so many, all purple and and they smell so good!  Thank you thank you!  They just brighten up the whole house, I put them by the fireplace so I see them every time I walk by, I just love them!”  😊

name: Don Ireland
text: Delivery person left the flowers on the porch in 90 degrees did not knocked or ring door bell.  Someone was home all day.  Let's do better Jenilyn.

name: Lori Mercer
text: Sorry everyone - we can't seem to get this listing updated to show our correct address.  The phone number is correct so please give us a call.  We are physically located at 57 Virginia Dale Drive, Wetumpka, AL 36092 (however this is actually in the Town of Elmore between Millbrook and Wetumpka).  We are the closest florist to the Millbrook area.

name: Hazel K
text: I paid for next day delivery flowers to be sent to my niece on her birthday. I received a confirmation that they were delivered Late Friday afternoon. I called my niece to see if they were delivered and they were NOT. I immediately called the shop several times and left voicemails. No response - the shop was closed for the weekend. Long story short, they delivered to the wrong address, despite the correct address being on file with the purchase. It was very important for me to send flowers ON her birthday and not 4 days later. It was disappointing and a hassle to figure out what happened. There was no flower upgrade, add on, or partial refund to make up for the huge mistake on their part.

resp.text: Please give us an opportunity to research and respond properly to this situation before leaving a negative review. We value every order and do everything in our power to make sure your order is delivered correct and on time. Without know the specifics of this order I can’t help you resolve the problem. I realize it is too late for her birthday but I still need to determine what happened based on how the order was placed. Please send an email to wecare@jenilynscreations.com with your full name, phone number, the recipient, and the address given so we can address this properly.

name: tls 1024
text: The arrangement was delivered with the wrong card on it. This is not the first time I’ve had an issue with this florist. Last time they offered a partial refund to remove my bad review and I complied but this time I have to give my review. I’m not happy with the arrangement and wonder since the card was wrong if I possibly received the wrong arrangement. Even if not it’s not a very nice arrangement. I could’ve cut flowers out of my garden and stuck in a vase.

resp.text: We are sincerely sorry about the card message.  It was a mistake in our office and we take full responsibility for that.  The sender was wanting to acknowledge your family with a gift of flowers and their deepest sympathy.  Again we are very sorry for your disappointment.

name: Jobelle Collie
text: My son sent me flowers for Mother’s Day last week from Jenilyn’s and my daughter sent flowers from another florist.  They were supposed to look similar, based on online pictures.  I had to lie to my son because he wanted a photo of me with the flowers.  Yikes! If flowers are dead the Monday after Mother’s Day, that’s sad.  The flowers my daughter sent (from another florist) look as good a week later as they did the day they arrived.  Since my children live out of State, they rely on online photos to decide what to send. Please don’t ruin any more holidays please.

resp.text: Please give us an opportunity to make it right before leaving a negative review. I assure you we didn’t send out flowers that were less than optimal but we will gladly replace them if contacted directly within a reasonable time. All you have to do is call us at 334-567-3325.

name: KatMaster
text: We used her when my husband unexpectedly passed away.  She handled me in my grief so consolingly and even met the odd requests of my children for flowers in the arrangement.  The green plants we wanted she was patient enough to help me locate as I knew nothing of their name and could only describe them generically.... patience at its greatest!  We had out of town family and friends place orders through her as well, and there were no complaints on any arrangement.  Definitely my go-to florist for the area for any floral needs!

name: Cynthia Wood
text:
Very disappointed in the flowers this florist did for a funeral last week.  I called to let them know I was unhappy and the lady said she would let Jenilyn know but she never returned the call.  I feel that what I ordered and paid for was not what was delivered.

Update: I received a call from one of the owners who apologized and offered me a refund which I declined. He said during the holidays they had a lot of extra help and the message was not relayed to owner/management. I am changing my rating from 1 to 3 stars. I appreciate the call back, apology and his offer to refund my money.

name: Ann Sheppard
text: They were very nice.

I luckily found and called Jenilyns Creations, it was a breath of fresh air to find someone that understood and was very helpful.
Do not hesitate make your FIRST call to Jenilyn's when doing business Montgomery AL area and save yourself aggravation.

text: Gall's Florist in Columbiana, AL did  amazing for my daughter's recent wedding. The flowers were fresh and gorgeous!  We have received so many compliments on how beautiful they were.

name: Super Human
text: I absolutely love Gail’s florist!!They’re very sweet ladies. If your looking for flower arrangements call these ladies they’ll treat you right.

name: RS Hudson
text: Called from out of state to send a plant arrangement to a funeral.  There were to be 3 couples represented on the card.  I took the time to spell the names carefully and the person, Tiffany, supposedly wrote them down.  However, when the arrangement went to the funeral home, only the first couple's names were on the card.  Additionally, the card was not the perforated kind so that one part of the card could be given to the family and one stay with the plant, like all the other arrangements' cards.  Anyway, due to where it was placed, I found myself awkwardly trying to scrawl the other couples' names on the card, so no one got their feelings hurt and everyone's condolences would be known.  I don't think I would use this florist again because, had I not attended the funeral, this mistake wouldn't have been caught.  PS - I wouldn't have written a review for this next issue by itself, but what was delivered was smaller than described over the phone.

name: Portia Watkins
text: First time I have used them and they were fantastic.  Flowers were beautiful. Would use them anytime!

name: Tim Fitzgerald
text: I called from out of town, because my fiancee lives near by and they made it happen to get her roses for Valentine's Day when nobody else said they could make it happen. So fellas, you need to give them call because Gail's will get it done

name: Laura Taylor
text: Great experience with Gail's for my wedding.  Easy to work with and the arrangements looked great.  Glad we chose to go local and use Gail's.  Pleasure working with them!

name: Tiffany Miller
text: Awesome place for gifts and beautiful flowers!

name: Linda Tidwell
text: Awesome display of hydrangeas in season

name: Sondra Key
text: I have always been very pleased with the flowers I have got here. Tony and his staff has always been wonderful and helpful. ❤️❤️❤️

name: TJ
text: Awesome place. Beautiful work and very nice owner.

name: Marsha Bates
text: Tony took such amazing care of me for my wedding flowers. He worked tirelessly to find me just what I was looking for.  You will not go wrong with Tony!!!

name: Faye Wilson
text: They always do wonderful arrangements here! I have never been disappointed with any arrangement l have ordered..also they have a great selection of gifts as well!

name: Linda Mrkkelson
text: I love Ann'S Flowers and Gifts. Very pretty arrangements.

name: Barbara Simons
text: Mr.White , Judy Seago and all are extra awesome. I appreciate them from the bottom of my heart..love,barbara ann simons

name: Katherine Smith
text: Tony make an arrangement to my specifications. I was more than satisfied.

name: Nancy Hunter
text: I have always received good service from Ann’s and happily recommend them!

name: Maggie Cunningham
text: I used 1800flowers to order an arrangement to be delivered next day for my mom's birthday(paid extra for this). My mom gets a call at 4:30pm that they can't make her arrangement because they don't have the stuff to make it.

name: Hannah Kennedy
text: Terrible customer service!!! Ordered flowers on their website Tuesday May 5th to be delivered Saturday May 9th for Mother’s Day. Received ordered number AND confirmation email after purchasing. Called Saturday afternoon to get a status of the order because they hadn’t been delivered yet. Lady that answered the phone told me that their truck doesn’t run on Saturdays. I went on to explain that their website let me chose Saturday as the delivery date and asked to speak to someone else. This lady gets on the phone only to tell me they never received my order but I received confirmation email and order number? I asked if I could come pick them up instead and she tells me they don’t have the flowers I ordered. Instead of offering me something else in return she just goes on to yell at me saying they never received my order! Continues to yell at me on the phone instead of explaining nicely that they didn’t receive my order. Sounds like she doesn’t know how to check her own website for orders! Would not recommend ordering your flowers through them!

name: Teri Watson
text: Millie can help you with your floral needs!

name: Robbie Hunter
text: Very nice women & does a great job

name: Jason Elliott
text: So impressed with Dana’s. I placed an online order at 9:30am on the day before Mother’s Day and it was delivered less than four hours later. We think it’s the most beautiful arrangement we’ve ever purchased, from anywhere! Could not be more pleased and I’d recommend Dana’s to anyone!

resp.text: Hi Jason! Appreciate your kind review and your business too. Please give us a call anytime. Happy to help!

name: Deborah Smithson
text:
Beautiful and FULL standing funeral spray. 💐
I’ve ordered several standing sprays in Tuscaloosa over the past three years and this one from Dana’s was the prettiest!
Thank you to the wonderful, helpful, and caring staff at Dana’s. PS—I’ve shopped in the cute and trendy gift shop several times and have walked away with cute gifts and home decor. 💗

resp.text: Hi Deborah! Thank you so much for your review! And do come in and see us again soon.

name: Stan Wright
text: This is the place you need to call for all your floral needs. Great service and beautiful flowers.

resp.text: Hi Stan! Thank you so much. We sure appreciate your business and your kind words. Please call on us again.

name: Alana Rogers
text: I LOVE Dana's arrangements.  They are absolutely stunning.  Each arrangement looks fresh and is long lasting.  I highly recommend her shop for all your floral needs!

resp.text: Hi Alana! Thank you so very much for your kind words. We appreciate you!

name: Sandra Earnest
text:
Dana is a very loving Godly caring person..
She has love for everyone and she has a very friendly staff as well.
Thank you Dana for all you do for our special little town...i love you and appreciate you ❤

resp.text: Hi Sandra. Thanks so.much for.your kind words and for your business throughout the years. We are always happy to serve you and thankful for your friendship.💐

name: Dillon Labella
text: Very lovely environment. The social Cafe inside is also very pleasant

resp.text: Thank you Dillon. Please visit us again.

name: Beth Sexton
text: Dana's Flowers did the casket spray for my mother's funeral. Anyone who knew my mom knew of her love of flowers. The arrangement and choice of flowers were absolutely perfect. We could not have been more pleased. I'm certain my mother would have been too.

resp.text: Awww Beth, thank you. I sure miss seeing your sweet mother. She was a jewel. We appreciate you and your family more than you know. ❤

name: Anita Bailey
text: I can message, call or text Dana's Flowers any time for any occasion. They are quick to respond and meet my request in a timely manner. I greatly appreciate their effort and help!!

resp.text: Thank you for always calling on us. We are happy to serve you anytime.😊

name: Mary Hightower
text: I love Dana's Flowers!!  She always comes through with something perfect for the occasion and usually with a nice little twist of something different.  Great customer service too from a sweet Christian lady!!

resp.text: Thank you Mary. Appreciate all the business you've done with us, and we look forward to serving you again.

name: Nanette Dunn
text: I have used Dana for years. There is a lot to choose from and if she doesn't have it, she will get it for you. I have seen her make some very beautiful and creative arrangements. I use her for all my balloon deliveries for my kids to their schools.

resp.text: Thank you Nanette! Sure appreciate your continued business. 💗

name: Robert Mallory
text: Dana's flowers is the only place I go to get fresh flowers and gifts. Her and her staff are very kind, professional and show compassion for their customers. I urge Everyone in Fayette County to support the Christian owned company.

resp.text: We sure appreciate your great review. You are appreciated. Thank you!

name: Martha H
text: I absolutely LOVE Danas Flowers, Dana, Jimmy and Susan.  They go above and beyond to make sure everything is perfect!  They make the most beautiful arrangements and always so helpful, especially when I need something from Northport!!!!

resp.text: Yay! Thank you Martha H.. We are always delighted to help you and love your visits to Fayette!

resp.text: Thank you Lisa. It's my pleasure. Appreciate you. 😊

name: Jen J
text: The arrangement was beautiful and they delivered it within a couple hours of placing the order

resp.text: Hi there! So happy we could help! Thank you for the kind review. It means a lot. 😊

resp.text: We sure are sorry about your loss. So thankful you were pleased. Appreciate you Jackie.

text: Such a cute sweet shop!

resp.text: Hi Lexy. Thanks so much. Please come back and see us again.😊

resp.text: Hi Brandi. Thank you! Sure appreciate your business and your positive review.

name: Robin Heatherly
text: Great florist, friendly folks.

resp.text: Thanks so much Robin. We appreciate you and look forward to serving you again in the future.

name: A H
text: Thank You Martha Rea’s! My mom loves the  flowers I had delivered for her birthday!!  Will definitely buy from you again!

name: Alisha Myrsa
text: Very helpful people.

name: Helena Bosch
text: I am so thrilled with the service and flowers! I ordered (online) a cake made of flowers the day before! And they were delivered as ordered and looked beautiful. Thank you so much.

name: Jude Saint
text: Timely delivery. My wife loved the roses 🌹.

name: Menita Hyde
text: I called at 4:00 in the afternoon with an urgent request for flowers to be delivered to a funeral home and the service was the next morning. The florist was so kind to work with me to get a basket out that day. She was limited in what she could offer but she took time to let me know my options and put together a lovely basket. The family was very complimentary of how beautiful the basket was. Thank you so much for going above and beyond to offer exceptional customer service.

name: Allan Dunlap
text: The go to for all your floal arrangements.

name: Lydia Nations
text: Flowers were suppose to be delivered by 12pm for my friends birthday, did not arrive till 3:40pm. I called the shop to see if the mistake was from bloomstoday.com or their shop. She said they must have missed the notice of the time. I guess the positive thing is they were honest...the flowers are pretty. :/

name: Charlotte Maise
text: Great job on the pink and white carnations delivered to my granddaughter. She loved them and said that they were the prettiest flowers she had ever seen. I was just sent a recent picture of them and they are still beautiful!

name: Erin Brager
text: I had the best experience ever. I will definitely be returning. The flowers smelled amazing and were delivered promptly. I actually wanted the flowers delivered outside of their delivery hours and the owner personally accommodated my wishes. I received Grade A customer service and I was also notified before and after she delivered them. She was a delight to do business with. I am overjoyed with my entire encounter.

name: Beth Hart
text: Martha Rea’s had been a referral for us out-of-towners so I was not worried about the quality or delivery, but both were right on target. My mother was very pleased with her birthday bouquet! Thank you.

name: varbara VLove
text: Great customer service

name: Amber Mertens
text: I use Martha Rea's often for business and always receive excellent customer service. Then, last week, I was on the recipient side of the delivery. My husband found out about Martha Rea's through an online search (not knowing that I use their services for business) and liked what he saw on their website and gave them a call. I received a beautiful arrangement in a very lovely vase at work the same day he placed the order. It was a wonderful surprise! By the way, the flowers are still beautiful a week later.

name: Shamara Ray
text: I am thrilled with the beautiful arrangement delivered to my daughter on her 25th birthday.  It could not have been more perfect.  The customer service was magnificent.  Such friendly people.

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Thank you for delivering these flowers - however, the balloon that was attached said "Happy Birthday", and I know that I ordered the "I Love You" balloon.  We are not upset, but rather, wanted to ensure you knew that attention to detail was lacking on this order.  For $73, I think that the order should at least be correct.  Thanks.

name: Marina Bowing
text: Such a nice place. Here you can find so many beautiful flowers. Each of them is decorated in a different original way. I was happy to find what I needed and bought a little more than I should, but I don't regret. They were gorgeous!

name: Anthony Raybon
text: I have purchased flowers through them numerous times now, they are always gorgeous and delivered in a timely manner.  I definitely recommend them to others!

name: Arlette Willis
text: My experience is noteworthy, the florists diligently worked to assure a timely arrival of my purchase! The floral arrangement was breathtakingly beautiful and very much appreciated. Thank you for your respectful care and attention to detail. This a florist I will call upon again!

name: Rick Hendrick
text: Thank you for going the extra mile for my delivery! You guys are the best!

name: Vicki Scott
text: This florist is so understanding and kind. She listened to my desires for my Mother's Urn and delivered the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen. She went out of her way to get the arrangement to the funeral home in Wetumpka on time and took great consideration and care to insure they would be beautiful, and they were. I wanted big and beautiful and she did more than that. You wouldn't work with a kinder person who listens and then you let her take it from there. You won't be disappointed and you won't be unhappy with wilting flowers. She a master of her craft. ~Vicki~

name: Teresa Rodden
text:
Nothing better than getting a picture and message saying how our flower arrangement put somebody else’s bouquet to shame.

Job well done!

name: Guardian Adjusters and Appraisers
text: Lovely sympathy floral basket. Thank you.

name: danielle jones
text:
Placed same day order on 8/27 for my mom's 75 birthday. The delivery man called my mom and said that he has been trying to catch up with her all day...lies! And that he could not come back to the house because it was out of his way - unprofessional behavior. My mom knew there was a delivery so she stayed home.

This morning I spoke to my mom who started that the flowers were on their way (around 9:30, 10 am) l, by 12 still no flowers...wow! I called the florist and spoke to I could care less PAM and told her to cancel my order.
Common sense would tell you to deliver flowers that you did not deliver on the previous day, butI guess they're a little slow.
Bottom line...I will never use this florist again, they've ruined my mom's special day. You disgust me...end of story!!!!

name: Uschi K
text: I highly recommend Martha Rea's Florist. This is a business that means to please and this has been the most amazing experience. When recently I had a disappointing delivery, Maria came to my house and substituted with a beautiful and healthy plant. Thank you Maria!

name: Chad White
text: These guys are fantastic.  Delivered my wife a beautiful arrangement with a little teddy bear on our anniversary very quickly.  Thanks again guys!

name: Danielle Davis
text: Terrible customer service!!!! I paid for a birthday bouquet for my mother's 50th birthday. I called to make SURE it would be delivered today. My mother was out of town of town doing mission work on her ACTUAL birthday and I am out of state and could not be there with her.  I spent all day thinking about how delighted she would be to get her surprise gift and They called me 15 minutes before they closed to tell me that they tried to take the flowers but it was too cold and they had no number for her, but they had MY number and didn't say anything until the employees were about to  walk out the door. Whoever was on the phone said they could do it TUESDAY....what in the WORLD. I am out of state and not able to be there for my mother's birthday celebration and the ONLY thing I had for her today is ruined. 1 hour before her birthday dinner she has NOTHING from me.  I am beyond upset. Thanks for ruining the birthday surprise. ....Terrible.

name: Nancy Breland
text:
I just wanted to thank your florist for the beautiful arrangement that you just made for my brother who is at Baptist South. He just got out of surgery after the flowers were delivered and was so delighted at how beautiful they were! He especially loved the lilies!
Thank you for making his sister (me) so thankful that her best wishes were sent to him,
with such beauty❣️
Sincerely,
Nancy Breland
Bainbridge, Georgia

name: Erin Dahlen
text: I have placed online orders at Martha Rea's twice now. I live in North Carolina and am having flowers delivered to my mom in a hospital in Montgomery. The flowers were delivered the same day I ordered them and were beautiful according to mom. Very pleased with the service, even for those of us out of state!

name: Kaylan Maradie
text: Spent 100 dollars, flowers looked absolutely nothing like picture. Don’t waist your money

name: Jean Fader
text: Beautiful flowers. Need to get web orders working properly.

name: Dontae Williams
text:
Placed last minute orders online. Delivered within three hours to my wife!

You guys ROCK!

Thanks for what you do.

name: Kim Lingner
text: I walked in while they were closing and they still took the time to get my order in and I greatly appreciate them in this time of need !!!!

name: Christie Tarantino
text: I ordered flowers from Martha Rea's for my sick mother and her caregiver for Valentine's day.  I received the confirmation and assumed that the order would be delivered as promised.  I found out that the delivery was not made on Friday, and thought that maybe it would be delivered on Saturday due to a backlog.  When they were not delivered on Saturday, I placed a call to the florist this morning and was told that a manager would call me back.  5 hours later, I still have not received a call.  I'm very disappointed by the lack of customer service.  At the least, I could have received some sort of notice that the flowers wouldn't not be delivered on time so that I wouldn't have the expectation that they would be.  But, to add insult to injury, they are now not addressing the problem at all.  If you want to ensure your order would be processed, I would not order from Martha Rea's.

name: Jennifer Comer
text: I was ordering from out of state and they took careful thought on my requests in the notes portion of the online ordering process.  The arrangement exceeded my expectation in quality, size, and beauty. Thank you, Martha Rea's, for your talent and consideration. I look forward to using your services in the future.

name: Clay Dudley
text: I placed an order over the phone on a Wednesday to send flowers to an office that had an employee pass away. I requested the flowers to be delivered on Thursday AM. I called the office/client and came to find out that they never received the flowers. I spoke with someone on Friday morning and they apologized for not getting them out and explained that they did not file the order, but they did charge my account. I understood that mistakes happened, but requested that the flowers be delivered promptly that morning. I found out that they were not delivered until close to 4PM that Friday... after most of the office had gone home for the weekend. Mistakes happen, but if you cannot correct them and honor your word, then you clearly do not care about your customers. Needless to say, I will not be using Martha Rea's again.

name: joan williams
text: Having been a patron while at home in Montgomery; being overseas in Doha,Qatar your online services allows me to deliver love across the oceans. Thank you MarthaRea's

name: Martha White
text: The flowers I've received from Martha Rea's have been of the highest quality.  The flowers are fresh, beautiful, and creatively arranged.

name: Simona Yelder
text: Thank you so much for all your help Ms.Maurean.I hope I'm saying  your name right. You was so helpful, I really appreciate all you did.

name: Adrian Hopkins
text:
Ordered through Teleflora same day. Arrangement was poorly put together.

Rose buds weren't matched well(some closed, some half open, some full bloom)

Leaves weren't trimmed well. Hopefully they bloom nicely

name: Brian Wren
text: HORRIBLE. Ordered 14 roses to come with spray roses and 3 balloons. What did my wife receive? 7 roses with spray roses and no balloons. Attempted to get it corrected and they were the rudest people we have ever dealt with. tried to make my wife believe i was lying about what i ordered. (i have receipts obviously) and even told my wife to be thankful she got anything on valentines day because she (the owner) had no one to give her anything for valentines day. Well if this is the way she treats customers i can only imagine how she treats people who arent supporting her business. i guess we see why she has noone. Flower situation was never corrected although she did get the balloons but not before they had my wife in tears with their rudeness.

name: Glenda Russell
text: Arrangements from Martha Rae's are ALWAYS beautiful.  If I'm sending or receiving I have never been disappointed.

name: Kathy Jackson
text: had flowers sent to my mother in montgomery and they were beautiful she loved them and the whole house was talking about these flowers for months .. great job

name: Let's talk with Jd & Me Me D
text: I've been ordering from out of state for the last 2 years and my recipient is always, always satisfied with her arrangements.. Thank youuuuuuuuuu!!!

name: Lauren Phelps
text: I order flowers from out of town and they couldn't have been more helpful!  They took the time to contact me and make the necessary arrangements for flowers going to a near by funeral home.

name: James Files
text: Thanks SO much.  Lynn loved the arrangement!

name: John Alexander
text: I've never been to the florist in person but have used them many times to send flowers to my daughter in Alabama. We have always been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Alexander we appreciate you and Mrs. Alexander tremendously!! We know how important it can be to a parent to celebrate a child's birthday and we are delighted you choose Martha Rea's for your floral needs! Thank you again and looking forward to continue the tradition!!

name: Joshua Simmons
text: Delivered on time and beautiful! My Gf absolutely adored them!

name: Daphne Johnson
text: Great customer service although I gave the wrong delivery address. Thank you very much.

name: Eric Isaacson
text: Whenever I need to impress someone I always immediately go to Jane and her talented crew. She has helped me out from dates to thank you gifts and even my moms birthday. Being an entreprenuer in the service industry I rarley run into places that meet my high standards for service, but this place met and exceeded! I highly recommend them for any of their sevices! Have used them and will continue to use them!!

name: Jenny Kim
text: It's very unkind. I will never go back.

name: Jay Villagomez
text: The corsage she did for my daughter was amazing!!! Honestly dont think i paid enough for it!!! Thank you guys so much!!

name: Josh Bryan
text: Ordered an arrangement for out of state for my mother who lives in Montgomery. The arrangement arrived as promised and was beautiful!

name: Troy Gerren
text: This is the most unprofessional florist I have ever come across. I ordered a white standing spray for a funeral. I paid  $95 for this arrangement and received 5 flowers in it. Tried to talk to the florist and they actually tried to suggest that the funeral home took the roses out that was not even advertised in the arrangement.When mentioned that the website says 100% guaranteed and was told the website does not state that. Then she had an attitude when talking to me.

resp.text:
We have gone through all of our past sales receipts for the past two weeks, and we are unable to find a receipt associated with your name. It seems that your purchase may have been done through a different service other than marthareasflorist.com.
Here at Martha Rea's we proudly support our local funeral homes and other business and we are sorry to hear that another company misinformed you about our affiliation. Best of luck getting in contact with that service to resolve this matter.

For future floral references please feel free to contact us directly, 334-262-1991 or visit our friendly website at http://www.marthareasflorist.com/ so we can handle your floral needs directly.

Best Wishes,
Martha's Rea's Floral Team

name: Robbie Amunds
text: Ordered same day delivery online at 9AM this morning. Never received it. Called the store 5 times throughout the day and left two voicemails and never got a call back. Hopefully I will get them tomorrow. Very disappointed.

name: Darius Holley
text: Always Wonderful! I will not use anyone else EVER!

name: Kim Namjoon's Sweetheart
text: Beautiful arrangements, great customer service.

name: Michael Davis
text: Awesome. Martha Rea's sure made a beautiful arrangement for my precious girlfriend. Thanks a million.

name: Trish P.
text: They were so helpful & kind. I really appreciate them!!!!

name: William Stone
text: 32 years together and the flowers made it special. great job!!!!

name: Kevin Temple
text: Very nice flowers!

name: leonard gordon
text: Great florist and outstanding service

name: Mary Lynne Wright
text: Wonderful customer service! Thanks!

name: Austin Cook
text: Terrible customer service, and a terrible attitude. I cancelled my order so I can't speak on the flowers.

name: Vermon Tate
text: Terrible customer service. Shop somewhere else.

name: jennifer wilkerson
text: Very dependable and good prices

name: Doing Whatsright
text: Horrible

name: Trisha Guy
text: I have been pleased with everything I have ordered from them. Prices are a little high but you get what you pay for.

name: Regina Cozad
text: pretty gifts

name: Deidre Mcilwain
text: Wonderful

name: Sharon Grubbs
text: My friend from out of state contacted 333 Designs/Unforgettable Flowers to send me a specific kind of flower arrangement.  She was treated with such care and consideration!!! They went out of their way to send the perfect arrangement!  I was not familiar with them but will definitely recommend and use in the future. The arrangement is breathtaking❤️

name: Edward Melendez
text: A fantastic place to plan your next event from something small like a birthday to a corporate anniversary. They can take care of everything from your venue to photographer.

resp.text:
Dear Edward,
Thank you for your review. We loved that you used our services and that you recommend us.  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, we know your time is valuable!
Wishing you the best,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Vickie Gesellschap
text: Corrie came through again!! On relatively short notice, she hit a home run for me with the delivery of 3 beautiful arrangements for a wedding shower I hosted. Her creativity in design showed through. Everyone commented on how beautiful the flowers were! Thanks, Corrie.

name: Kayla Schmaeling
text: In an absolute time crunch, and a last minute planned wedding, Corrie and 333 Designs swooped in and completely saved the day. While planning a quick, immediate family wedding in Charleston, Sc, Corrie was more than willing and happy to help anyway she could! She was able to create the most stunning bridal bouquet and boutonnière on a last minute request. She took my ideas and vision and made it even more beautiful than I had hoped! She packed everything up and hand delivered the arrangements the day we were set to leave - please note, she did this in about ZERO time and absolutely blew us away! The flower are now about a week and a half old and the bridal bouquet, set in water, is still holding strong! I can’t say enough about Corrie and 333 Designs - I highly recommend them!

name: Amy Mayfield
text: Corrie and her whole team worked to make our event look the best it's ever looked. We got rave reviews from our attendees and she went out of her way to ensure everything looked amazing!

name: Genevieve Vigil
text: Excellent customer service. We used 333 for our wedding, and my fiance and I were so busy in the weeks before the wedding we never really had time to meet with Corrie. But she was very accommodating and made time for us to call and email to get every detail arranged. Very good service. I can't wait to see her creations!

resp.text:
Dear Genevieve,
I loved designing your flowers and helping you with your wedding. It's my job to work around your busy schedule and help bring together all the details. You both were a pleasure to work with, and I loved seeing your photos!

Wishing you both the best!
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Jareen Alam
text: From day one, Corrie Spearing of 333 Designs has helped both my husband and I to plan our wedding reception in Huntsville, Alabama. She is THE master planner and we are so thankful to have her by our side the entire time. Corrie was very easy to work with; she knew exactly what we had envisioned within our first meeting. This made things much simpler and smooth on our planning end. The moment we walked into our reception hall, both of us were in complete shock of how beautiful things were. My husband and I did absolutely nothing at our wedding reception, other than to enjoy the moment and actually get the chance to mingle with our friends and family. We even got to enjoy our dinner with family, and have cake! We are so grateful for that and will forever cherish these moments! Corrie did a fantastic job, and took this event under her arms as a true professional that she is in this line of career. She was easy to work with, talented, quick to reply, queen of multitasking, and just super awesome! Thank so much for everything! If ever again in the future we need a planner, we are coming right back to you!

resp.text:
Jareen,

What a joy to be a part of your special day! Thank you for taking the time to reply and leave us a review. We know your time is valuable and it means the world to us that you were pleased and let us know!

Sincerly,
Corrie and the 333 Designs team

name: Katie Chandler
text: We recently used 333 Designs for our wedding and were extremely disappointed with our experience. In meetings they seemed to understand exactly what was wanted, given exact pictures for some decorations and told things that the bride did not want to see anywhere. The day of my wedding I walked in to one of my locations and everything was the opposite of what I asked for. We did not receive what we feel we paid for at all and believe there was some time mismanagement which led to many things not being done properly. After the wedding we were billed an additional charge even though we had paid in full what the contract had said before our wedding. We will never choose to work with or recommend 333 designs again.

resp.text:
Dear Katie,
We are saddened by your review and to hear that after all that we did we were unable to make you happy.
We do our best to manage expectations, by design boards, detailed notes, as well as written out details in the final invoices. We understood your dreams and to be fair the final weeks leading to your big day your parents, and yourself, agreed to keep things in a more reasonable budget and made some changes. We had those changes clearly noted and approved before even ordering the flowers. Everyone saw the “Pinterest” style wedding and commented on how kind we were and how we went above and beyond what we were even contracted to do. The compliments from your family and friends and the many apologies for how we were treated by you were a testimony that we handled the wedding professionally and everything was beautiful. We hope that you can look back one day and see all the love and sacrifice everyone did to help make your wedding day come together and look so breathtaking.

Wishing you all the best and a wonderful marriage,
Corrie and the 333 Team
To see images from the wedding please click here: https://333designs.com/portfolio/katie-and-reed/

name: Madeline Creekmore
text: Corrie was fantastic to work with!  I would highly recommend her to ANYONE looking for a wedding or event coordinator.  She did day-of planning for me for my wedding a few weeks ago, and I couldn't have been happier with our decision to higher her.  When I first started planning my wedding, I did not think it was worth the money to higher a coordinator.  But as plans started to get more and more complex, I quickly realized that I was in over my head.  There were so many details to attend to on the day of the wedding, and I knew that I would not be in the right frame of mind to handle them myself.  Corrie listened to all of my ideas and executed them better than I could have myself.  Everything about my wedding day ran flawlessly because of her efforts, and my family and I were much more at ease and able to relax and enjoy the day knowing that Corrie had it under control.  My only regret from my wedding planning process was that I didn't hire her sooner to help me plan the whole thing! If you are looking for a fun and professional wedding coordinator, look no further, Corrie is your gal!   Oh... and did I tell you she did my hair???  She Did My Hair!  And it was GORGEOUS!

resp.text:
Madeline,
Looking back and reading reviews like this makes me so happy! I loved helping and taking stress off of everyones plate. Thank you for leaving such a wonderful review. We strive to help and provide a service like no one else! Glad I could help you with your hair too! It means so much to know that I was able to help you out during your special day!

Blessings,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Kelsey Greene
text: Corrie and the staff at 333 Designs were awesome!! They provided the flowers for our wedding and to say they were a hit would be an understatement. They were timely, professional, and a pleasure to work with. I would definitely recommend 333 Designs to any and everyone looking for a creative and fabulous florist!

resp.text:
Thanks for these kind words! Kelsey you were a joy to work with and we are so happy you were so pleased! Thank you for letting us be a part of your special day, and it's great to hear the flowers were a hit! Wishing you all the best.

name: Wedding Chapel

text: I can not disagree more with the last post. Cory took lots of time to make sure she know what my daughter wanted for her wedding. I am so glad we were able to provide you guys with such great service and that you were so pleased! Can't wait to work with you again on any event you should need us for!

Corrie and the 333 Team

text: When my fiancée, now my wife, said she wanted to have a day-of wedding coordinator, I thought it would be a waste of money.  I COULD NOT HAVE BEEN MORE WRONG! She gave me a Groom’s timeline, and all I had to do was to be at the indicated location at the correct time.  333 coordinated with all of our vendors, set up and broke down our entire reception, and handled any issues that came up before and during our event.  I cannot stress how much you need Corrie and her team - worth every penny!!
