text: Poor communication, extremely unprofessional, and unacceptable customer service. A detailed review of my cousin's wedding contract reveals that multiple provisions were breached by 333 Designs without explanation or remorse, and she was left having to find replacement planners right before her wedding. If 0 stars were an option, it would be warranted in this case. Beware!

resp.text:
Dear TaCara,

We are so sorry your cousin was unhappy. We also value your family loyalty. We would be happy to meet with you cousin to discuss the contract further if she feels something was not completed as agreed.  We always strive to accommodate and we love to make people happy when we can!

Sincerely
333 Designs

name: CORANDA AND CHARLES WIMS
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. Corrie made the entire planning process stressful for both the bride and groom then insinuated on several occasions they were broke. It was absolutely disgusting and she was fired 2 weeks before the wedding because of her unprofessionalism.

resp.text: We want to assure you our team is happy to work with brides and grooms with any budget, Coranda, and we apologize if we gave off any other impression -- that was not our intent. It sounds like there was some definite miscommunication, and if you reach out to us privately, we'd love to answer any questions. Wishing you all the best. Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Cassie Shropshire
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. Corrie made the entire planning process stressful for both the bride and groom then insinuated on several occasions they were broke. It was absolutely disgusting and she was fired 2 weeks before the wedding because of her unprofessionalism.

resp.text:
This and the several reviews before and to follow are very sad. We have such a desire to serve and provide a service, however, we simply cannot provide services that our outside of our physical ability or contract.

This is one of the reasons we have contracts. -We provided everything in and according to contract, but the client had expectations and requirements that were far outside of our agreement, and they refused to pay more for the services they requested. Two weeks before when they still were requiring us to do more than we could, we felt it was best to walk away. We agreed to credit the couple back some of the money (even though we were not required to do so) and they could use the money how they felt they should. We also agreed that there would be no slander or malice on either side because we came to an agreement, and each party walked away content with these terms. If you would like more information in regards to this please let us know. If you are reading this know that we cannot  provide free services or labor,  and this couple was asking of us.

name: Sarah Melendez
text: Their team is amazing! They make everything so easy! We love you guys!

resp.text:
Sarah,

That's what we love to hear! We love helping making dreams come true and hope to make life so much easier!

Glad you are so pleased!!
Corrie (planner with 333 Designs)

text: I hired 333 Designs for both wedding coordinating and floral design 15 months prior to my daughter’s wedding day based upon recommendations and visits to two of her decorated venues.  During our first planning session Corrie used her computer to show both pricing options as well as flower and decoration ideas.  Her prices were favorable and she offered cost cutting suggestions.  We met many times throughout the 15 months prior to the wedding and tweeked the plans as needed.  The rehearsal was expertly directed by Corrie’s assistant Lauren giving me confidence in the ceremony.  Corrie and Lauren worked together during the ceremony and reception to ensure smooth transistions.  I was able to enjoy one of the happiest days of our lives without worry.  I highly recommend Corrie and 333 Designs.

resp.text:
We're thrilled to have been a part of one of the happiest days of your life!

Thanks for taking the time to share this with us. It was a pleasure working with you, and your daughter! Blessings on you all and their marriage!

text: Corrie Spearing and her team at 333 designs are the greatest event planners that anybody could ask for. I have worked with Corrie and her team on multiple occasions, and they were very crisp, clean, punctual and thorough with their work. They have made wedding days for many different couples the best days of their life. She has yet to as much as mess up with a wedding. My employer at Cakes By Scelle Rey, LLC recommends 333 Designs to all of her clients, and I would too. YOU ROCK CORRIE!!!!

resp.text: You rock! Thanks for sharing this -- your support is appreciated. It's always a please working with you guys, and we hope to create more beautiful events in the future! Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Brighton Pollard
text: Corrie is not only a wonderful florist but an amazing person. She's such a kind, ambitious, and driven person and truly a pleasure to work with! I would have loved for her to be my planner but she was already booked as a planner for the day so BOOK THIS VENDOR IN ADVANCE!! For my wedding, I didn't really want a lot of flowers but just a TON of greenery and Corrie nailed it with just a few springs of lavender and thistle (which was such a unique feature) and then a few peonies and ranunculus for my bouquets and cake. The arbor was so beautiful it became kind of like a photo booth backdrop where all my guests took pictures through out the night. She set up draping and lights when I decided last minute and responded to my way too many emails in a prompt manner. I'm kind of a control freak =/ She even made last minute changes to the bridesmaids floral crowns to ensure I was happy the day of. I've highly recommended Corrie and 333 Designs to several of my friends and would to anyone who asked.

resp.text:
Brighton,

I have loved getting to know you and so glad we could continue after the wedding as friends. I love your photos and I am so glad you choose to work with us! Thank you for such a great review!

Sincerely,
Corrie and the 333 team

name: Nathanael Zurinsky
text: Corrie Spearing is the absolute worst wedding planner and florist.  She has no organizational skills and does not pay attention to details.  I have a complaint in with the better business bureau asking for a refund and she has not even attempted to apologize for ruining my wedding day.  I have documented evidence from receipts, to Corrie's own contract, to the wedding pictures, and wistness testimony stating all the things that she messed up at our wedding.  I have a total of over 31 documented items that she messed up on.  It was pointless to have Corrie for our wedding planner when we could have done all the work ourselves and saved almost $3K that we spent to not have to worry about all the things that she messed up.  For further information, please see a detailed list of items that were filed with the BBB that list out all the things that she messed up.  I would not recommend her to anyone!

resp.text:
Nathanael,

You're wedding day was beautiful and I am sad that you felt it was ruined. The photos turned out amazing and everyone said it was wonderful. We know that we went above and beyond, and we helped provide services that were not event listed in our contracts. We always strive to please and meet expectations, we are deeply saddened by your response. Blessings on your and your wife Mary. I hope you guys can one day see how magical the day was and appreciate the hours of work we provided for you at such an incredible rate.

Sincerely,
333 Designs

text: My mother always said if you don't have anything good to say, then don't say anything at all.

resp.text:
We are so sorry that you feel this way. As planners, we represent the client and we have to stand up for them even if it could hurt feelings.  You were hired to do a specific job, and as we appreciate your willingness to help, you did not provide the services that the client requested nor what we had discussed days before the event. If you were unable to provide the items you agreed to provide and would have let us know things could have gone more smoothly and my team and the catering staff would not have had to help you out so much. My client does not wish to pay more for services that they felt were done inadequately. We wish you all the best with your business and future endevours.

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

text: Was not Happy was very disappointed with the money I paid I deserve some of my money back

resp.text:
After review it is my finding that notification was given that substitutions would be necessary on this item and it was mutually agreed to proceed with the order.  The same quantity of flowers were used, but the stargazer lilies were only partially open.  The overall color and style was kept.
Spoke with the sender and she stated that she did not leave this review when I mentioned it to her.  So I am wondering who the poster of this review actually is.
The substitution policy is listed on our website where this item was chosen from.
To do an exact comparison when you were told that the exact flowers in the arrangement was not available on the needed day is not a fair comparison.  Although I feel it was explained correctly, I did refund a portion of the purchase price back to try and satisfy the customer.

text: Kathy was the person who answered the phone when I called. I could tell right away she cares about her customers. I wanted to send some flowers for a friend who lost a parent and she was more than happy to help and made some great suggestions. Great service! Highly recommend.

name: Jan Hilberg
text: I ordered the arrangement on the left.  Here's the description on their website: "That special someone won’t be able to take their eyes off this fabulous bouquet...or their mind off you. Lavender roses, lavender stock and lavender daisies combine with purple alstroemeria and purple tulips in a purple passion vase."  The photo on the right is what was actually delivered.  Not a lavender or purple flower to be seen.  And certainly nowhere near the size or number of flowers as portrayed online.  When I questioned them about it, I got what it seems like they're telling everyone.  That they have the right to make substitutions.  I get they may not have the EXACT flowers shown but they really didn't have ANY purple or lavender flowers in the shop????  Or maybe a purple vase??  I got green, pink and yellow flowers in a clear vase with a red ribbon!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Would NOT use them again.

They are my go-to florist for anything local.

name: Stacey Garmon
text: Wes did a fabulous job on flowers for my daughter’s wedding.  Good price, EXCELLENT customer service.

name: Seneka Stokes
text: I order a floral arrangement for my Mother for Mother’s Day and it started dying after two days. Not only that, the floral arrangement I asked for was nowhere near as full as the one I saw on the website. When I went to pick the arrangement up and asked about its fullness, I was told that the flowers would bloom once they get warm. Some of the small roses that were in the arrangement were broken when I picked it up. There was green floral tape around the top rim of the vase which could have been easily concealed with a nice ribbon. It was so much green foam in the bottom of the small sized vase. That may be why the flowers aren’t lasting as they don’t have enough room and are poorly cut and crammed in. We put the few flowers that we could salvage in a larger vase. It’s unfortunate that I paid $66 dollars for an arrangement that my mother will only get to enjoy for a few days. I have Walmart flower bouquets that are outlasting these. I usually buy special occasion flowers from Publix at a cheaper price and better quality work, but I wanted to patronize Ferguson’s florist because they are a locally owned business. However I will not use their service again because it seems as though the work was rushed and thrown together and just not worth the money.

name: Tashara Janae
text:
I have been ordering flowers for my mother every two weeks since the unfortunate passing of her husband. The flowers have not been up to par. We went to the florist today to return the flowers. When they arrived they were cut too short, looked nothing like the picture and were drooping and dying after two days. We arrived with a photo of the online order and were told that there was a shortage of flowers and they “substituted.” However, the substitution was poor quality. The owner, Noah Ferguson, came
To speak with us. He was rude, condescending and spoke disrespectfully to me and my mother. I will NEVER order from Ferguson again. I will be reporting this business to the BBB.

name: Enga Sturns
text: They are very nice people but the wait time was a little frustrating

name: Tony Lesser
text: Fast and friend. Will use again

name: Cindy Camp
text: I liked the white banner and bow for my friends mom for the front door

name: Tolly Walker
text: Great flower selection.

name: Katherine Parks
text: I got my dress and flowers there they were so helpful

name: Seasoned Swine
text:
The flowers for the funeral in May were exceptional. Honestly the prettiest flower arrangements I had ever laid eyes on. This last weekend an artificial arrangement was picked up for her headstone. I have to boast of how real and professional they looked. If anyone is considering going anywhere else in Alabama don't do it! :)

Thank you very much for all you have done this year!

name: Michael Harper
text: We had the most beautiful flowers from your shop. We had lost one of our granddaughters , I wanted them to be very beautiful for her and they were, again thank you very much.

name: Randy Martin
text: My daughter was married here April 19. We let Linda and Lori handle most everything from minister, D.J. and photos. The Azalea's were in bloom which made for gorgeous photos. The food was delicious and the arrangements and flowers were awesome. Thank you so much for a job well done and so stress free.

name: gaige tedder
text: I needed a special bouquet for a very special lady in my life, and I had a list of very particular flowers that I wanted in the bouquet. A few of the flowers were hard to come by due to the time of year, and I needed the bouquet in three days and Ferguson pulled it off! All 23 flowers were there and beautifully arranged. I will definitely be using Ferguson for all of my flower needs.

name: Brenda Bone
text: Friendly staff, always there to help you. Traded with them all my life and my parents did too.

name: bnbskaggs
text: Wonderful business with great service. They always have endless varieties of flowers and I love that they are open 7 days a week.

name: Amber Rigsby-Bellew
text: Made a corsage for my last minute son on the spot. Very appreciated!!

name: FireBerlin
text: It's so hard choosing a florist from out-of-state. I went with Ferguson Florist for a flower arrangement for my aunt who has lived in Attalla all of her life. She LOVED the arrangement, said it was the prettiest she had ever received. Her sister later confirmed that Ferguson Florist does very nice work.

name: Shirley Briggs
text: I received an arrangement from Ferguson’s and it Wes absolutely beautiful and the real test is if the flowers last a week they sure have thank you

name: Tammy
text: I want to say Thank You for doing a wonderful job on a floral arrangement that was done for my Mom and Dad's anniversary to put on Mom's gravesite.I had went to several florists trying to find the perfect arrangement and was very disappointed and didn't think I would find what I was looking for until I walked into Ferguson's.Everyone at Ferguson's was very polite and so willing to do their best at helping me to make sure I got the perfect arrangement to please my Dad.When my Dad went to pick it up the next day he was extremely happy with the arrangement.Ferguson's Florist has gotten two customer's that will only use Ferguson's for any arrangements we need from now on.If anyone wants to be pleased with beautiful arrangements and very polite,caring people then Ferguson's is the place to go.

name: Sebrina Crosby
text: I have never left a review for anything, good or bad, but the treatment I received from Ferguson Florist was so abhorrent, I felt compelled to not only leave a review but file a formal complaint with the BBB. I placed an order via their website to be delivered to a location clearly listed as one of the areas they service. A few hours later, I receive a call that they cannot deliver to that area. After being handed off to the manager, before I could even speak, the manager was SCREAMING at me that I'd have to pay 2.5 times the delivery fee that the website listed (which was determined after putting in the exact location). She said she didn't care if I got the flowers or not because I wasn't the one making them, they were.  She continued to scream and berate me. I have never, ever been treated so poorly by anyone, let alone anyone in any sort of customer service sector. The thing is, I would've paid the increase in the delivery fee, but it was the screaming and berating me, without even letting me explain what their own website said, that was so awful and upsetting.

name: Doug
text: I ordered a peace lilly for a funeral service.  They did not deliver the plant to the funeral home.  They refuse to own up to their mistake like a reputable business would and insinuate that the funeral home, my family and I are not being truthful.

name: James Roberts
text: Always has a good selection of flowers.

name: Gina Farley
text: I have asked for unique arrangements from Ferguson's and they have gone above and beyond every time. Excellent customer service!

name: Logan Barnard
text: We have used Ferguson’s many times over the years and have had no complaints. My family ordered several arrangements from Furgeson’s and several other from other florists but only the Ferguson’s arrangements were wilted or mush within 24 hours at the funeral home. Furguson’s blames the funeral home heating however the other arranments were unaffected. I’ve never experienced this before but considering the amount of money involved I will take my business elsewhere in the future.

name: carin whitney
text: Always beautiful!  Birthday, prom, funeral, whatever the occasion, Ferguson Florist never disappoints us.

name: Wanda Payne
text: Asked for flowers for a baby's funeral. I got "DARK" bule roses. The leaves were black

name: Carol Payne
text: Friendly and quality work.  Very helpful  .

name: Joleen Hibbs
text: Great place to take prom pictures.

name: Bridgett Whitney
text: Beautiful arrangements & great customer service!

name: Terry McElrath
text: Very friendly and helpful staff

name: Charlie Ridgeway
text: The Best In Town Bar None

name: Bonnie Atchley
text: Great service and kind.

name: Mandy Vice
text: Great selection.

name: Dollie Gore
text: My experience was awful and very disappointed. The arrangement was for a funeral it was a $150.00 arrangement but looked like a $15.00 arrangement. I will not use Feguson's again.

name: Jnifr Hill
text: The staff was very friendly.

name: Jimi Griffin
text: Great place for flowers I found what I needed in no time

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Jimi!

name: matthew thomason
text: Norton’s always does a great job... best place to get flowers and arrangements in B’ham.

name: Justin Flowers
text: I love this company. I've never had anything but quality service with great looking flowers.  A friend of mine told me about them a few years back and they still do a great job today. This is my go-to flower shop for delivery!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Justin! We’ve been trying to do a great job since 1921!

name: Tint Pro
text: They did a great job on the flowers for our anniversary. On time and they looked great.

resp.text: Thank you! Happy belated anniversary!

name: don miller
text: I ordered flowers for my wife online from Jasper Flower Company on December 30th to be delivered locally,the same day. They never arrived, I tried calling only to be met with a message from Verizon saying the number could not be completed as dialed. After several attempts,the same message. I didn't receive a call saying they were delayed,or would not be able to deliver on said date. I was charged for the BEST arrangement in this category, only to receive a much smaller arrangement. 8 flowers for$90.00. Not happy at all!!!!!!!!!!  David M. Thank you! David made things right. I was taken care of in a professional and timely manner.

name: Karen Swearingen
text: Thank you for letting me know how to care for my Norfolk Pine from my daddy’s funeral.

name: Kelly Key
text: Beautiful orchid was delivered for Mother's Day during this time of separation. Very pleased with Jasper Floral shop.

name: Sonya Bryant
text: Flowers were ordered for me on 02-13 to be delivered on Valentine's Day. An email confirmation of the order was received on 02-13. Repeated calls were made on Valentine's Day because the order was not delivered. Each time he was told it was out for delivery. Then finally at 5 pm I was called to be told that my flowers weren't being delivered because they don't deliver to Nauvoo. She said they called the number on the order and sent an email. It's funny how he got the confirmation email but nothing else. And if you had already contacted the one who placed the order why would you feel the need to call the recipient at 5 pm. If you didn't deliver there all you had to do was let him know and he could have made other arrangements. But don't send a confirmation if you're not gonna deliver and there was no missed call from there. A simple I'm sorry at 5 pm on Valentine's Day night does not suffice !

name: Jennifer Dobbs
text: Unfortunately I had to call with a problem concerning my floral order.  Steve, the owner was the most honest and accommodating man. I truly appreciate him. He offered 2 solutions to my problem without hesitation. He has a true customer service work ethic. I recommend Jasper Floral Company 💯%.

name: Phillip Sherer
text: Did an online order February 13th at 1:00 and recieved confimation email that order was received. Called at 1:00 February  14th to verify and was told all orders where out for delivery. Called back at 3:00 and was told same thing and was asked where it was to be delivered and I told her Nauvoo and she ask who was recieving  it  and I told her. Called back later from another number and was told that the order had been made late and that they did not deliver to Navoo. So at 5 o'clock on Valentines day I have no flowers for my wife. Thanks Jasper Floral you have ruined Valentines for me. I will never use this shop nor will I recommend them.

name: Catrina Mckim
text: Live Floral arrangements for Valentine's Day make order today

name: Katerina Pope
text: I called today to have flowers sent to my grandmother to give her a little brightness as her husband passed away last night. Every person I talked to was beyond kind. The woman I first talked to said they would make the arrangement bright and beautiful and they delivered on that for sure. The flowers arrived to her home so quickly. Will be using this company again for sure!

resp.text: Thank you Katerina for choosing us to help brighten your grandmother's day. It was such a pleasure. And thank you for the amazing review.  We look forward to helping you again in the future!

name: George Jr Blais
text: Thank you very much for the beautiful floral spray you did for our very dear friend's funeral. It was just perfect!      Sharon Blais

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review.  It was our pleasure working with you.  We look forward to helping you again in the future.

name: Wesley Cooley
text: Above and beyond my expectation! Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thank you Wesley for the amazing review.  It was our pleasure helping make your loved one smile. We look forward to helping you again in the future!

name: Ray Jacobson
text:
Wonderful ladies work this store. Fast and friendly.
Walked in with just $40 and walked out with a selection that my fiance' just *LOVED*
THANK YOU!!

resp.text: Thank you Ray for the wonderful review,  we look foward to making you something beautiful soon!!!

name: Becky Smith
text: Beautiful arrangements. Husband surprised me with sending a bouquet for our anniversary from Blooming Fabulous.

resp.text: Thank you Becky for the wonderful review. We are so happy you enjoyed your bouquet of flowers. We look foward to helping make your day beautiful again soon!

name: Brian Denney
text:
THANK YOU SUNSHINE FOR THE HELP
THANKS JULIE!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Brian for allowing us to be part of your special night! We look foward to working with you again soon.

name: Kevin Flowers
text: Beautiful arrangement and arrived in the time frame that was requested. Tammy you were a pleasure to work with. Thank you. If your from out of town this is the place to go. Great service.

resp.text: Thank you Kevin for such a wonderful review.  It is always our pleasure helping make someones day special with flowers!! We look foward to working with you again.

name: Stephanie King
text: They made my daughter's birthday so special. Thanks again!!

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie for allowing us to be part of your daughters special day. We look forward to celebrating with you again soon!!

name: I am the One and Only
text: Cute flower shop! Friendly service!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review.  We appreciate you allowing us to help make someone smile. We look forward to seeing you again!!!

name: Kevin Curtis
text: Awesome

resp.text: Thank you Kevin!! It is always a pleasure having you come by the shop to pick out your beautiful flower arrangements for your special someone..

name: Amber McDonald
text: These people are AMAZING! I've been in several times to get flowers and they will do them while I wait!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome compliment.  We appreciate you!

name: Cindy Shariat
text: Absolutely wonderful service,  on time delivery   and beautiful arrangements. Will use every time I need flowers.

resp.text: Thank you so much. It's always a pleasure to help make someone's day a little more beautiful!

name: Raina Weaver
text: Staff is friendly and helpful. I will be returning to this quant little shop for my wedding flowers and arrangements!

resp.text: We look toward seeing you again... Thank you for allowing us to make something beautiful for you..

name: Denise Dee Nelson
text: Wonderful people ❤️❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you Denise for being such an amazing customer.  We appreciate you and your wonderful complement.

name: Payton daw
text: 💚💚love this place

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review.  Look forward to helping you soon!!

name: Tammy Willis
text: What an awesome company.  I received one of their bouquets as a gift from my son who lives in Huntsville.  When I visited him this past June, I wanted to go to their store and arrange another bouquet for my home and have it shipped.  They were so friendly, helpful and talented in helping me arrange the perfect bouquet and having it shipped to my home in California.  Upon my return home, I received my package and unfortunately, the Post Office was a little rough with my package and damaged some of the flowers.  Anthony at Paper Petals assured me they would take care of me and that they did!  They replaced the damaged flowers in a very timely manner with great communication throughout the process.  Awesome customer service and I will not hesitate to use them again.  Their flowers are incredible, life like and beautiful.  Best part, I don't have to water or worry about dying.  Thank you!

resp.text: Hi Tammy, we're so glad you had a good experience with us (and that your replacement bouquet arrived safely!) It was great having you visit our studio and we really enjoyed arranging your bouquet together for you!

name: G Dunn
text: Beautiful flowers in store. I took a class to make cherry blossoms. Thao was a great teacher and very patient with us all. Everyone made beautiful flowers! LOVE

resp.text: Thank you for attending the class! It was so fun working with everyone. And we agree, everyone's flowers turned out lovely!

name: Mary Hinson
text: I went to Paper Petals Co at Lowe Mill and picked up and Zinnia Kit along with a cute vase! The kit came with all the materials needed and a code to the video tutorial. All you need are a pair of scissors! My family had such a fun time making these flowers and we were so happy with how they all came out!

resp.text: The flower you created looks gorgeous, Mary! Thank you to you and your family for giving our Craft Box a try!

name: Anastacia LaRocco
text: I don't even know where to begin when it comes to singing their praise. They are amazing when it comes to communication and they go above and beyond for their customers. I left a resin flower in their care that my father had made before he passed and I have been so nervous but they treated it with great care. Because of them my dad still gets to walk me down the aisle and I couldn't ask for more. They more than delivered on my wedding flowers and I'm so grateful they will forever be a part of my special day. Thank you so SO much!

resp.text: Staci, we absolutely loved working with you and your family! And seeing everyone's reaction to all of our flowers, especially the incorporation of your father's resin flower, made the occasion even more special. Thank you for choosing us to create such a sentimental piece for your special day!

name: Ashleigh Streeter
text:
I have followed Paper Petals Co. on social media for a couple of years now and have always wanted to order because their work is just so beautiful. I finally ordered two different items for Mother’s Day and WOW they did not disappoint! Absolutely stunning and detailed work! I am so happy with both bouquets. 10/10 Recommend!!

Also, the packing for the shipping was perfect and so well done! No concern about damage at all!

Everything I expected and more!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers for Mother's Day, Ashleigh! We're happy that you're happy with our flowers! We hope you and your loved ones will enjoy those flowers for years to come.

name: Bridget Brooke
text: We are in love with Thao's amazing work! My husband surprised me for our anniversary with a paper version of my flower crown from our wedding, and with the most adorable cherry blossoms for my birthday. We also sent a Mother's day bouquet that was absolutely gorgeous. I cannot say enough good things, and now want to fill my entire house with these gorgeous creations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Bridget! We loved recreating your flower crown and the rest of your florals so we're so happy to hear they were well received!

name: Delilah Steen
text: I love the craft boxes. The single stem and bouquets are also really great for presents. Shipping is fast and beautifully packaged.

resp.text: We're always overjoyed to hear love for our Craft Boxes! Thank you, Delilah!

name: Shalin Mody
text: They have the most wonderfully crafted paper flower bouquets 🤩🌺😍! I've received compliment after complement for the paper flowers I've sent friends and loved ones.  Even better is the story behind the business.  We're very fortunate to have them in Huntsville 😁

resp.text: Thank you for your appreciation for our flowers, Shalin!! It was really a pleasure to chat with you when you stopped by the studio!

name: Ashim Shrestha
text: Absolutely beautiful flowers, with top-notch craftsmanship! Brilliant choices, and selections to chose from. I used them for my niece's birthday party theme, and she loved it so much that she ended up using them in her room. Thao was so easy to work with and made sure she knew exactly what I wanted. Couldn’t be happier, highly recommend!!

resp.text: This really means a lot that she continued to use them in her room after the party! Thank you for letting us be a part of her special day!

name: conbuom
text: This place is everything! The craftsmanship, attention to detail, it’s all gorgeous. And all of the interactions with them were super professional and friendly. Plus the owners have built this business organically - from the ground up! Which is another reason I love to support them. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We are so happy reading your review conbuom, thank you so much for your praise! We feel blessed to have your support, so thank you for following along with us on our paper flower journey!

name: Mika Middleton
text: all around amazing work and excellent customer care. I will be purchasing from them again and again.

resp.text: Thank you, Mika! We always look forward to when you stop by the studio!

name: M Dohr
text:
Coolest bouquet I’ve ever bought for  my gal.

She loved it and it will last .. timeless

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers!!

name: Mariah Johnson
text: We used Paper Petals for our wedding flowers. They were beautiful and we got so many compliments. They looked real!! The best part is we still have them for memories and decorations in our home. Thao was wonderful to work with. She listened to my vision and made it come to life. I would nightly recommend her flowers to anyone for any occasion! Well worth the money.

resp.text: Mariah, it was such a pleasure working with you to create your bridal bouquet!! For our flowers to be a part of your special day and knowing that they are still brightening up your home, that makes our day. Thank you so much for trusting us with your wedding flowers!

name: Jacklyn Parham
text: Excellent teacher beautiful flowers

resp.text: Thank you, Jacklyn!! We're glad you were able to join us for the classes!

name: Janet Elledge-Nauman
text: I purchased a bouquet for my niece.  When they arrived she said they were really beautiful and she was glad that they were made by a local artisan!

resp.text: Thank you for supporting us local artists!!

name: Ishan B
text: Great selections of flowers at their location in Huntsville. Can be scented as well. Better to gift these flowers as they won't decay and  thrown out after few days and can always be nice decor anywhere you put them. I recommend 5/5.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping by our studio. We're so glad to hear that you appreciate our forever flowers!

name: Kathleen N
text: During this strange chaotic time, I was looking for something to spark a sense of joy. I started in my venture of wanting to grow flowers/plants, but knowing I have a black thumb. As a result, I started looking into paper flowers. Instagram recommended Paper Petals Co. after some search, and I began reading up on the company’s mission statement. I will be honest and say, I also have a very soft spot for Asian women entrepreneurs who are thriving in their businesses. I am so excited to eventually get many more flowers, but I did send a bouquet to a friend and can’t wait to see my friend’s reaction. With that said, I am incredibly impressed by Thao’s talent, her passion for her work, and her kindness as a human. It’s been such a pleasure conversing with her, and I plan to continue supporting this business that brings so much happiness.

resp.text: Reading your words of kindness and encouragement have truly made our days, Kathleen! Thank you so much for all of the support you've given us and we cannot wait for you to one day visit our studio!

name: melissa nguyen
text: ppc is a really wholesome company. They’ve been so passionate about their work ever since the beginning and it shows. Their flowers are stunning and its totally worth a look !

resp.text: If our passion is visible through our work then we've succeeded! Thank you, Melissa!

name: Mariah Zielke
text: Thao’s flowers are so beautiful! The perfect dainty addition to my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Mariah!! We're happy that our flowers can be decorating your home!

name: Emaley Thomas
text:
I'd met the owner of this shop at an event & fell in love with her work. When I was walking through Lowe Mill one day I saw that she had opened up shop recently via her social media and I will forever be buying flowers from her.
The quality of work is unlike anything I've seen in paper flowers. You can tell not only by talking to her but by her attention to detail she is doing what she loves. The flowers are vibran, well-constructed,  and one of a kind. Will always come back to buy more.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your compliments, Emaley!! It is so good to hear that the little details are not going unnoticed, so thank you for your love for our flowers!

name: jean beasley
text: I’ve taken a couple of workshops from Thao (the owner). She is a great teacher! I enjoyed the workshop so much, I bought crepe paper, wire and pan pastels to make my own. (I’ve now taught my mom how to make crepe paper flowers.) I’ve also bought quite a few flowers from Thao to decorate my home. I love her flowers!

resp.text: Jean, it's always a pleasure anytime you stop by and we have a chance to work together! Thank you for spreading the love for paper flowers!

name: Priscillia Engelking
text: Beautiful handcrafted bouquets with colors even brighter than the pictures! The customer service and timely shipping is also great. I have purchased multiple bouquets for my house as well as gifts.

resp.text: It's been a joy putting together bouquets for you! Thank you for your support, Priscillia!

name: Brianna Haynes
text: I have purchased flowers multiple times and recently attended a workshop to create my own paper flower.  Thao's flowers are absolutely stunning. At times I have even forgotten that they aren't real.  The workshop was fun and informative.  The instruction was clear and easy to follow and the materials are excellent quality.  I will be attending more workshops in the future.

resp.text: It is a pleasure every time you visit the studio, Brianna! Thank you for all of your support!

name: Sunny Lloyd
text:
I found out that Paper Petals sells craft boxes and decided that I needed one ASAP before I ended up with cabin fever and a dead husband (I kid!)

I placed my order on Saturday and it was delivered Sunday. I cried, it’s honestly that exquisite, and such a welcome distraction from all that’s going on in our world today. I don’t have a creative bone in my body, but it’s been a lovely activity. Thank you so much, Thao!!

resp.text: Sunny, you are too sweet!! It really means a lot that my Craft Box could bring you such a good experience during this crazy time. Thank you so much!

name: Valerie DePalma
text: Their flowers are gorgeous and they have lots of different options to make bouquets or to purchase ones already made. If you don't live in Huntsville you can have them shipped as well and they'll come in perfect condition!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers, Valerie! We always try to have many different options for everyone to match any occasion, so we're glad you found the right arrangement here!

name: Salwa Jeries
text: Loved the peonies class, it was so much fun and super relaxing! Her works are beautiful and last forever!

resp.text: We're happy to know you found the workshop fun and relaxing, that is definitely our goal! Thank you for attending!

name: Sulav Darnal
text: Absolutely in love with The Paper Petals. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sulav!!

name: The Stever’s
text: Wonderful flowers 💐 truly love them but the price point is high

resp.text: Thank you for your review and we're happy to hear you love our flowers!

name: Claire Young
text: We loved the flower workshop! An afternoon well spent. We'll definitely go again!!

resp.text: It was great having you attend our workshop and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Martin Nguyen
text: Beautiful work!!! High quality people and products!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Martin!

name: Pierre Janson
text: Ordered an arrangement for a funeral of colored REAL flowers ,,we got silk white ,,,called them on it ,was told sorry bout that we were busy,,,that was it

name: pat smith
text: I have used this florist for many years. Always had beautiful  arrangements. I would recommend them

name: Daniel Cheek
text: Good caring service..Diane  was so helpful....

name: Terry Crosswhite
text: Very nice staff and large floral selections

name: John Seagroves
text: Wonderful place. I ordered a small flower arrangement to have ready. They were for my mother I was bringing her at work. When I got there I wasn’t really able to get in do to me being in chair so they brought them out to me. Very nice lady came out to give them to me set them in the passenger seat fastened by the seatbelt so they wouldn’t fall over. I went to give her my card and she said not to worry about it they were on her. I was surprised and thankful. I know it’s been awhile but I told them I’d be back to pay it fwd. I promise I’ll make it back that way.

name: Pam Burrows
text: I don't know much about the florist. They were nice on the phone. They were fast and professional.  I  have used them before and they are very good at their job.

name: Barbara Peeler
text: Very nice people huge selection

name: Ashley Goins
text: I am so thrilled with my bridal bouquet that Mrs. Diane made for me. It is absolutely beautiful. Might I add she even went down on the price which I wasn't expecting! I definitely recommend this place to at one needing wedding stuff or funeral arrangements! They do a great job and are very sweet! Will be back soon!

name: Stacie Seymour
text: Sweetest shop w the nicest elderly couple running it. She helped w my brother n laws flowers for his funeral.  The lady in charge was the kindest soul in our time of sorrow. God bless.

name: cindy smith
text: Very nice experienced lady took care of me. Has some beautiful gifts and keepsakes also. Prices are very reasonable.

name: Kimberly Brock
text: Was great very helpful went above and beyond to help thank you very much will recommend to everyone thanks again

name: Fran Tielking
text: Love it the flowers  and gifts  are beautiful  I buy everything  there.

text: We stumbled on this place by accident looking for a certain type of arrangement and were pleasantly shocked at the quality of products and the prices.  The place also sells headstones so it does not look like much of a florist from the outside but inside the stuff is quality, the prices great and helpful people.

name: Charlie Morgan
text: Fantastic folks . . Quality and Great pricing.

I am very disappointed with an arrangement I recently ordered.
I was not told white Rose's were not available and the basket consisted of mostly filler flowers. I feel $75.00 was unreasonable for the arrangement. Linda H.

text: Diane, simply....thank you.  ~ Lynita

resp.text:
Thank you so much!
We appreciate you!

name: Angi Garrett
text: I called from out of town, and Barbie was a great help with my purchase.

name: April Miller
text: Love this place!!! Your always made to feel like you are right at home.

name: Hayther's Inspiration
text: My spray tan was about 8 days ago and now it just coming off.

name: Rose Murphy
text: Love this store

name: Marina Rhoden
text: They are great people who have the most respected, and beautiful flowers in town. They did a fantastic 👏 job on my brother's and friend's funerals. Very polite, they gift wrap nice little things in their shop for you. Thank you so much guys!! The flowers really helped make it beautiful.

name: Lois Miller
text: Never disappointed with their work. Friendly and helpful. Thanks for your many years of service to our town.

name: Tabitha n Tammy Lucas
text: Beautiful arrangements and good service.

name: Karen Starling
text: Beautiful arrangements but pricey.

name: James Portwood
text: They do a great job every single time

name: Tammy Rene Scroggins
text: Wonderful service. Pick up our delivery, you get great services and high quality flowers/flower arrangements. Reasonable prices. Great services.

name: Jennifer Howell
text: Helpful, friendly and good prices for beautiful arrangements

name: Uwe Rogers
text: Excellent service and a very friendly staff. Needed a small bouquet in a hurry and they fixed one up while we waited.

name: Wayne Hobson
text: Nice family operation!

name: Ron McDaniel
text: Always great service and beautiful arrangements.

name: Toya Dunk
text: I ordered a dozen of red roses for Mother's Day for my mother in law. They delivered some cheap assorted arrangement on Saturday before closing so I contacted them on Monday morning about the mistake, they told me they would call me back! 6 hours later, I decided to call back again, they told me that they would deliver her the roses on Tuesday but they needed the old flowers BACK! Really! Talk about customer service!

name: Brandon Jones
text: Worst florist service I've ever used. Changing Seasons offer a lot better service.

name: Rmoorer14 R
text: Friendly staff great arrangements

name: Nicole Watson
text: Professionalism at its finest.

name: Andrea Taylor
text: Beautiful flowers

name: Victoria Jones
text: Very friendly

name: Luan Brashaw
text: I have recently moved to the area and Publix is a brand that is familiar and trusted. Publix at The Bray is like all Publix, friendly, polite team members waiting to help with a smile. This fairly new store offers all the same grocery brands and deals as my "old" Publix. I was delighted to find a self-serve hot bar and salad bar in addition to their deli. I believe they even have a seating area upstairs.  All employees were masked which is becoming more unusual since the COVID vaccine has become more available to the general public. Well-lit, amply spaced aisles add to the overall pleasant shopping experience. I look forward to frequenting this store AND the shopping complex it is a part of while I live in this area.

name: J L
text: I have had one too many disappointing events at this location. Twice I had to complain about the deli. Once the employees were not wearing gloves the second time I was given raw food. This time I went to get batteries. There was a 25% off coupon on the hangers for the batteries. All the Duracell brand. 4 pack 8 pack so forth. I get to the register with my 4 pack and they ring up normal price. I ask about. A young lady goes and checks then comes back and tells me it only for the bigger packs. Then why is it on all the pack sizes? They must of run out of room is what I am told. The cashier was very nice, apologetic but the other lady although not rude was not willing to solve the issue but was insistent on me paying full price. Needless to say although I would normally just pay decided not too and left. This was not a customer mistake but store level which should of been handled better.

name: chris walker
text: Customer service always great at this location. The fruit is always the best selection of fruit around. Prices are a we bit high but the customer service and the selection of fruit and fresh seafood is worth it.

name: Susan H
text: Everyone in this store is super friendly, clean and the employees have gone out fo there way to make sure they have a great selection like even special ordered products my other Publix had in another state. (with the exception of the pharmacy person but there’s always one right?!) Overall awesome store!

name: Amit Momaya
text: Clean and organized grocery store. The staff are terrific and make you feel welcome. I enjoy shopping here.

name: Louis Brignet
text: Very nice & very clean, I buy groceries there all the time, way too much !

name: Jackancoke
text: New publix is the always the best publics

name: Mark “Xlorntabis” E.
text: So glad to have a publix in this area, brand new and well laid out!

name: Terry Reed
text: I was picking up RX that was ready. The Pharmist was  very professional and very pleasant to take to.

name: Lara Polk
text: Great location so nice and clean and organized

name: Angelo Roma
text: As a frequent patron  , very disappointed that no one helped me at the deli (over 10 minutes) b/c staff was waiting on the lunch crowd on the opposite side; still spent over $100 but may not be so quick to return.

name: Paul Hinnen
text: Good store. Fast service. Had everything I needed and got out quickly

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Paul! ¤Angel

name: Paul Goodall (PrincePaul)
text: Friendly and helpful staff.

name: Andrea Crawford
text: Nice new store! Publix employees are always helpful ❤️

resp.text: Thanks for your kind feedback Andrea! ¤Angel

name: Grace Scott
text: Great clean nice store all employees are great always willing to help you

name: Samuel Thompson
text: Plenty of staff. Store is in full operation. COVID-19 measures in effect. Includes a pharmacy with separate operating hours.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Samuel! ^Doug

name: Nicole Thompson
text: helpful 😌

name: Michael Lane
text: Weird delli guy.

name: Tyler Volz
text: Out of chicken tenders and white bread. Not much of a sandwich place.

name: Ellie Sikes
text:
Southerly is the BEST! I was lucky enough to work with them for my wedding this last year and it was such a joy. Sarah is so easy to work with and personable. The flowers themselves are gorgeous, and mixed with their creativity and unique style - Southerly Flower Farm is unmatched!!
As a team they really do have a way of taking the ideas that are in your head and making them come alive. Even in the midst of COVID and having to change our plans, numbers, and designs multiple times, she was steady, encouraging, and on top of everything. I came in with ideas of things I really wanted, and together we figured out a budget-friendly plan that worked perfectly for our special day. I can't recommend her enough!

name: Hailey Johnston
text: Absolutely loved my experience with Southerly Flower Farm!!! They were so wonderful to work with for our wedding - I asked them to surprise me for all of my wedding flowers, which is not the easiest task to do for a bride, and they rocked it! All of my flowers were gorgeous and very unique and very me, which means they are great listeners because I threw a lot of ideas at them. If you haven't had the chance to work with them you must!

name: Giselle Bird
text: They made all my bouquet dreams come true! They were easy to work with despite the pandemic, and I’m really impressed that after just 1 phone call they were able to make my vision come alive! Love how natural both my bouquet and the girls’ looked and felt. My hair flowers were beautiful and lasted all day and the boutonnières were perfect! Thank you so much Southerly Flower Farm! ❤️

name: flora ziliak
text: I’ve never left a google review before! But Southerly was so great to work with and I really recommend folks in the Chattanooga area to use them for floral services. They were so kind, helpful, and communicative in helping me get flowers together for our little pandemic elopement. Would definitely utilize their expertise again!

name: Neha Shah
text: Sarah and her team are amazing. They make the most beautiful arrangements and have the best customer service!! If you haven’t checked them out, you must.

name: Cayce Gearrin
text: I live up in MN and have used Southerly for many a Mother’s Day bouquet and birthday bouquets ...so when it came time to pick a florist for my wedding in TN, I knew exactly where I would go. Sarah was so great and coordinated the consultation with me when I was in town. We walked through what my vision was and she even did a site visit with mom to the wedding venue. She was awesome giving me a clear vision of what things work and what don’t and with very broad requests on my part ....as I do not know much about flowers and gave her basically a color scheme...she created a beautiful installation for our wedding ceremony and really brought the property to life with her arrangements scattered across the venue. I could not have been more happy with the service and quality of product that Southerly provides, Sarah is a true artist and this husband /wife team are amazing to work with!!!

name: Jaime Smialek - Our Ampersand Photo
text: By far the best wedding florist in Chattanooga!! Sarah's eye for design is unparalleled in this area. If you are design nerd, have an eye for florals, or believe in sustainable farming, these are your people. Their work is wild, whimsical, and simply stunning. Sarah and Matthew are a husband and wife team who grow their own flowers and build insane installations. They are a joy to work with. Great communicators, hard workers, and creative geniuses. I can not recommend them highly enough. You will not be disappointed.

name: Emily Mills
text: I have nothing but AMAZING things to say about Sarah and the team at Southerly Flower Farm. From the very beginning, Sarah was nothing but helpful and kind and understanding as I fumbled my way through having no specific idea of what I wanted for my flowers (apart from asking for them to be "woodsy" and contain thistles, BOTH of which she accomplished!). Sarah also was so quick to respond to questions and concerns I had; she answered all my questions about payment and financing honestly and openly; and she worked last minute to adjust and make changes when we downsized our wedding. She made the whole process simply so enjoyable and so smooth and I could not have asked for a better florist. Not to mention, the flowers were locally sourced which made me even happier! You will not be disappointed if you work with Southerly Flower Farm. I'd hire them again tomorrow!

name: Jennifer Holder
text:
Southerly Flower Farm made my wedding day PERFECT. She worked with my crazy color scheme to put together the most wonderful bouquets and centerpieces. She also added her creative eye to the overall decor and we are so lucky we had her do our wedding. Also, of course, she was super easy to work with. 100 PERCENT RECOMMEND!

(Photos by Taylor English Photography, who I'd also recommend!)

name: Vivian Lozano
text: I absolutely loved having Southerly Flower Farm do the flowers for our wedding. Sarah is wonderful to work with,  a great listener that can work with your ideas and take them to the next level. Honestly, I gave Sarah a hodgepodge of ideas that she managed to put together and she delivered beautifully, making everything look gorgeous. She was also really punctual, which I really appreciated. Would work with them again in a heartbeat and I recommend their services to everyone.

name: Maggie Ruch Frelinghuysen
text: 10/10 would recommend--I cannot praise Sarah's work enough! While we met early on to discuss my vision and preferences and touched base a few times during the planning process, I put my full trust in Sarah's creativity and allowed her to work her magic. The result was spectacular. I still look back at photos and gush over the flower arrangements and bouquets. She also was super helpful as I navigated my budget, and she had many ideas and options that kept me within my budget. Do yourself a favor and book Southerly Flower Farm for your wedding--you will not be disappointed!

name: Allie O'Connell
text: I loved working with Sarah having local flowers for my wedding last summer. I had a very low key wedding, and just ordered a bouquet and 2 DIY buckets of flowers that my friends and family help me arrange in stem vases. It was perfect and the flowers were stunning.

name: Marijke Griffin
text: Sarah was the best! I loved working with her, she was so so kind and helpful when figuring out what flowers I wanted for my bouquet and wedding. The flowers were beautiful, my bouquet was the prettiest I’ve ever seen! Perfect mix of whimsical and timeless. She also did an arch for us that looked beautiful and held up even in 98 degree weather throughout our wedding!  Book Sarah for all your event needs!

name: Skylar DeRight
text: Absolutely in love with Southerly Flower Farms. The flowers they styled (& grew) for my wedding were dreamy and beyond what I was anticipating. During our consultation, Sarah really took the time to get to know me and what I envisioned for our wedding. She was so easy to work with and helped our wedding day go smoothly. We received so many compliments from guests. Would love to be able to work with Southerly for future events.

name: Katie Schlabach
text: Sarah made all of my bridal bouquet dreams come true! My husband and I eloped on Lookout Mountain and wanted a “wildflower bouquet”. Nothing too polished.  Sarah obliged and it was even more beautiful than I imagined! I love keeping up with her on social media to see all the beautiful flowers she’s always growing and collecting. 😍

name: Mary Sawyer
text: Southerly Flower Farm made our wedding so special! I had a vision, but could never give Sarah any specifics and she was able to take my few little ideas and turn it into exactly the feel I imagined but SO much better than I could’ve dreamed up. It felt really special to have the flowers coming straight from their Chattanooga area farm, and I love that they use sustainable methods to create the arches and table settings. Just a great feel overall! She was willing to make anything work for my budget but also provided me with different levels of what she could do for each budget which was very helpful   . She and Matt arrived early to set everything up perfectly and they took care of taking everything down after, and made sure I didn’t have to worry about anything. I am still having people rave about the flowers at our wedding, and how unique and beautiful they were. I can’t say enough good things!

name: Grace Aki
text: Let me just say - I still think about my wedding flowers from 2018 to this day. Seriously Southerly Flower Farm was an immediate choice for our flowers. They were able to articulate my vision beyond what my wildest dreams. My fresh flowers were so unique the day of the wedding I cried when I held my bouquet, probably also due to the fact I was getting married. Regardless, SFF tied everything together and got everything to us in a timely fashion. The only florist I’ll ever recommend.

name: Leslie Garcia
text: For our wedding, I was set on finding a sustainable flower farm to work with. Sarah was the perfect person for this! She listened to my wedding ideas and came up with several options that would fit with my theme, ambitions and budget. Best investment and I would highly recommend!

name: Carolyn Youngblood
text: The flower for my brother funeral was beautiful. Thanks

name: clang theo
text: In a way I am glad they changed their name. The new owners lived off the reputation of Beard's excellent customer service for too long. Many times, depending on who you get, the people who work there are rude and abrasive.  They will tell you right off they can't do this or that.  They sometimes act as though the price is too exorbitant for you when relaying how much you owe. It's interesting to say the least.  I use them for silk arrangements only because they are convenient.  The new name is Petals and Stems but the attitudes are the same.

name: Mary Mazingo
text: It is a good place to get your flowers for your loved ones

name: A Breland
text: Easily the most disappointing florist experience I've ever had.  They ruined two arrangements.  Arrangements are small, and style is old-fashioned and often ugly.  I'll never use them again.

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Theron Struzik
text: Lovely store front and flowers are ok.

resp.text: Thanks for visiting our store

name: Erika Deaton
text: Went and rented a tuxedo for my son's prom. They have so much stuff.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words!!

name: lisa pritchard
text: Wonderful place, great people!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We love our customers!!

name: Susan Randolph
text: Every item was distinct and beautiful! Reasonably priced also.

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: Azsah Arnett
text: Beautiful flowers. Amazing stuff in there store.

resp.text: Thanks for coming in. We appreciate out customers so much!!

name: Karen Ball
text: Not open often enough

resp.text: Thanks for your input. We are open 6 day a week and are on call on weekends.

name: Patrick Heintz
text: Very friendly

resp.text: Thanks!!

name: Ana Gelezeau
text: Great selection of gifts and flowers to choose from  . Very  nice people who own the store

name: Chris PENNINGTON
text: This is the Best Flower shop I've ever used!! They always have fresh Beautiful flowers!! Would recommend to anyone needing flowers for any occasion!!

name: Willodean Mann
text: Always beautifully done, always pleased

name: Patti Jackson
text: Love ordering from the local florist.  The owner made the arrangement we purchased for our best friend Mom's home going..  I had some concerns at first look but she went over & above to make it beautiful for the family of Mrs Katie Simmons .   Thank you!!

name: Heather Richardson
text: The owner is absolutely amazing! Has went above and beyond for me on many occasions! Makes sure my mom whom has cancer gets occasional fresh flowers and also set up a fundraiser for her where a certain percentage of rose purchases on Valentine’s Day went to my moms medical expenses! Paige has the absolute best customer service! Once you meet her she will seem like family and definitely treat you like it!  Life is about those moments when someone you cross paths with make huge impacts, she is definitely one of those people!

name: Bethany Small
text: This shop is beyond amazing, the quality of design is cutting edge. The Prices are reasonable, our Wedding Flowers were everything we wanted plus so much more. However the most notable gift you will receive is just a beautiful person who will go out of her way to make you happy. Our family loves you Ms Paige and you will always have a special place in our hearts!

name: Neal Smith
text: Paige does amazing work. She will tailor everything to your specific taste. She goes above and beyond to be sure every customer is completely satisfied. I would recommend Sunflowers to anyone and I have to many!

name: Elliott Mattisen
text: Mrs.Paige is the sweetest and kindest person you will ever meet and her work is over the top great and beautiful and I will never get flowers from anyone other than her.

name: Florence Handyman
text: Paige is what I would have to say.. THE BEST florist I have ever worked with.. I have customers and contacts local AND out of state.. No matter what the situation is.. She makes something custom & beautiful at a fair price OR works a deal on our behalf even as far as california.. She has handled funerals, birthdays, customer appreciation etc for us and we have NEVER been disappointed.. I 100% recommend her & Sunflowers Designs!

name: Kristi Sibert
text: They went above and beyond for my daughter in law’s birthday arrangement that I ordered! We had discussed hydrangeas, and when they were not available, another beautiful arrangement was sent...and then when the hydrangeas can in, they OUTDID themselves and sent a second arrangement! How is that for customer service!!! Thank you! I’ll be calling them again!

name: Alisha Sowell
text: Very rude and standard!

name: Matthew Conde
text: TOP NOTCH FLORIST! Bella Blooms is always on the spot with providing excellent, quick service with a reasonable price! They are very creative when it comes to their floral designs (not just flowers in a vase). Highly recommend!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: I just got married on Halloween and I was shocked by the magic Jason & Michelle worked for me!! Honestly the most beautiful floral arrangements I'd ever seen. I received so many compliments. Jason is SO easy to talk to and listened to all of my requests. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: rick merriam
text: This is the real deal florist. They have the best service and the best flower arrangement my wife has ever seen. I used to go to Homewood to get her flowers but not any more. This place is worth the drive

name: Amy B
text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
