text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels
text: Beautiful arrangement.

name: Wendi Alexander
text: ALWAYS THE BEST!! Quality and great prices, my go-to for any floral needs. I love the plants available as well! Thanks to all who work there, so much heart in what you do!

name: Mike Simmons
text: thay Have been good to the family for many years.when my brother passed thay were there and done a good job.thank you....

name: Brenda Fricks
text: Beautiful arrangements for my Aunt.

name: Sherri george
text: I live in Texas, my son is buried in Alex City. On special occasions I have Grace’s Flower shop to lay a bundle of sunflowers on his bench. They take a picture of the flowers & text it to me when they deliver them. They are always over the top beautiful! I work at a florist so I know they have given extra care in their arrangements. I can’t thank them enough for their thoughtfulness! They go beyond my expectations! Thank you to all of them! I highly recommend them to anyone who wants beautiful flowers prepared with love & care!!!

name: Randy Knowles
text: Good service and good prices.

name: Hunter Ebey
text: Called on them from New Orleans LA to help me out. They came through and HOW! God bless y'all! And thank you so much!

name: John Dark
text: Always friendly service with excellent flowers and gifts.

name: Rob Smith
text: I moved away from Alex City in 1990 when I graduated from high school. Ever since then, I've called Grace's Flowers twice a year for them to make a special arrangement for my mom for her birthday and for Mother's Day. For 28 years, they've helped me from afar make my mom's special days even brighter with beautiful arrangements and live plant baskets when I can't be there myself. Thank you ladies for all you do, and I look forward to calling you for many more years to come.

name: Cat Tubulov
text: Ordered white roses with blue hydrangea & clear square vase..... sent to Russell Medical Center.  Within two hours my order was delivered!!!  Fast & Efficient service even during one of the busiest times of the year....Valentines!!  Thank you Grace's Flowers!!  Highly recommend this florist!

name: R&D Entertainment
text: I love Graces and their entire team.  From prom, to our new office location open house to flowers sent to friends to put a smile on their face, this place has it going on!  You will not be disappointed!

name: Robyn M Harris
text: A++++ Beautiful Flowers and unmatched customer service!!!! They really helped me out in a pinch....Customer for life!! Thanks again! Robyn

name: Josh Yates
text: Outstanding staff!  Expedited my delivery from a Friday to a Wednesday.   They didn't complain, charge extra, and were in high spirits.  My wife loved the flowers.  Thank you.

name: Karen Guy
text: Always satisfied with what they have made up for me.

name: Matthew Saye
text: Parking isn't very convenient. Other than that, it was a great experience. The employees wete very gracious and the the finished produxt was great! To make it even better, I was in and out extremely fast.

name: Lauren Guy
text: Wonderful!! Used Grace's Flowers for my wedding last year and if I could give more than 5 stars I would.

name: Emily Schultz
text: We got an arrangement for our rehearsal dinner last weekend and it was beautiful.  In fact it is still lovely and I appreciate you taking care of our needs.

name: jan woolridge
text: I  have purchased cemetery flowers from her for years at reelfoot lake arts n crafts and travel to tupelo ms to buy them.  Going to miss you and Larry at the lake.

name: Bernadette Johnson
text: The ladies at grace's flower shop are the best in town

name: Debbie Hodge
text: I have been doing business with them for many, many years. They do a great job and the service is great.

name: Tony Blanco
text: Awesome place with awesome people!

name: J&J Pest Away
text: Great!!

name: Ray Johnson
text: Great place and great people

name: Kerry Bulin
text: Wonderful staff!

name: Donna Whetstone
text: It was great i.give it a 5 star

name: Lorean Suggs
text: Very nice, helpful and not to expensive. Beautiful arrangements.

name: Phil Mattison
text:
Called Spoke to Linda to send a nice arrangement to my cousins funeral.
Linda was very helpful and clearly had an understanding of my needs.

name: Brian Crawford
text: I highly recommend these guys!  Their arrangements are always fresh and beautiful!

name: Augusta Chambers
text: Great service and quality flowers and arrangements. They also deliver

name: Cathy Dobbins
text:
They made the blanket for my mothers funeral
Gorgeous work.  Just what I wanted.  Perfect job and very courteous staff.

name: Jenifer Lynn Shepard
text: My friend owns and runs this flower shop!! Love You Darlene!! ❤❤

name: Becky Harris
text: Gorgeous flower arrangements! They do the best flowers and silks

name: Stephanie K
text: I don't even want to give one star as I am so unhappy with this place. I ordered an arrangement online ONE WEEK in advance for my mother in-laws birthday.  I received an email confirmation and everything. I noticed my credit card was never charged, so I attempted calling the shop countless times to find out if the order went through. No one ever answered and they do not have a voicemail set up. The day of her birthday, NO FLOWERS WERE EVER DELIVERED!!! Again, I tried calling and calling and calling with no luck I resorted to email, only to get a response two days later telling me that the delivery address was out of their range!!! You had one week to notify me, and no one ever called. They claimed to have called and left a voicemail, WRONG!! no one ever attempted to contact me. And by the way it was 15 miles away from their shop! What kind of company can survive by only doing business within a 10 mile radius? Your online system should have a default by address to not accept orders more than 10 miles away.  I should have read the previous reviews because I would have NEVER used them.

name: Kiley
text: These people are extremely mean and rude!

name: Suzanne Melton
text: Rude and high.

name: Will Hallman
text: Incredible work! My daughter is sick and flowers are her favorite. I believe these brightened her day. Thank you Joy's Flowers!

name: Jamie Moon
text: I ordered a premium floral arrangement for a funeral.  The basket was delivered on time to the viewing, which is more than I can say for some companies. However, it was not as pictured and it was the most pitiful, smallest, arrangement received that day. An $80 basket should not be an embarrassment.

name: Corey McIntyre
text: Flowers I ordered and had sent turned out beautiful..I did the custom pick and let the specialist work there magic ..excellent job and service ..highly recommend

name: Chris H
text: Cool shop with more than just flowers. They were a great help and put together a nice bouquet last minute.

name: Audra Williams
text: I ordered and paid for the premium 68 dollar basket..to say when I saw this arrangement that I was sorely disappointed and felt taken advantage of for the amount I paid is an understatement! I live out of state, so I guess the florist thought that I wouldn't see the end product.... I will never recommend or use this florist again! I could have purchased a basket in my home town and delivered it myself for less than I paid for this arrangement.

name: Emily Crumpler
text: I order a few baskets at once for different people.  One basket got put at the house behind theirs (there are two houses on their lot). This business offered and took another one out right away, they fix the situation and did not act like it was a problem at all. I would order from them in a heartbeat.  I personally also thought the prices were reasonable.

name: Jn F. Turner
text: I received roses for Valentines day from my husband he was very disappointed at the arrangement looked really cheap and nothing like the picture arrangement he saw online.  You could barely see the roses. I was very disappointed as well after learning what he spent for it. He is still apologizing for it.

name: Senior HelpersNEO
text: I ordered an arrangement from Joy's for the first time a few days ago, and my experience was amazing. The hydrangeas were beautiful and the staff was very helpful. They were able to fulfill my order in a few short hours (for a great price). I highly recommend Joy's, they take great care of their customers, and their flowers are of great quality! You will not be disappointed. Five stars

name: Courtney Moon
text: Ordered an arrangement online for a funeral. Extremely disappointed and shocked when I actually saw the arrangement. Much much smaller in person.  Absolutely wasn't worth the price paid. Would not recommend ordering online. Will not be ordering again.

name: Robert Owens
text: Ok.   Not the warmest reception.   Will try somewhere else next time.

name: Craig Bowman
text: Wonderful experience there

name: Lanicsha W
text: Overall the service from this business was exceptional, I was pleased with both the delivery and the quality of the floral arrangement. I would definitely recommend this business to everyone.

name: Kristen Frost
text: Joy's did my wedding and they did an AMAZING job!! They are my go-to florist for everything! They do such wonderful work and are always so kind! I give them all the stars and will continue to use them and refer them to friends!!

name: Casey Riddlesperger
text: Wonderful people. Great customer service. GORGEOUS flowers. Called with a last minute order needed for the next morning. Beyond impressed with the results. The arrangement was perfect!  Will definitely order from Joy’s again.

name: Kayla Rose
text: Beautiful arrangement. Great price. Fast friendly delivery.

name: Viv Pace
text: Very poor customer service skills taking order by phone giving cryptic answers as if uninterested. It's easier to simply go elsewhere.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear this. We will take note of this and make sure to do a better job. I am truly sorry that you were not happy with your experience. If there is anything we can do to make it better, please feel free to call 256-546-6381 and ask for Kristen.

name: Shanell Taylor
text: My experience with Joy's Flowers was outstanding! The ordering process was simple. They arrived very quickly. And the flowers were amazing! My mother loved them. I highly recommend ordering from them!

name: Dawn Frost
text: Nice atmosphere for a floral shop great decor with all kinds of items to decorate your home with. From hand painted vases to a refinished dresser for sale. Lady who worked there was very and helpful. She helped me decide on a bouquet for a friends birthday. Will be back to order more flowers for this Valetines Day!

name: C. Bos
text: We count on Joy's flowers to keep beautiful arrangements on Mom's table for every special day. They accommodate special requests as best they can with the flowers they have. Our mom loves pink. :)

name: Crystal Grochola
text: This is a wonderful flower shop and gift shop. Such wonderful people who work there and overall great prices. I will be using them again. Love Joy's .....

name: Jessie Miller
text: My corsage for prom was horrible put together the rose fell off 30 mins of wearing it (thank god I had done senior lead out already) and the baby breath flow had out even bloomed yet and we paid 36.00$ so I give you  a 1

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that. We will be in touch with you soon in hopes that we can do something to make this better. Is there a name other than Jessie Miller that your order would be under?

name: Jay P
text: This is at least the 4th year I have ordered from Joy's and my sister loves the arrangements and baskets I send her from here.  This time I spoke with Tiffany and she was bright, pleasant and knowledgeable.  We were able for me to visualize a similar arrangement online  My former wife's family was in the flower business here in South Florida for decades and I appreciate good service and great arrangements and Joy's does it extremely well.

name: Jc Chandler
text: Love this shop. I walk in and they know exactly what I want and my name. Recommend highly. They rap the roses anyway I ask.

name: Kathryn Ballard
text: Excellent service, reasonable prices, and high quality in the snack basket that I ordered. I would highly recommend Joy's...

name: Gene Walker
text: I ordered funeral arrangement and it was not delivered even after being told it had been when I checked the morning of service. Then they were suppose to have a plant delivered to the home of the mother of deceased and has been 2 days and still no plant. I live out of state and called the florist (Joys) myself. Will not use nor recommend them ever again.

name: Laura Singleton
text: VERY EASY TO ORDER ONLINE AND WAS VERY IMPRESSED TO GET AN EMAIL ADVISING ONCE ORDER HAD BEEN DELIVERED

name: Kelsey Todd
text: I got an email saying the flowers were delivered to my friend and she never received them. Hoping this will be fixed, but I am very unsatisfied right now. They were delivered after store hours with no way to figure out what happened so I am super upset. :(

name: C.Eric. Holcomb
text: Wonderful place to find the flowers that you want for that special someone.

name: Tonya Mayhall
text: It was so easy to order and when I called the person I spoke with was so nice

name: Colleen Reed
text: My daughter was very happy with her beautiful flowers!

name: Craig Boose
text: Very embarrassed with the pitiful arrangement i ordered.  Never again will I use this florist.

name: ethan johnson
text: Best florist in Etowah County!! Hands down

name: David Stamps
text: One of the best.

name: Terri Webb
text: Love the employees and their work

name: Edwin Smith
text: Joy"s is Fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Montez Barker
text: Great gift

name: Regina Vinson Ford
text: Very rude

name: Teisha Johnson
text: Beautiful arrangements and beautiful gifts!!

name: Donna S
text: Great service with fresh flowers

name: eddy woodall
text:
This flower shop was very professional and nice.
Was getting a dozen of Rose's for wife's birthday.
My wife loved them.i will be getting my flowers from this shop.
The shop was very helpful and nice.

name: Sandra Shuman
text: Great people beautiful flowers

name: Katy Megahee
text: Beautiful floral arrangements at very reasonable prices. Friendly, accommodating staff. Nice assortment of gifts.

name: Cindy Gillani
text: Very nice place and staff

name: Lauren Pearson
text: Delivered our flowers to the wrong funeral home. Were even told by management of that place there was no funeral there... so instead of delivering to the correct place in a timely manner they just left them at the wrong place. Our flowers finally arrived toward the end of the visitation (because the OTHER funeral home handled the situation). Caused unnecessary stress for all of us. Did not offer refund, discount, nothing, for the delay in delivery (at least were apologetic though and Blamed the situation on the new person). On top of all this- Our flowers were the most green and leafy out of all of the arrangements so the quality wasn’t great for what we paid.

name: Andrea Beaton Mickaels
text: LaKays Floral in Dadeville is a wonderful spot for gifts and outstanding florals. The staff is always helpful and full of charm. Definitely a 5 star florist with a 5 star staff!!

name: Michael Beck
text: Great service and always ready to assist you in all your flower and gift needs.

name: Nae McCutcheon
text: They always get the job done. I've never had a disappointment.

name: Tim Prendergast
text: Bryanna could not possibly have been more helpful and the arrangement that she made was gorgeous. I found her online... I am in California and she is in Alabama and I cannot be happier. Amazing customer service and amazingly beautiful creations.  Thank you Bryanna.  Chris Mizeski

name: Lydia Herrick
text: Bryanna went above and beyond for our wedding on November 7th, 2020! We gave her a budget and she literally squeezed in everything she could with that budget. I really didn't know what I wanted and she ran with it. She was flexible, communicative, and positive throughout the whole experience. There were pieces and arrangements that I didn't even expect to be there that she had done. She is truly and artist and a professional! I cannot recommend her enough. Thank you Bryanna!

name: Madisen Cope
text: Bryanna is amazing! I don't know a lot about flowers so I gave her some general ideas I had saved off of Pinterest and the colors I wanted and let her do her thing. It was more beautiful than I ever could have imagined. Her prices are very reasonable and she was easy to work with throughout the planning process. I definitely recommend!

name: Stephanie Dameron
text: Our flowers were bright and colorful, just like I envisioned! We had a floral moongate as well as a cluster of floral hoops that hung from the ceiling. With all of the centerpieces, bouquets, flower crowns, and the two big showstoppers, Bryanna had her work cut out for her and executed it amazingly!

name: Michal Massey
text: 2 stars because the strawberries were good. What wasn’t were the flowers received. They were more dead than alive when picked up. Picked up from the store. They are already over  priced and then to look like this, never again. I will not be back for strawberries or flowers after this. Pictures will be added.

name: Tariq
text: My order couldn't be completed in the manner I ordered it, and it also couldn't be delivered either. All that considered, these guys are outstanding at heart. I got some seriously bad news while standing in the store, and the employee went out of his way to make sure that I received no more negativity while in that establishment. The order was emaculent.

name: TDB
text: Sad and pitiful. I'm embarrassed that these were delivered to a friend from me. Nothing like the pictures online. I visited the store to complain and she saw nothing wrong with them; however,  I did receive a refund.

name: Diana SSuarez
text: Terrible customer service. There was a delivery that should have been made on February 14, 2021. The delivery was never made. No one has called about the delay. I have tried to call multiple times and no one answers. When I check online for the status of the order it says that they are "preparing it". I am really baffled by the lack of communication and professionalism from this store.

name: Henry McElreath
text: I use the website to order.  It is easy and quick. There is a huge selection of fruits and candies.  They deliver when they say they will and my friends are always happy with their baskets.

name: Andrew Phelps
text: Do not rely on their delivery. I ordered for my wife's birthday to be delivered to her workplace. It finally just made it... as they've packed up for the day. Silly me, i thought ordering a week in advance would be enough time for them to figure out how to deliver to a business

resp.text: Andrew, we apologize. Our mission is to always deliver the best possible customer service experience and we’re so sorry we fell short. We want to make this right. Please send us your order information at orderteam@edible.com.

name: Ruth Dailey
text: Placed an order to be delivered on Thursday and 3 days later had not arrived. Nobody answer the phone!

name: Allison
text: They were not even PLANNING to deliver my "SAME DAY DELIVERY" order until TWO DAYS LATER and did not even reach out to let me know. No phone call, no email, nothing. I even paid extra to have same day delivery. What the heck?? I had to call them to find out what was going on. Worst. Customer. Service. EVER. Will never order from here again. WOW.

name: S D
text: Horrible customer service, specifically on 23 Feb 21.  I’m on military orders in DC.  Ordered VDay gifts for my mom and daughter.  They failed to deliver my order for VDay, understandably due to weather.  Spoke to them twice patiently thru the week.  Was told they could deliver it on 21 Feb.  never happened.  Called today and was told “we’re working on orders and calls from yesterday, we can work yours tomorrow.”  I ordered before yesterday...I called before yesterday.  Finally just requested a refund and the girl said done and hung up on me.  She failed to refund both my orders so I had to call back.  Outstanding customer service.

name: Chelsea E
text: Horrible customer service at the huntsville area!! My parents never received their arrangement after i placed the order well over two weeks ago! I was told by a staff member that it was on the way at 3pm and now (7pm) I've been on hold for the last twenty minutes trying to figure out where it is! after reading all of these reviews, im convinced there's a truck driver somewhere eating lots of delicious fruit and chocolate... Can I please just have a refund?

name: Ann West
text: Half of my daughters Birthday delivery (from her Military Sister )came apparently the chocolate dipped bananas weren’t ready and were supposed to be delivered before 4pm. They never delivered them and will not answer the phone ! I DO NOT APPRECIATE MY ARMY DAUGHTER THAT IS DEPLOYED AT THE MOMENT AND SENT HER SISTER A GIFT BEING CHARGED FOR ITEMS THAT WERE NOT DELIVERED! That’s theft !

name: David Carr
text: Ordered on 2 occasions, both orders incorrect. The cookies they sent this time looked like they had already been picked over by rats, and their phone is ALWAYS BUSY. same as last year. Never again.

name: Rose Marie
text: Excellent surprise and beautifully displayed!

name: M. Alexa
text:
My order was not delivered after the staff told me it would be. They ruined a surprise I planned for my son and his family. I called the store for a second time and they had closed. I am beyond disappointed and have left multiple messages asking for a refund.
Update: Eventually delivered the following day.

name: Jet Jones
text: The owner of this location is magnificent! He made sure my  Mother's Day order was correct, even with the high volume of orders,  wonderful customer service. Very polite, store very clean. 100% satisfied. Would definitely recommend this location.

name: Haley
text: I just ordered an early Mother’s Day edible arrangement two days ago. They called me when it was ready in case I wanted to pick it up early. When I got there, it looked great! They were extremely nice and gave me some ideas to keep the chocolate covered strawberries in good shape for my 15 min drive home in a hot car. I hadn’t even thought about that, so it was very nice for them to mention. I will be ordering from them again in the future.

name: Linda Bellamy
text: I usually call for special occasions for my husband. The arrangements are nicely done and it’s eaten within 3 days. Delivery is not always dependable, but the workers are courteous.

name: Collin Walker
text: Terrible customer service and my order was never delivered, they barely answer the phone and never reached out to me about my undelivered order.

name: B. Christine
text:
Update:  Feb 2, 2018

So after a year of not ordering an Edible Arrangement I decided to give them another try! This time I was blown away by the EXCELLENT service I received!!! The manager MARK is the epitome of a great manager with EXCELLENT customer service.  I had an arrangement scheduled to be delivered this morning 2/2/2018 to a business for an individual, but the individual decided not to go to work that day to my dismay. However, Mark said "No worries, we will send it out on Monday, don't let that upset you!"  He is such a great example of what managers should be!! I will support his store from here forward!

August 2016
I placed an order online fairly early in the day and the delivery was not made until very close to the time the recipient was getting off for the day. I was told it would be delivered between 1-3pm and I get a call a 330p stating it was just out for delivery! I don't understand why there is only 1 driver. The next time I'll just go pick it up myself to avoid such a terribly long delay in delivery!

name: Dana Edwards
text: Fruit was good but we did not receive all that we ordered. I paid over 100 dollars for a bouquet AND a box of chocolate dipped strawberries. Only the bouquet arrived. And they have not been answering their phone all day. Very disappointed.

name: Andrea “Dre” Mason
text: Terrible customer service when I called in to place an order on Valentine's day. The employee who answered was very unprofessional

name: Brian Moore (Armyballer)
text: Not a bad place, prices were a bit more than expected but I had no idea going in.  Fruit was amazing.

name: Austin Pifher
text: First arrangement was done ahead of schedule so I could pick up earlier in the day, fruit was fresh and delicious. Also I had a free voucher that had expired by a few days but the manager still honored it and had this arrangement done within the hour. Both positive experiences, definitely recommend this location!

name: Wabi Sabi
text:
The service and arrangement were great. I explained to the guy over the phone what i needed and he had the perfect "Get Well Soon" gift ready to go by the time i got there to pick it up.
[Full disclosure: I didn't give this location 5 stars because i was on hold for a bit longer than i cared to be.]

name: Elizabeth Vance
text: My daughter place an order for me of cover chocolate strawberries for Valentine’s Day pick up was 12:00 on the 14 got there at 12:30 the place was crazy and the people working didn’t know what was going on the order was not ready and said to come back because they were still working on orders for pick up at 9:30 really is 12:30 anyways came back at 4:00 pm waited another 30 minutes while there there was people in the back at least 10 doing nothing but talking one rude person in the front who had no customer service at all finally got my strawberries they were saggy and tasted old will not order go there or have anyone order there again

name: Susan Redwine
text: I received an arrangement of dark chocolate fruit on Sept 26, 2014. Everything was fresh and delicious!  And the balloon that came with the gift is still flying proud on Oct 15, 2014. I will use them every time I have to send a gift.  Fabulous!!!!

name: Linda Ridgeway
text: I HAD THE CHOCOLATE COVERED STRAWBERRIES TODAY AND THEY WERE THE BEST I EVER HAD! THANKS TO THE ENTIRE STAFF!

name: Jennifer Hodges
text: Highly pleased!  Walked in store wanting a quick edible arrangement made & a few other pieces for teacher appreciation gifts!  Service was made a with a smile in no time at all!!

name: Randolph Russell Jr.
text: Great customer service, product and location.  I'd recommend to everyone!

name: Jonathan Andrus
text:
Can I give zero stars? Poor delivery time, quality was poor, and to top it off items were missing from the arrangement. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION. $100 for a deflated balloon, sour strawberries, and missing items from the arrangement. A very disappointing Valentines.

Update: They refunded my money which was a pleasant surprise. I'm still not convinced I'd order from here again though.

name: William Brinkley (Ben)
text: They have very tasty and beautiful looking Arrangements. Pretty neat concept.

name: marquetta tatum
text: Mark, you are AWESOME! Thank you for your wonderful Customer Service! God bless you! :)

name: John Gray
text:
First, hand salute!!! The service was amazing, ordered same day delivery, took a look at fine print, and it clearly stated "delivery date and time not guaranteed, call store," so i called the store and was very impressed with service.

Second, the test...i ordered one from the university and whitesburg (neither knew), both same day, both same order, going to same address. Well, i am proud to say, make sure you order from whitesburg store. University did not have the same quality in fruit, even my 4 year old could tell, and some strawberries they shouldnt have used at all.

Thanks again Whitesburg store really enjoyed the arrangement and service.

name: Waldemar Ramirez
text: Bad experience. Made an order online to have it delivered on ST. Valentines day, did not happened. I called the store to ask about what happened, since I asked my wife about it and my wife said she did not received anything. So of course I am disappointed, I made the order , and hoping that while I was out of town, this would be delivered to her. No other details were offered to me, other than just " delivery was unsuccessful "... I know it was unsuccessful, duuhh!  So I asked for a complimentary delivery , the lady completely ignored my request and processed a refund. Which is ok, but you lost a client and possibly more than just me... I would not do no more business with edible arrangements , or at least with this store. Would not recommend you do any business with them.

name: Jessica White
text:
After ordering an arrangement for my mother and learning that she never received it on the intended date of delivery (Friday, Feb. 12), I called the store multiple times and was unable to reach them. After finally calling corporate I was told that the order would absolutely be ordered, likely by 9 PM (unacceptable in itself).
After it still went unreceived and I filed a formal complaint on Saturday, I was informed that they would likely be open that day due to the holiday weekend and my order would *probably* be delivered that day. Again, my delivery went unreceived.
Sunday, I called the store all day, always reaching a busy tone, but felt confident that the company would at the very LEAST deliver my order first thing that morning, despite it already being two days late. No such luck.
FINALLY today, three days after my intended delivery date, I was able to get ahold at someone at the store and let them know that I was displeased to say the least, and would like my order to still be delivered but would like the delivery fee refunded, as it did not arrive the day it should have. The person on the phone then said he cancelled my order completely (although I have yet to receive a refund), rang up another order, and charged my card AGAIN for the amount of the basket. By now, there has been $200+ worth of charges put on my card. But hey, they offered to give my mom a free box with 6 chocolate strawberries to make up for it.
After speaking with my mother, we decided to cancel the entire order and, YET AGAIN after not being able to get ahold of anyone at the store for several hours, I called corporate and asked to cancel my order and was informed not only did they have absolutely no record whatsoever of my 2nd purchase (even thought they were more than happy to charge my card earlier today), MY ORIGINAL ORDER HAD BEEN CANCELLED BY SOMEONE ON THE DAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE DELIVERED. I was informed that I should try to get in contact with someone at the store (as if it's so easy) and my complaints would be passed on to the manager. This experience was absolutely DEPLORABLE as far as customer service goes and I am extremely disappointed with the lack of effort to correct the situation.

name: Keith Richards
text: Super friendly and the driver was fantastic with delivering my wife's basket to work I was very pleased will be back for other occasions!!!! THUMBS UP

name: Vernon T. Mccants
text: Very very nice staff and made my 1st visit awesome. Make me want to buy everybody chocolate dipped strawberries.

name: Dawn Todd
text: Ordered on line to deliver on Dec 23..they never deliver the 90.00 arrangement when I called on Saturday they were closed...the customer service rep.. said iam sorry but there really nothing they can do other then refund the money...ok so they send us tons of offers via email and text ...but can not guarantee your order to be delivered...to me this is one of the worst stores there is they can not do the orders right ...will never order from them again ....as a retail manager...you want a happy customer they come back ...all I am reading on here is how poor service is this stores name...ordered Sherri berry's instead I know she will get it on time...

name: Sedohra Spears
text: This store is amazing and honor customer's birthdays.

name: Robert Smalley
text: Blown away with the delivery excuses.  Two days after the delivery date we get strawberries that are inedible

name: Francis Hughes
text: Wonderful, Friendly, pleasant atsmophere.

name: Kian vampire
text: Very Rude Employees

name: Southern Flavor 2 Seven Selma,Al
text: Wonderful

name: Bannhen's Southern Que BBQ
text: Horrible. Will never even Consider them again not even for 99.9% discount. Ruined my Anniversary/Valentine's Day 2017.

name: Krystle Duncan
text: I am so grateful for the ladies at Will & Dee's! I came in LAST MINUTE to order a corsage and boutonniere for prom the next day. I completely expected them to turn me away but I got the complete opposite. They happily took my order and assured me it was no big deal! PLUS the best part was it didn't cost me an arm and leg! I am BEYOND grateful and the product was absolutely beautiful!

name: Austin Barron
text: Ordered the heart and soul Deluxe and instead she received a very base arrangement of roses. Although they were pretty, I Will find a new flower shop next time.

name: Katelynn Frye
text: I ordered two bouquets online. They said they couldn't deliver to the address it was too far away. I understood and was just going to come and pick up the order myself. When I called to arrange this they said that I could but what I ordered online from their website they could not do. I had already placed this order and they said that they forgot to take it off the website and could not do it,because it was not a good price and they would have to charge more.. They did offer something else but no where close to what I had chosen. Poor service you cannot have something online and then not honor the order.

name: Toni Taylor
text: Awful!! I ordered through 1800flowers for my mother in law. A big pretty bouquet of fall colors called sweet citrus.....,what she got was a small purple one. I called and 1800flowers said it would be made right, a proper order delivered on Monday, that did not happen....,delivery not till Tues then THEY TOOK BACK THE FIRST ORDER!  State they have to to see the mistake, BULL! The one they did bring was at least right colors and a bit bigger but still poor quality overall. I called and the lady was rude! She said as far as they were concerned it looked like the order pic ( truly wish I could post pics...,,you would laugh. Then said they would just go get it back and refund me.....,,I told her no way, leave it alone. I called 1800flowers again and they refunded me with a promise to leave the flowers. I emailed them pics. Very dissatisfied with this store

name: Olivia Nicke
text: Very disappointed. I ordered the largest (premium) of the cotton candy floral arrangement for my mother. It was delivered on time, but the arrangement did not look like the picture online. I did not feel that I got my money's worth for this arrangement as far as aesthetics goes (which is the main purpose of a flower arrangement). I could have gone to Kroger or Costco and bought an arrangement for 1/2 the value I paid to this company. Although the employees were polite when I called with my complaints, they did not offer to discount or refund me. I will not use this company again.

name: Amanda McFall
text: I placed the order through the funeral home website instead of going in person to the store. The florist did not have the flowers available that I selected. When the florist called me she was very nice in explaining the situation and was understanding of the hard time I was going through from losing my grandmother. She made the absolute best of a bad situation. The flowers she selected are beautiful and fresh. I highly recommend.

name: Michele Garrard
text: I ordered flowers for my Mother in law and they were beautiful. Thank you for a good experience

name: Pam Knight
text: Did a wonderful job on my mother's funeral arrangement. Highly recommend.

name: Lynne Methvin
text: What I ordered online looks absolutely nothing like the picture. So disappointed!! Also, The last time I ordered they delivered the arrangement on the wrong date.

name: Meletha Payton
text: The Angel with flowers was beautiful. My siblings and I ordered it for our sisters funeral to give to our niece.  Thank you

name: Melissa Robertson
text: April at Will & Dee's is so helpful and personable. I called from out of town and she spent time helping me and making sure everything was perfect.

name: Rudy Moser
text: April did an anniversary arrangement for my wife and did a spectacular job!  My wife absolutely loved them!  You now have a customer for life!!

name: Richard Richey
text: Great place to purchase flowers for any occasion

name: Ludmila Frazier
text: I can't express with words how well Will & Dee's Florist conveyed the love I felt for my Mom during our shared time of loss with this arrangement. They far exceeded my expectations with a masterpiece that was 200% more beautiful than the picture! So much so I have since ordered a second bouquet. This florist is in my heart and now family Forever. Thank you!

name: Singing River Media
text: I called from out of town the day prior to my aunt's funeral and was very happy with the customer service and guidance in price points along with the choices in flowers and presentation. My family said they were beautiful and stood out from the rest. Highly recommended. Thanks!

name: Kristen Blaylock
text: Won't deliver to the hospital because they are scared of the flu. Order from Dean's if you want to send flowers to sick loved ones. Apparently, they have studied up on how to avoid germs. I'm giving two stars instead of one because the woman on the phone seemed nice, although uninformed on the spread of contagions.

name: Robyn Howard
text: We had Will & Dee's do a casket spray when my grandmother passed. The lady who assisted us was polite, especially during this tough time, and was extremely knowledgeable about the flowers. They were beautiful and were reasonably priced. I definitely recommend this florist and I am sure they could handle anything you might need.

name: Lisa W
text: My husband ordered flowers to surprise me. They ruined the surprise by calling me instead of him. The flowers were not what he ordered. They were not what the picture showed. It was supposed to be a full bouquet and it was flowers placed here and there. For the price, the quality of care that was put into it was not there. He made a complaint and they said they would fix it and deliver a new bouqet. It never came. Unfortunately we won't be using them ever.

name: Cynette Horn
text:
I hear great things about Will & Dee's. Because April works there and she and I are good friends.
I pray for her and I will start praying all who works there also.
Here's hoping each of you have a great day and be blessed!

name: Megan Hall
text: Really wonderful customer service.

name: Terr Barwick
text: I ordered a Teleflora Christmas bouquet for s relative. I was so embarrassed when I saw it. It looked NOTHING like the Teleflora bouquet. If it had been attractive I might not mind. But this was very messy and down right ugly. I complained and they remade it. It was better, but still didn’t look like the Teleflora boquet. Don’t florists agree to use the same materials and make their Teleflora orders to match Teleflora photos??! I won’t use them again.

name: Arlon Jay Staggs
text: Will & Dees always takes care of me when I need them! Sometimes I have been in a pinch and have forgotten to send flowers when I needed to, and they really saved me by working over time to get my order delivered...and always beautiful arrangements! THANKS SO MUCH, WILL & DEES!!

name: hartrw85
text: Ordered Heart and soul flowers for 13th anniversary. The flowers I got were not anything like what I ordered. Don't think I will ever use this florist again.

name: Karen Kennedy
text: Will and Dee's Florist is the premier florist for the Shoals.  They provide the best customer service and quality of flowers for every occasion. They are my "go to florist."

name: Barbara Tubbs Hill
text: I never buy flowers anywhere but Will & Dee's.  I can always count on quality and excellent service!

name: Linda R. Day
text: Great florist, have always been pleased with the arrangements

name: Lyndsey Borden

text: Beautiful flowers

name: ashley goodman

name: David Robertson
text: We visited Dukes Barber Shop. It's attached to the florist. Duke is awesome. Very fast and efficient. And inexpensive. Does a great job every time.

resp.text: Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Amanda.

text: They did a great job today creating a birthday arrangement for my mother in law and delivering it to her. It made her day. Thank you ladies.

name: Ramona Upton

name: Betty Stephens
text: They did such a great job on flowers I ordered . It's like they read my  mind . Couldn't have asked for any better . Thanks so much

name: Pam Rodgers
text: They always do a great job on anything we get

text: Just ordered over the phone from Florida and I didn’t get the girl’s name but she was very helpful with my order. Never got flowers for a funeral and she left an impression.

name: Louiese Nelms

name: ANGELA WORD
text: I had to get a basket, very last minute, for my grandmother's funeral. They had a large assortment of gorgeous plant baskets, at every price point, and were so kind in helping me find what I needed! I highly recommend Gaines Florist!

name: Carrie Schaefer
text: Did Awesome  on prom bouquet

name: Tami Buchanan
text: They have great customer service. They treat you like you are part of their family, and help you through  your time of need. They have reasonable prices on all of flowers and other products. Thanks everyone. They also have delivery.

name: Frances Mendoza
text: Really like there selections.

name: john blumenfeld
text: Very unprofessional. I drove from Atlanta Ga. To buy from them for a funeral. I showed them what I wanted. They said it would be 3-4 hundred dollars. I said ok. They they would do it like this, I said I want it like this. They said well this is the way we do it. I said ok that's not what I want. And left. They lost a 400.00 order

name: Dalton Gillilan
text: Ordered flowers for my wife for Valentine's day to be delivered to work. They said it would be no problem. Needless to say, the flowers were never delivered. Obviously, her surprise was completely ruined. They never called to let me know anything. I was charged $40 and the delivery was never made. Hopefully I can get my money back. I'll never use them again.

name: David Stamps
text: Wunderful

name: Enrique Gomez
text: My experience was wonderful...... first time that I was really amazed at such attention given to such a small purchase........ made me feel like I was spending a million dollar in there. I know now just where I will go for anything having to do with a florist.

text: Kelly was so kind and helpful.  Flowers were beautiful. They always do such a great job.

name: Todd Hopper
text: First time customer,  I  read some reviews and decided that  I  would give Gaines a try and  I  am extremely  pleased  with the results,  I will definitely be returning to  do further business

name: Taryn Horton
text: They made my daughters prom flowers at the last minute and they were gorgeous.

name: Jael Sanchez M
text: It was the day of the wedding and my friend did not have a bouquet .. We went in and they were able to make her one that same day.. it was beautiful!! thanks so much!! Out of real flowers n!

name: Jimmy Threet

name: Foodies Austin
text: Ordered birthday flowers this morning, and I received a call that a beautiful arrangement of white lilies and large, deep crimson roses arrived by 11:00.  My mother said they had a  luxurious look and that the arrangement weighed a ton.  LOL.  I'm glad she's happy on her 86th birthday.  Thank you Gaines Florist.

text: This florist dropped the ball this Valentine's was told to put 6 roses tightly together with very little baby breath ,,received roses couldn't even fine the roses for so much baby breath ,,,UGH WAS NOT VERY PRETTY  i rate it a zero on Valentine's, i have been using them for years guess not anymore

name: Donny Tanner
text: Wonderful people

name: Kala Kilpatrick
text: Best florist around!

name: Deborah & Leroy Lawrence
text:
I would like to give a shout out to The Hub Florest in Robertsdale, AL.
Over the years I have used them to send flowers and have always received glowing compliments from the recipients. However, I personally have never received an arrangement from them until this past weekend. The cut flower arrangement I received was the most beautiful I have ever seen. It was full of fresh local flowers as well as many different types of roses. I think it was called The Country Bouquet. Anyway, if you should want to send flowers. I highly recommend The Hub Florest in Robertsdale. They do a beautiful job.😊

name: Elisha Hodge
text: You can tell the years of professionalism from the moment you call. Such great service, and willingness to make their customers happy! Thank you for spreading love with flowers! <3

name: john davidson
text:
Grt job on the spray for my friends funeral
Very caring and willing to make everything just the way I wanted at no extra charge
Sincerely cared and even let me know when delivery was made to funeral home
They are the Best and get the job done
Call them for all of your floral needs

name: Mike Welsh
text: I recently ordered an arrangement for a close friend/Co-worker that lives in Robertsdale. I am not from this area and not familiar with it at all. I started looking for a florist to use and I am glad I chose Hub City. Even though the arrangement I chose required a substitution it was perfect. Arguably even better looking. They called me to let me know about the change and made sure I was fine with it, and she was very nice. I have to say they did an excellent job and I really appreciate that. This put a smile on my co-workers face during her time of grief. Thank you very much. I would definitely encourage anyone that may be looking for a florist, and like me, not from the area, Hub City is who I would highly recommend. Beautiful arrangement, great service, on-time delivery, great prices. Thank you again.

name: Greg Thomas
text: Orders my wife an arrangement with lillies. It was delivered on time and absolutely beautiful! Thank you so much!

name: Deborah Sapp
text: The ladies at hub city florist are always fantastic. I have a flower shop and Pensacola and any time any flowers delivered for one of my customers in the Robertsdale area they take very good care of them. Thanks so much I appreciate you all

name: Stacy Homan
text:
4 times my orders have been wrong.  Delivered on the wrong day, forgotten to be delivered, and twice flower arrangements looked nothing like the pictures.  The flowers were "arranged" They just put into a vase, not made to look round and full like the pictures.   I am hugely disappointed, not at all worth the money I spent on them.    I have pictures comparing the flowers that were delivered to what I ordered, but I don't see an option on how to post it.
I DO NOT Recommend Hub City Florist.

name: Brenda Donaldson
text: Arrangement ordered online wasn't what was received.  Ordered for the gorgeous blue glass vase as noted in the "Beautiful in Blue" arrangement.  Came in clear glass vase and assortment of flowers were different.

name: •Digital• Babbu
text: Always get flowers for my high schooler's dances. Friendly staff and always happy with flowers.

name: 618wesley
text: The flowers I  ordered online are not the flowers that were delivered.  The arrangement was smaller than the one from online. It does not matter that the flowers are different the arrangement was smaller For what I paid for.

name: Mickey lee
text: Great little shop

name: Samantha Hedrick
text: I just wanted to say you guys did an amazing job going out of y’all’s way to send my mom flowers for her birthday today I really appreciate everything and so nice as well!

name: Robert Corbie
text: Went there to find a plant/flower for a funeral....staff were friendly and helpful....unfortunately only the person assisting us was wearing a mask. Overall it was a pleasant interaction.

name: Rhonda Allen
text: I can always rely on Petals and Stems to deliver beautiful fresh flowers when I can't be in town to deliver them myself. Nice to know that I can always count on their quality, design taste and fast delivery.

name: Jodie Bilbrey
text: I found this shop through a search of florists near my intended recipient.  They delivered a beautiful arrangement very quickly for a nominal fee.  Very appreciative!  Highly recommend their services.   Thank you very much!

name: Matt Clayton
text:
Highly recommend!! Extremely professional, timely, reasonably priced and friendly!! Thank you!

Purchased a fresh cut arrangement and had it delivered in an hour.

name: Donna Minor
text: Very helpful always a beautiful flowers

name: Tammy Smothers
text: Burke's always  exceed our expectations. They are always a pleasure to do business with. I highly recommend them for your floral needs.

name: Tilda Marie
text: Best place to get flowers!  We came in last minute and got a beautiful bouquet together for my daughter!  I will always come back here.

name: TS
text: Awesome folks to deal with! Give them a price range, a general idea of what you want and where the arrangement needs to go and it gets handled. Couldn’t ask for better service!

name: Cynthia Harris
text: I live five states away from my mother, so frequently send flowers for things like Mother's Day and Valentine's Day. Burke's Florist was the one I finally settled on after trying a few things. They consistently create a beautiful arrangement, and very affordable. Working with them on the phone, they are warm and personable, and always have good ideas to share for what might be nice. They have created a permanent customer in me! I recommend them highly.

name: Christie Estes
text: I am in Birmingham and needed to send flowers to a co-worker at CRMC. The lady I spoke with on the phone was so nice and helpful. I requested something cheerful and bright. The flowers were delivered the same day and they were absolutely gorgeous. Very reasonable prices and fair delivery charge. I needed a copy of the receipt and it was emailed over to me immediately. Wonderful experience. Very pleased!

name: Ricky Pannell
text: Ladies here were very friendly and helpful, made a beautiful arrangement for my wife for our anniversary. I would highly recommend.

name: Michael Marsh
text: Super nice staff! Very excited about helping their customers. Will definitely return whenever the occasion comes! Definitely recommend

name: Madi Claire Huddleston
text: Burkes did all the bouquets, boutonnieres and corsages for our wedding and everything was beautiful! We showed her pictures of what we wanted and she did a wonderful job on capturing what we pictured. Definitely deserves 5 stars!

name: Allyson Kilgo
text: I can't express mine and my family's appreciation to April , Alena and Julie and the rest of the staff at Burkes florist. They for an awesome job on my dad's flower arrangements for his funeral but not only that but every time we put flowers on his grave. They are so caring and helpful in helping us pick out exactly what he would have wanted. I would never use anyone but them. They are great at working within your budget and I couldn't ask for better people!!! We absolutely love each of them like our own family!!

name: Robert Brantley
text: Great people and wonderful service !

name: Joey Dee

name: C BrazeltonCox
text: I had the best customer experience with The Bliss Atelier. Christie was an absolute sweetheart and exceptionally helpful, as I had ordered my wedding bouquet and boutonniere from Seattle. I wanted Iceland Poppies but due to its seasonal availability Christie recommended the Anemone -- a very similar and beautiful flower. I was beyond thrilled with her talent. She understood and delivered exactly what I wanted. I highly recommend The Bliss Atelier.

resp.text: Carol, you are the sweetest! :) It was absolutely my pleasure and I’m so happy that I could make your special day just a bit more special!! Best Wishes and much love to you guys as you begin this new chapter of your lives together! Thank you for the loving support!! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Jody spann
text: On our anniversary, I was browsing bouquets of flowers available online and found an arrangement I knew my wife would love, but the florist couldn’t make it, since they didn’t have roses in house. I called Christie and she said to send the photo, and she would be able to arrange something. Well let me tell you this girls got talent! She was super friendly, more than courteous, arranged a knockout 💐 bouquet that stunned all the ladies at my wife’s work, and made my wife happy. What more could a man ask for? Thanks a million Christie, we both loved it and will recommend your store and we’ll be back in the future.

resp.text: Thanks so much William!!! Don’t know how I missed this, but none the less appreciate your review and can’t wait to create something else beautiful for you guys!!! God bless!!

name: Kassi
text: What a wonderful shop! The owner was amazing. The best florist around. She made my sister an absolutely beautiful arrangement. I live 3 hours away and cannot get flowers like these or great service. I'll be purchasing again! Thank you

resp.text: Thanks so much Kassi!!! I enjoyed talking with you yesterday and am so happy y’all loved your flowers!! Much love to you and your sweet family!!

name: Michael Kidwell
text: Christie does an amazing job and works hard to make sure her clients are happy. Greta selection and an eye for detail.

name: Kelsey Trawick
text:
Today I ordered online, I haven’t ever done business with The Bliss Atelier or Christy but today I’m glad I did! My best friend is a awesome mom and friend and I wanted to get her some Just because flowers. I ordered online, and then realized I forgot to put in the note tab my name after the actual note I wanted to be left with the card. I called and got voicemail and just left a message to leave it. Fast forward, when my Friend got her flowers, Christy texted me immediately and told me they were delivered and she loved them! I was so surprised that she went out of her way to do that. Her hospitality is like a breath of fresh air. She also made sure she put from me on the name card, and the MOST IMPORTANT thing was the actual flower bouquet. It was way bigger, better quality, and WAY prettier then the actual picture online I first picked. Above and beyond what I expected. They are super affordable, I actually priced checked every flower shop online in Dothan because I’m a single mom and I definitely have a budget lol  and they were the cheapest. I’d FOR SURE recommend this business to any and everyone with any kind of flower and/or gift ideas and needs! Christy is so sweet an it was a pleasure doing business with them!!!!!!
PS: If you read this Christy I know I’m spelling your name wrong, my bad lol

text: These folks are amazing! They always have everything I need for every occasion. I would recommend this place to everyone.

I just told the lady on the phone a fresh cut and when my daughter sent me a picture, they were gorgeous! I highly recommend this shop!

name: V T (YogiBearMom)
text: I finally found my dream SUPREME SWEET PICKLE with or without heat from Bloom and Petal. It is crisp, thick cut and takes 14 days to prepare to perfection. You will NOT be sorry you chose this delicacy from the pickle world! I was a bit concerned to order that many glass jars from another state, however Vince and Aimee did an amazing job of packaging and delivery was swift and flawless! They are an absolute joy to work with and even helped me with ordering more to stock up with in the future. If only more business were so helpful and eager to assist their customers in their guilty pleasures of such a delicious pickle! Thank you so much you two for laughing with me instead of at me! ❤  More business definitely to come with this phenomenal place in good ole' Alabama...GIVE these phenomenal PERFECT PICKLES from Bloom and Petal A TRY!!!👍👍

resp.text: Thank you so much!

text: Absolutely beautiful! Ordered these for a coworker's birthday. Ordered them through the online process and it was efficient and easy. The person that answered was super helpful and nice. She told the the delivery driver was out with our delivery, but she would make sure she got in touch with him to give our instructions. The delivery was made in the right amount of time and our coworker was so excited. The bouquet is gorgeous, the flowers look vibrant and fresh! Absolutely recommend Bloom & Petal and will definitely use them in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating!

My husband has surprised me with a number of arrangements created by Rococo. Fresh flowers to succulent arrangements,it's always made my day and filled my home with happy!
When we planned our wedding, I knew I HAD to ask Lori to make the bouquets, boutanners and hair pieces. They were more beautiful and perfect than I could have ever dreamed! Thank you for decorating my special day!
If you haven't visited Rococo Floral Studio, what are you waiting on?? Go now! ☺️💓

text: Totally over priced and they put some ugly add on leaves in my 2 dozen  Rose's  that dont even belong with Rose's because they think it looks good and to top it off  they touched every rose they put in the vase and they were  wilting and turning black 5 and a half hrs later shop somewhere else. On top of everything else they gave me diseased,black spots, eaten leavrs, moldy, bug eaten Rose's, babys breath, and eucalyptus tree leaves for $110.00.  I only asked for Rose's and babys breath. Didn't know they used trees. They was not even cut right

resp.text: So sorry to hear you were unhappy ,can you call and give us some info about your order we would love to make it right --these are all pics of the rose foliage and we do use eucalyptus in our rose arrangements as it goes nice with roses -- perhaps we can use something different in your if you prefer, we stand behind our work and if you contact us so we can locate your order we will be happy to correct it !!  We have been in business since 1985 and offer quality guarantees on all our orders if notified . Look forward to speaking with you.

name: Sean Rya
text: Absolutely love the flowers they did for my wife! Will definitely use again! So pretty!

name: joe rogan
text: Delivery was late. I ordered flowers for an anniversary. I called the shop to ask if my order could be the first to be delivered and was told it wouldn’t be a problem and the order would be the first to go out. By the time the flowers were delivered my girlfriend had already left for the day. Thanks for the awesome flower on our anniversary. Just use a different shop with better more reliable customer service and save yourself from ending up like I did.

resp.text:
Joe, we’re sorry that you feel the way you do, but we always strive to provide a positive experience for our customers.
We delivered the order two hours after ordered without being given a deadline at time of order.
We understand that mistakes happen, but we take pride in our customer service.
That being said, please feel free to reach out to us directly, flowercart@bellsouth.net, so that we may address your concerns directly and resolve the situation in a productive manner.
Thank you for your time and we look forward to hearing from you!

name: Ben Wheeler
text: Called in to order Valentine's Day lillies for my girlfriend and daughter, was quoted $115 for a dozen flowers delivered. It was short notice (2 days) and a holiday so I figured it was the price I would have to pay. Waited all day for delivery and nothing showed. Contacted the store the next business day, spoke to the owner who said they had no record of my purchase. She also said that the price I was quoted was not right and that there was no way I called her store, even though I verified the phone number and knew that the lady that took my order had a distinct accent. In fairness, she did offer to send something at a discount, but day late flowers don't really cut it. If I had read the reviews before calling, I would have seen this coming. Never again.

text: Not very happy with this business I looked on their website at an arrangement of flowers and it advertise them at $39 I had called to place the order and she said that she couldn't do it for $39 it would be $68! She said that price was from different vendors even though it was on their website!  That really aggravated me she asked me when I wanted them delivered I said that afternoon or first thing the next morning she told me they wouldn't be able to do it that afternoon because they close at 12 I said OK I would like them to be delivered first thing the next morning!  I called the next morning to see when they would be delivered at 9 o'clock when they opened up they haven't even started on the arrangement and told me it would be around 12 o'clock when it was delivered even though they said it would be delivered first thing that morning! I will not be doing business with this place ever again!!!!  And I will make sure if anyone asks not to use them they do not honor their prices on their website and they do not honor what they say!!!

name: Kent Whitaker
text:
THANK YOU MELISSA AND VIRGINIA's FLOWERS! After a horrible time last year ordering with the Auburn/Opelika Edible Arrangements my wife Ally and I decided to go with Virginia's flowers this year. We are in Chattanooga and my mother in-law is in Opelika.

I called while viewing the website and the nice lady walked me through a few ideas for Valentines Day arrangements. I ordered an arrangement and fruit basket instead of roses because both my wife and her mom have told me that they love fresh cut spring flowers.

After lasts years disaster with Edible I was a bit worried when I came home from work and my wife said she had talked to her mom and that she had not mentioned anything special. We were instantly concerned that the bad experience with "edible" was being repeated.

I called and Melissa said she was sure that mom's order was on the truck as she "remembered the name." As I was hanging up my wife's phone rang and it was my mother-in-law calling to say that she had just been delivered the... - actual quotes - "most beautiful flower arrangement ever" and "the biggest - and fresh fruit basket she had ever seen!". Those are actual quotes!

I called Melissa back to thank her and she could hear my wife and mother-in-law talking on the phone in the background. Thank you Melissa, and your crew, for erasing a horrible memory from last year and making a brand new one filled with love!

Melissa and Virginia's Flowers is now our official Opelika and Auburn florist for the Whitaker Family!

resp.text: You are so welcome. I'm so happy she loves them!!!

text: My BFF was in the hospital in opelika (I live out of town) found virginia's on Google and so glad I did!  Can't tell you anything about the shop because I ordered online but the flowers were reasonably priced,  delivery charge was good and the arrangement was beautiful! She sent me a pic when she received them and they were exactly like pictured. ... would definately order from virginia's again!

name: T P
text:
I was super excited to book The Lily Pad Florist for my wedding. I met with Shannon and went over my colors and thoughts of what I was looking for. At the time I met with her, I was told to send her ideas anytime via cell phone and we had plenty of time to come up with the arrangements as the wedding was several months out.

However, the service has not been what I expected as a paying client. I made a change and asked for an updated quote. It took me a week and a half to get the quote after I was told I would have it in two days and then had to request it multiple times. Again, still several months out from the wedding. I decided to make one more change and asked for an updated quote. Instead of being told that she wasn't in the office and she would get it to me, she tells me to add the additional charge to the existing quote which is should have ultimately been less. When I questioned this, I received this response, "Honey, my store hasn't even opened. I'm not sitting in my office at the moment. I have no clue, I have a lot of weddings and you keep changing everything, so bear with me." Needless, to say as the paying client, I was extremely shocked. At this point, I decided to cancel her service. I then received this response, "I'm sorry you took it the wrong way, that's a shame."

I have been in customer service for many years and that is not the response you give a paying client. I would have completely understood had she told me that she wasn't in the office and she would have my updated quote by a given time. As the bride, I want the wedding day to be perfect and I feel like changing my mind twice is not that big of a deal, given the fact that again we still have several months until the wedding.

text: Worst customer service ever. I live out of state and for my sisters 16th birthday we wanted to do something special for her so we decided to have an edible arrangement with balloons delivered to her high school. 72$ later they didn't deliver the balloons and when I called to get a refund for the balloons a man named Bryant answered the phone. Outstanding response sir. Needless to say I told them my fiancé would call them with the card information. When he called the owner answered and again was not very sympathetic to the situation. He decided a refund wouldn't matter since the surprise for her birthday was ruined anyways. She had the balloons delivered the next day that we paid for already and a box of 6 complementary strawberries sent with it. At the end of the day if someone in this business would have ACTED like they cared that their business took away from what should have been a special sweet 16th birthday delivery I wouldn't have such a bad taste in my mouth for this company.

name: Michele Coco
text: The customer service at this franchise is HORRIBLE. the manager, Rebecca, had a horrible attitude, as did the delivery driver,  and made what was supposed to be an awesome gift a pain to receive.  I almost called back to tell them to cancel the delivery entirely and to credit the person who sent me the gift.  I was not home for the initial delivery at noon on Wednesday. I was left a message on my cell phone by the delivery man to call the store to reschedule. I called, was placed on hold and then REbecca picked up giving me some stupid line of, "They are a very busy company and cannot schedule a delivery in  set period of time." I then proceeded to ask her if I was supposed to wait here all day to receive my bouquet. She said no, I could come pick it up. They would try to make sure the bouquet was at the store when I arrived. So, wait?  You can't get it to me in a 2 ot 4 hour time period and then you will try to have it there, all the way across town, should I happen to show up?  WHAT?  How is it that FedEx, UPS and even the USPS can deliver things nationwide but this little mom/pop business that serves the Birmingham metro (population 1.5million) cannot get it together to deliver a bouquet in a 2 to 4 hour time slot?  PATHETIC.

name: Donna Rush
text: Terrible customer service! The owner argued with my mother over a very inconsequential detail, the name of the spray/blanket for my fathers funeral. He had zero empathy or sympathy with her and acted as if we were bothering him over what would be a $350-$400 order. Clearly we went elsewhere for our spray/blanket or whatever he is calling it this year.

resp.text:
I never argued with your mother. While I was showing you and her the samples of my casket sprays for your father’s funeral, she indicated that she didn’t think I was showing her the correct products, that she wanted a “blanket”.  I responded by telling her that florists do not call them “blankets” any longer, as that is an old term from the middle of the last century, when they used to sew  flowers onto a piece of heavy fabric and then draped it across the casket. She even stated that “blanket” is what her mother called them, which would be correct for that generation. I wanted to make sure that she understood the difference so we were all on the same page. I was rather limited in what I had in stock and I told you what I could offer you.  You made the choice to see what else another shop could provide, to which I said I completely understood.

I have learned that using correct terminology and making sure that everyone involved is thinking the same thing is in everyone’s best interest.  I’m so incredibly sorry if you took offense to that, but in my opinion it was a necessary conversation.

name: Gina Bonge
text: I’m from out of town, but use House of Flowers at every opportunity! Their service is impeccable and the arrangements are stunning! I wouldn’t use anyone else, and have been using them for years.

text: I called James (owner) at 8:30am and asked him to prepare an arrangement for a funeral service at 3:00pm the same day. He explained what he had available and what he could do in the time period he had and assured me everything would be taken care of. In a time like this, being able to have someone take care of things for you with kindness was much appreciated. I’ll be using The Flower Shop again and recommending it to others!

name: Johnny Carcioppolo
text: I learned a long time ago to trust the EXPERTS when it comes to having something done right. Jerry at Bishop's Flowers is the Expert when it comes to anything related to flowers and plants. When you need anything from a corsage to planning the arrangements for a wedding you really need to go to Bishops Flowers and talk to Jerry. His years of experience in the industry is evident in everything he creates. He has a keen way of listening to what you want and delivering something that is so much better than you could have hoped for. Maybe you are looking for something unique and special for Valentines Day, or you are planning a wedding and have a vision of what the bouquet will look like and what arrangements you want for the ceremony. Don't trust just anyone to make that vision a reality, trust the Experts. Jerry will listen and take your ideas and deliver something that will blow you away. How about service after the sale. Bring your bouquet back to Jerry and let him heirloom it for you and turn it into something you will have forever to remember that special day. Bishop's is not your ordinary florist, they don't just sell you something and move on to the next client. Jerry will also educate you on the best way to care for your new creation so it lasts longer than you would ever think possible. He will make sure you know what your flower arrangement needs to stay as beautiful as it is when you pick it up for the longest amount of time. He will make sure you know exactly how to care for the plant you bought so it will thrive. So no matter what your needs are in flowers or plants make sure you give Bishops Flowers a chance to impress you and you will never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for your review...so nice of you!

name: Andre Cota-Robles
text: The flowers were beautiful and stayed beautiful for six days.

resp.text: We are so glad you were happy with your flowers. Thank you so much for helping our business grow by leaving us  a review.
