Thank you, Jerry, for creating a focal point for the holidays and making me the envy of my friends and family!

resp.text: So glad you enjoyed it...

name: J.M. Froman
text:
I thought people in the South were supposed to be friendly. I walked into this shop looking for some flowers and hoping for a delivery. I even offered to pay more than asking price for a delivery. The delivery really wasn't so much of a concern as it was getting an arrangement that I was happy with and would be meaningful for the person that I was sending them to.

From the moment I walked in I was made very aware that they were about to close. Since I knew the flowers I wanted and they had them that made quick work of that portion. Being that I'm not a florist and I am a male I don't know all the things that make up a floral design, but I do know what looks pretty.  I was asked if I had a budget,  To which I replied not necessarily I just want something that looks pretty. The owner said how about a $100.00 and I said OK fine.

While he was putting together the arrangement I asked if perhaps they gave any discounts to military service members to which he replied no. I continued to ask if they gave discounts to various other organizations that I belong to such as the Chamber of Commerce and others to which he replied in emphatically "NO". Now, at this point I was really just trying to make friendly conversation so I made a couple of friendly jokes about not having discounts, on which he became irate and said he was about to refund me my money and take back the arrangement.

I just find it appalling that people can be so rude and have no sense of friendliness or humor whatsoever, especially in the time and day we live in where businesses are hurting to make money and I'm spending my hard earned money there.

He even went so far as to ask if I gave discounts in my business. I told him that in fact yes I do, all of the time. I wasn't really looking for a whole lot, 10% or something close to match an online competitors price which happened to be about $20 less. I don't know why it was unreasonable to ask for a small discount to show a little appreciation to any local organizations I belong to, much less for service to this country. I was appalled by his short and rude tone, especially after he told me he was the head of North Alabama BNI. You would think someone in this position would know how to run a business with not only some poise but also some friendly customer service. As long as I am a resident here I will never spend another dollar in this establishment and I'm not telling anyone not to do so, but I will say that if you spend money there, no appreciation is given for it and I might encourage you to find some other businesses that may appreciate it a little bit more.

name: Amanda Champion
text: Bishop's partners, Leigh and Jerry, are a great choice for someone who doesn't have opinions about what they want. The experience with Bishops started out ideal, but the more involved my vision became the less comfortable I felt with the florist. Just over thirty days out I received the itemized breakdown where the wrong color roses were ordered. A week prior Leigh suggested changing the color which I agreed to, but then the previous color was ordered. My husband spoke to them about it and Jerry was not the most friendly. My husband was told that their mistake almost cost us $500 and that he should tell me to stay off Pinterest. Then on our wedding day everything was set up promptly. The free tossing bouquet I should have received for signing a contract within two weeks of the initial consultation was not delivered. Luckily one of my bridesmaids couldn't take hers with her to Colorado. The vision came together mostly in the end. The flowers were gorgeous. I was satisfied with most of the arrangements, but the collaborative process was stressful. Mostly because the communication between the partners is lacking.

name: silent h
text: Every time I get flowers for my girlfriend these guys take such good care of me. I brought in a vase I made my girlfriend for valentines days and they picked out everything for me, making a custom combination to fit and match my vase. Every one there is so nice. Would recommend to anyone. So much better they grocery store bouquets!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review. Glad you trusted us to be a part of such a special day for you and your girlfriend.

name: Mollie Brown
text: The people who work here are GREAT. I came in with a vague description of some eucalyptus I was searching for and the super nice employees helped me figure out which type I needed and even ordered it for me so I wouldn't have to run all over town trying to find it. When it arrived they let me know by calling which was super convenient. Since it was just a simple thing I wasn't expecting it to be fancy or anything, but they took the time to wrap it and make it look nice even though they didn't have to. Great local place that takes time to make your experience enjoyable and easy. Definitely coming back when this eucalyptus finally dries out. Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you for your feedback Mollie. Enjoy the eucalyptus!
Jerry

name: George Droukas (tvtechparts)
text:
Great service, very happy with the flowers and delivered on time.
Thanks

name: Carla McCabe
text: Beautiful flowers and amazing service!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us deliver a smile!

name: aangelinaabv
text: Highly satisfied FIRST OF ALL with THE FRIENDLY SERVICE , promptness, kindness of the employees and the arrangement was gorgeous and fairly priced.

resp.text: Thank you so much. I am happy we could help and make you smile!!

name: Jan Jeanneret
text: The staff at Bishop Flowers are all top notch! Friendly and professional! I cannot wait to go in again!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Theresa Chivers
text: I had Bishops do the floral arrangements for my daughter's wedding. They did an awesome job. They suggested flowers that lasted in the awful heat and were very colorful and beautiful. I highly recommend them. They are willing to work with you and try very hard to make your order wonderful. They decorated a trellis for the ceremony and even used material we had an in-law cut down. The corsages didn't break like my son's flowers did and the boutonnières lasted all night! Again I would not hesitate to use them for any of my floral needs! They are top notch.

resp.text: The most you so much for you review. So glad you were happy.

name: Ashley Linares
text: We searched high and low for the right florist for our wedding and Bishop's had the most beautiful arrangements at the lowest cost.  And it turned out beautifully!  Their services truly are a real value.  Since then, we have used Bishop's for funerals, family members in the hospital, dance recitals, and just because.  Thank you for always taking good care of us - no matter what the occasion!

name: Meaghan Chitwood
text: Bishop's Flowers has never let me down. I have received bouquets for special occasions that have taken my breath away. Most recently, they did my grandfather's funeral casket cover and flowers. I didn't realize people noticed flowers at a funeral until my family was getting compliments over and over again. Every time I have given them complete creative license, the end result is something I could have never imagined. As I like to say, "If they aren't from Bishops, send them back." :-)

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Meaghan. We appreciate you!

name: Linda Broadhead
text:
The flowers I received from Bishop Flowers were absolutely beautiful and included some of my favorites. The arrangement lasted for a long time and I was able to keep several of the flowers in smaller vases in a couple of other rooms too.

I would recommend Bishop's whenever you know someone who would like to have flowers to brighten their day. Or just for your own special treat.

name: tim edwards
text: Every Friday for the past 30 weeks I have visited Bishops.  I purchase roses on Friday for my girlfriend.  The staff is amazing and helpful.  The roses are always fresh and beautiful, and the service is a pleasure. I would recommend Bishops for any and every occasion.  Thanks again guys for always helping me. And if you are ever at Star Market in Five Points, take a look around the pharmacy, you should be able to see the BEAUTIFUL roses.

name: Senior Admin
text: Thank you so much!!

resp.text: We appreicate your business and you taking time to leave us a review.

name: Mitzi Connell
text: Bishop's Flowers does beautiful work. Always pleased with what they create! They're customer-service oriented and they've been here a long time. Let them handle your flower needs...whatever they may be!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Mitzi. We are always pleased to hear that our customers enjoy our work and our customer service. Thank you for supporting us as a local Huntsville business.

name: Michele
text:
I am from out of state calling to place an order for Mother's Day. I was told they were not accepting any more orders. What kind of Business does this??? Never in my life have I ever experienced this. This would have been the first time I ever ordered from here. The gentleman in the phone was very rude and said maybe if you call back later you might be accepting more orders.
No thank you.... Not a very good first impression...If I could give no stars I would.

resp.text: I'm sorry we could not please you,  but from looking at your other reviews that you have left for other businesses....it seems that you have a lot of bad experiences. I'm so sorry you are such an unhappy person.

name: Paula Lindon
text: Great service and a beautiful HOCO corsage

resp.text: Thank you Paula. We appreciate your business and you taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Korda White
text: I love getting flowers from Bishops and we have been using them as our florist for over 25 years.  Their arrangements are beautiful and fresh and last along time.  They did our daughter's wedding and the arrangements and bouquets were awesome.

name: Harrietta Mitchell
text: Beautiful shadow boxes great customer service decent prices

resp.text: Thank you Harrietta for your kind words.

name: APRIL Kendrick
text: Dont ever use this place for anything!!!! If I could give no stars I would!!!!

name: Creative Jewelers
text: Jerry you are so amazing. You make the most beautiful arrangements that fit all occasions. Keep up the GREAT work.

name: Mark Hasemeyer
text: Jerry built my wedding shadow box and it's the center piece of our wedding conversations. Great local business with capable folks.

name: sandy lynch
text: After calling numerous florists in the area with either no answer or being told no delivery after 12 on Saturday, I was so glad to receive such prompt and friendly service from Bishop's.  I will definitely use them again!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review. Our business has been built on referrals over the last 50 plus years! We appreciate your business.

name: raelynn venters
text: i only put five stars so that you would read this review. the owner of this business is very rude. when i called to ask a question about the flowers i purchased he talked down to me and like i was stupid for not knowing. he does not stand behind his product and yelled at me on the phone then hung up on me! i will never go here again. i hope he fails he is horrible business owner!

resp.text: I'm sorry you had a bad experience.

name: Chris Augenstein
text: The floral arrangements were creative and beautiful and a great value!

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate your business. Hope to see you again soon!

Jerry

name: Jeff Olson
text: The guys at Bishops Flowers are a Class Act!!! Their arrangements and flowers are top notch and the service is second to none.

resp.text: Jeff...it's always nice to hear that we met your expectations. Thanks for being a loyal customer.

name: Micah Colin
text: John made it's a beautiful bouquet and no time flat

resp.text: Thank you for your business

name: Britney Cook
text: Apearently you can't order flowers two days before mother's day from here and the owner is a compleate jerk on the phone.

name: Amanda Barnes
text: Amazing arrangements that get tons of compliments everytime!

name: JDub
text: Love the arrangements. I buy all my flowers here.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and for the rating Jonathan....

name: Oscar Phillips
text: The best experience I have ever had dealing with having to ordering arrangements for a family member, the absolute best in Moulton, go check it out okay thanks..

name: Deb Smith
text: So kind

name: Sabrina
text: The owner is a very nice sweet lady. Her store is very small but she makes good beautiful use of every inch of it. The flowers or very nice.

name: Dewayne Blevins
text: Best flowers around !

name: Charity Goodwin
text: Sherrie makes the most beautiful arrangement! I've been using her for years and will continue for years to come. Always satisfied

name: Rolonda Parker
text: Awesome place

name: mary towns
text: Sent a plant to my Granddaughter who had a devastating loss. People were so helpful and really sweet. Granddaughter sent me a picture of the plant . It was beautiful and she was so pleased!

name: Melissa Bombard
text: My boyfriend sent me flowers from this florist, he described what he wanted and they came to me (as a surprise) and they are just beautiful! I love this arrangement!!

name: Dana Lunceford
text: The lady that answered the phone was super nice and the delivery was quick ...but....I  called and requested a cut flower sympathy arrangement to be delivered to a friend .   I requested that it be Christmasy but not necessarily a poinsettia.     What was delivered looked like a springtime arrangement with an pastel colored bow.     It resembled the bouquets I could have bought in my local supermarket and put in a vase.   I expected something much nicer based on all the good reviews so hopefully this is not the norm for them 🙁

name: Kellie Patterson
text: I ordered my flowers over the telephone, and they fixed a beautiful arrangement that was definitely more than what I expected! The lady I spoke with over the phone was very kind and helpful. I will definitely use them again.

name: Alicia Church
text: I ordered a brightly colored arrangement from out of town for family living in Hartselle. When I saw pictures from my family I was overwhelmed at how beautiful the flowers were! My family who received them absolutely loved them! I would not hesitate to purchase from Smith Florist again.

name: Lori Harpe
text: Incredibly fast service and a beautiful fall bouquet. From order time to delivery was 1 hr!!! Price was right! Will use much more frequently now that I know they are awesome!

name: Rose King
text: Dropped in to get a few flowers my son wanted for his great grandmother funeral.  Ladies were so sweet . Really helped him.

name: destintiger66
text: I called this florist 45 minutes before they closed on a Saturday. My granddaughter had been very sick and I asked if she could send a snack basket with a balloon to her. She was very nice and delivered it immediately. It was very nice and a big basket!!! All for just $35. I cannot believe the EXCELLENT customer service!! Much better than any of the big online places where you pay an arm and a leg for a mediocre product. THANK YOU!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this place!!! She was so excited and thanks to Smith’s it made her day!!

name: Randy Ball
text: Best place in Hartselle to buy flowers super nice folks

name: Blackkat RavenWolfe Productions
text: Beautiful flowers for all occasions. Flowers arrangements  and potted plants for funerals are lovely.

name: Florence Chiu
text: We had a spray sent for a friend's mother's funeral, and Smith Florist did  such a beautiful job on the spray.  Everything was done according to my request.  Very fair price!!!

name: Homer Jack Bean
text: Very nice and knowledgeable. Love the place and people

name: Libby Morse
text: The lady's are so sweet!!! They were wonderful to work with and great to our school!!

name: Garrett Cryer
text: Awesome place for Flower's love the people.

name: Ashley Ogden
text: Smith Florist did a wonderful job capturing exactly what I needed in an arrangement for a dear friend's mother's  funeral. Thank you a million!

name: Don Law
text: Super nice phone skills and very reasonable pricing! I’ll be back👍

name: Charles Speakman
text: It is a great florist and great people

name: Kelly Grandstaff
text: Friendly economical service

name: Judith Mason
text: Nice flowers

name: Lea Fowler
text: Staff is friendly and helpful.

name: Marv Howell
text: Greg is a superb touch of class that has talents that understand what the client wants for the price. Such an easy guy to speak with too!

name: B. Patrick Grider
text: I walked in on Valentine's day looking for half-a-dozen yellow roses with some purple embellishment. The sweet lady and her friendly colleague were able to get me what I wanted and get me out of there in about 15 minutes. I'm pleased with the flowers too! They only lost a star because flowers shouldn't cost $10 a piece.

name: Gregory Hall
text: Used them for years. Best florist in Birmingham. I will use them again...

name: Grace Church
text: I order a flower basket and it was way below my expectations. I was not happy with my purchase! I will not be ordering from A Touch of Class in the future!

name: David Meeks
text: Greg is a great florist.

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Sweet lady

name: Phelan Stanton
text: The shop is really cute and quaint and Miss Janice is amazingly friendly

name: Christine Oglesby (Gadgetgirl)
text: Tge ladies here are great. This place sells Sorelli Jewelry and also sends damaged Sorelli Jewelry off to be fixed. I've been shopping here quite a few times (botique) items, and I find nice things for gifts as well as additions to my personal collection.

name: Kisha Powell
text: Awesome little boutique!

name: Mara Smith
text: Thank you so much for your kindness and understanding during our difficult time. Will recommend to family and friends in the area.

name: Ven Leo
text: I send a lot of flowers.  From the customer service to the end product.. they knocked it outta the park.  So very thankful to find a quality shop... this is it.  Thank you kindly!!  (I called over 7 local shops before them... seriously.. don't look any further.)

name: Rachel
text:
Extremely disappointed. I ordered two bouquets for Mother's Day delivery. The Farmhouse Chic Bouquet that I paid $76 for ended up completely different as shown in the image. The flowers on the side were already wilted and drooping even though I called in a week ahead to ensure it be perfect. It's upsetting to think that I sent in a gift bouquet only for it to be nothing compared to what I was expecting.

Definitely not worth the money. Will not be ordering from here again.

name: Annette Kerkman
text: WOW!! Service and product quality is superb!! Around noon I ordered the Citrus Smiles Bouquet for my daughter's birthday. They arrived that same day before 3:00 PM. (And, they looked exactly like the photo on your website)  Thanks for making her day special with your wonderful flowers!!

name: Nina Steinmeyer
text: I can't say enough good about this florist! It was recommended by a family member that works at Jackson hospital nearby. I live out of state, so it's always difficult to find a good florist. I spent about 20 minutes on the phone with them, and they were so patient with me. I described exactly what I wanted, even picking out the exact color and flowers from what they had in stock. The lady I spoke to was so patient and kind, and boy did she deliver! The arrangement I had delivered was to my grandmother who was ill and they are stunning! I am a super picky person with flowers, and I couldn't have asked for a more gorgeous arrangement! Thank you Capitol Rosemont Gardens! I definitely will use you in the future for arrangements!

name: Madison Anderson
text: On Valentine’s Day sold my husband dead peonies. He called ahead to pick them up but when he came home with them, they were completely dead and falling apart. He went back and they gave him better ones, but it was frustrating to see them purposely try to get rid of the bad ones (to a younger man who didn’t know better).

name: Yvonne Howard
text:
Very beautiful place to look around and to pick up that special gift you need for any occasion.
Everyone was very friendly and I will be back.

name: Nicole Hall
text: Always Wow me!! On the visons I have...Mr Jerry and Team Rocks!!!!! 💋

name: Wade Clyde Jr
text: Every so often I order flowers and this was my first time doing business with them and I was thoroughly pleased with their customer service and their beautiful arrangements. In addition to that they were also able to make the delivery specifically within the window of time I requested even though I didn’t let them know much time in advance. I will definitely be returning.

name: Dillon Patterson
text: Great delivery price, on time, and the arrangement was gorgeous. Will be a return customer.

name: Tonja Evans
text: Just called from Texas to order flowers for a funeral.  Person on phone was rude and condescending.  Did not place order with them.  Will be using another florist in Montgomery for flowers for our loved one.

name: Jane Love
text: BEYOND GREAT. Nancy is the best and she made sure we had the perfect spray arrangement at almost 5pm the night before the viewing/funeral. AND she managed the perfect flower selection at Christmas - - a busy and demanding time of year when selections can be low . Best floral service I've ever had.

name: P Mac
text: Very clean and well decorated store. Everyone is so friendly and helpful.

name: Jeanette Lynn
text: Love Rosrmont Gardens.  Found the perfect gift and a sofa!!

name: David Shotwell
text: We were looking for a florist close to our parents since we haven't had good luck with online florists my wife called Capitol's Rosemont Gardens and they were very friendly and helpful this was a last minute order and they came through and delivered beautiful flowers for our moms Birthday the same day. They will be our go to florist.

name: Pat Gradwell
text: We had the worst experience yesterday. Tried to get 2 funeral arrangements for a family member and just left there mad and insulted.  All that the lady helping us wanted to do is tell us what she liked and not what we wanted. This was for a male and she insisted that spring colors of pink, blue, and yellows would be beautiful when we insisted she show us pictures that were in the white, red, with deep greenery hues. She continued to not show us anything for a man.  I have used Rosemont for several occasions for many years and had a bad experience with my last order for a birthday. Just thought I would give them one more try. Very bad idea.

name: Ron Tejeda
text: My wife & I recently went to this establishment. We entered the flower section and a gentleman standing there working on arranging flowers & lady at the desk saw us enter and stand there for four to five minutes without  a word of greeting or an offer of assistance. There was a young lady in the back that came help to help my wife with our order. She was exceptional with her customer service. I have worked in the public & private sectors and customer service has been the foundation of our successes. This long term business has a long learning curve in customer service.

name: Karen Day
text: Gift-giving at it’s finest and most fun! Traditional and trendy, all under one roof. So many directions to go with the gifts. A Montgomery treasure - it’s been there for all my life, and I love receiving graduation gifts from there, as well as gorgeous arrangements from their floral side.

name: Karen Day
text: Gift-giving at it’s finest and most fun! Traditional and trendy, all under one roof. So many directions to go with the gifts. A Montgomery treasure - it’s been there for all my life, and I love receiving graduation gifts from there, as well as gorgeous arrangements from their floral side.

name: Kimberly Holley
text: Nancy is the best! I will always order here. Nancy was able to assist me with a last minute order order and she gave great suggestions for choices. The website was a breeze to use and order from. To top it off...my arrangement look just like the display online - full and full of aroma! Good price,great delivery price, and on time delivery...I couldn't ask for more!

name: Jocelyn Donald
text: Lovely and reasonably priced flower arrangement.

name: Dillon Patterson
text: Great delivery price, on time, and the arrangement was gorgeous. Will be a return customer.

name: Rhonda Holtan
text: What a wonderful group of helpful people ready to serve us in our time of need with an unexpected death in our family

name: Rat has Your Nugget
text:
Love this place! They were so helpful with our prom needs! Nancy went above and beyond! Thank you so much!
~Ms. Susan

name: katrina Beverly
text: Very nice upscale place with beautiful gifts and flowers to choose from, not to mention friendly staff.

name: julian moldoveanu
text: Highly recommend this place,best flower shop in town,always delivered on time,amazing arrangements,fresh and beautiful,all the thanks to the staff and awesome ladies working there!

name: Rob Warren
text: Amazing selection. Customer service was exceptional.

name: Jerome Weldon
text: Excellent gifts selection and services

name: Ra Rodgers
text: Great place for Roses and other accessories.....I love this place!!!! Shot out Julie and the super staff that works with her...Love Shot

name: Beau Mac
text: Everything you need for the holidays, fast amazingly friendly service!

name: Danny
text: Very friendly. Delivered a beautiful bouquet with short notice for Valentine's Day

name: Storm Ryder
text: Horrible service! The old man that runs the place was extremely rude to my family. Acted like he had no time for our questions, and literally said "we don't have time to help you,  you can probably find what you want at Publix." so we will not be going back there.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: A place that is filled with love

name: Willie J. Smith
text: Great service

name: Elouise Thomas
text: Great service

name: Betty Scott Franklin
text: Always pleasant.

name: Sandra Hicks Larson
text: Historical

name: Bernadette Howell
text: I almost never review, but I was so moved by the ladies at Cullman Florist that it seemed wrong not to! I called to see if they had peonies for my parents anniversary, knowing that it was unlikely there would be any available without preordering. These ladies went the extra mile in not only finding some for me, but creating a lovely arrangement that my parents are still enjoying almost a week later. Thank you so much to everyone involved in creating a special moment for my parents and myself. You are awesome.

name: Sara P
text:
Cullman Florist is simply amazing. I ordered a funeral spray by phone as I was on the way to catch a flight to my mother's funeral. It was last minute and rushed. I frantically emailed the funeral details to Cullman Florist. I hoped nd prayed they could turn it around quickly, but I knew it was a difficult order to fill.

Not only did Cullman Florist deliver on time. The flowers took our breath away. They even surprised us with a special request that they made happen. Just amazing and it warmed our hearts.

Thank you, thank you! I would definitely recommend them to anyone!!

name: Sharron Allen
text: Cullman Florist is the best.  They never fail to create the best arrangements.  Thanks yall

name: Henry Sellman
text: I love getting my flowers for my fiance and she always loves the ones I get here they do an awesome job and always deliver on time.they even delivered during the storm that had Cullman flooded the other day ....men you should buy your flowers here your women will love it

name: brittany moore
text: Cullman Florist makes the most beautiful and unique flower arrangements! They are helpful and professional. The shop is gorgeous! If you need flowers use them!

name: Michelle Warden
text: wonderful people to work with. beauitful flowers

name: Stephen Waters
text: Amy was very helpful and patient in getting together exactly what I wanted. The flowers were perfect, they were delivered exactly when I was told they would be, and my girlfriend loved them.

name: Geralyn Boone
text:
I ordered for flowers to be delivered on Mother's Day last year But the flowers arrived after Mother's Day!

They were not delivered on the 10th, we spoke to her. They were delivered on the 11th, Monday afternoon. I did write my complaint to where I ordered online soon after the delivery. Noone contacted me!

resp.text: I honestly wish I would have known of the issue closer to then but a year later I can only see what I have on record. I never saw any other correspondence about this or I assure you I would have reached out to you. I have actually tried to call you twice sense you posted this to personally apologize and although it is a year later I would have gladly done something extra special for your Mom.  Have a Blessed Day

name: Ron Waybright
text: First off I want to thank you publicly for your kind act of selflessness. You had gone the extra mile on New Years Day to deliver a beautiful arrangement of Flowers. My wife had just lost her Dad and me being miles away felt helpless. But from the second you answered the phone gave me the confidence that you were going to put together a really nice arrangement. The family was all gathered in Hanceville when the Flowers were presented. The entire family was just simply amazed. The Silver Cross Vase was spectacular,the flowers were professionally arranged and bold. I was told the Flowers could be smelled in the next room. To all that's reading this post, if you want something special done look no further, Cullman Florist will make it rememberable. Again Thank you so much for putting a smile on so many broken hearts.

name: LaDonna Vance
text: Such a beautiful arrangement on short notice. The family was so happy to receive a sentiment of love during their loss. Susie was Amazing and I appreciate her patience during my delivery. Thanks again and keep making Awesome arrangements to those who receive these creations of true beauty.

name: Tonia Camina
text: I couldn’t be more pleased. Needed last minute flowers on a  Saturday afternoon & Alan really came through for me. The autumn floral arrangement is truly exceptional. And they were delivered that day. Can’t say enough about the friendliness and the service. 😊

name: Jesse Ramirez
text: Respectfully, I write back to your response in a different review because I was unable to respond back in the old one. yes you are absolutely right it was two different pictures that I wanted combined but you only did one picture decoration and it did not come out the same. The reason it took 5 months to respond is because I was deployed serving my country. I don't have all the time to think about this type of stuff this is simply me telling my personal experience. Communication goes both ways especially in retail considering I came about a week early for it to be ready. On busy days like valentines day people have places to be. If you would like please post the pictures go ahead I have pictures of the final product as well. People who wish to express their opinion will be met with this answer bellow. Thank you for your time but I will not be coming back.

name: David Woodard
text: First I would like to say that the customer service at this florist is excellent. My first arrangement here was great, however the second arrangement did not meet expectations of a premium order. To the florists defense I did not give them a chance to fix the order as it was time sensitive for me. Overall, very friendly staff and one of the better florist in town.

name: Shiloh McDaniel
text: Arrived damaged, but was messaged by Cullman Florist for a replacement!! Great customer service!

name: Scott Neal
text: Fantastic arrangement made by Steph for my wife on our anniversary!  She made it easy and very special!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We appreciate you calling us !!

name: Andy Walls
text: Don't think that a delivery will be on time, you get it whenever they decide to deliver, no matter what they tell you.

name: Dawn Michelle Widner
text: Excellent service,  and they have beautiful arrangements.

name: Laura Griffin
text: My Mom recently ordered an arrangement to be delivered to my Aunt in a nursing home in Cullman. She chose the designers choice and the arrangement was gorgeous! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Laura. We always enjoy brightening someone's day with flowers.

name: Nan Clayton
text: Amy was spectacular! She made a dog shaped arrangement for my best friends birthday which was beautiful. They even went and picked up strawberries at Publix to take with the arrangement.  Best customer service ever!!!

resp.text: Personalized arrangements are the most fun and meaningful.

name: Jack cook-widener
text: Super nice people who can help you find the perfect arrangements.

name: Amy Doss
text: I have been a long time client.   I have loved everything they have ever made for me.  Every arrangement is always beautiful and made unique in its own way.  They truly care about their customers and the products they send out.   I love that it’s a home town shop and does so much for the community.  They are my forever florist.  ♥️

resp.text: Thanks

name: Cecelia Sleevar
text: Always a great place to get flowers!

name: Alan J
text: Full disclosure I work here but, Cullman Florist is the place where everyone should look to fill their flower needs.

name: jesse ramirez
text: Very friendly people but the flowers did not meet my expectations at all. showed preview pictures but what I received looked nothing like it and had to fix it myself in valentines day.

resp.text: I pulled your order first thing this morning. This was 5 months ago. You picked your order up from our store. If it was not what you wanted or expected we would have gladly fixed it had we known then that you were not happy. Your order was for 6 red Rose's wrapped in paper with writing on it. Your order was not exactly like either picture you sent us because you wanted two seperate pictures combined. I still have the text messages on my cell phone where we texted back and forth several times. In the future where ever you order flowers from I would suggest communicating with them if you are not pleased closer to when the order is placed instead of waiting 5 months. We will always correct anything if we are given the chance. Even on our busiest day of the year each order is important to us. Thank you Steph Cook Cullman Florist Co-manager

name: DJ Campbell
text: Great customer service and good prices. Willing to do what it takes to get what you want.

name: Karla Barnes
text: Always very helpful.  Always professional.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Amy Hancock
text: Staff is always friendly! The arrangements they do are always gorgeous! Will not be disappointed in sending flowers through them.

resp.text: Thank you Amy.

name: Zachary Ergle
text: I've ordered flowers here several times. The people I've talked to on the phone were extremely courteous and it's always a pleasure  dealing with them. As for the flowers my wife thought they were gorgeous and that's good enough for me. Would recommend them to anyone

resp.text: Thank you Zachary

name: Stephanie Cook
text: As one of the managers at Cullman Florist I feel that I need to address the recent review by Wayne Phillips.  He is a solicitor that called our business repeatedly within a 15 minute time frame.  We did not have the time to speak with him and when we repeatedly told him that he became irate with us.  He directs his complaint at Susie.  She is an exceptional employee that goes above and beyond with our customers. We stand behind her 100%.

name: mark bell
text: Absolutely amazing staff and flowers! I can't say enough about the quality and attention you'll receive at Cullman Florist. Ask for Steph or Carla!

resp.text: Thanks for your review Mark. We look forward to serving you again.

name: Dixie Roberts
text:
Charged my son $50 for cheap trashy prom flowers. No roses, no lilies, just a single filler flower that fell apart before the actual prom. He was embarrassed.  Had I known how they do" business" I would have gone with him, but I assumed they were reputable.
Never again.

name: Jeremy Bandre
text: Great customer service, wonderful experience!

resp.text: Thanks

name: Mary Braswell
text: The sales people were so  nice and helpful , to the point of getting a ladder to reach the item i was looking at !

resp.text: Thanks Mary, we look forward to helping you again in the future.

name: Stacie Gilham
text: I showed up at the florist at 5 minutes until they closed with an order that was for a funeral and four different items needed by the next day.  Not only were they very professional but also took the extra time even after they were closed to understand what my needs were.  Not only did they deliver to another county for me but they also went way above and beyond my expectations for the arrangements they made.  Everyone commented on the sprays and how unbelievably gorgeous they were.  My only regret is that we had not been using them all along.  Believe me, if you are wanting spectacular flowers and none of the hassle of worrying if it will be what was expected then Cullman Florist is the only place to go. THANK YOU FOR THE WONDERFUL JOB!!

resp.text: So happy we could help.

name: connie farr
text: Yeah a place where your married boyfriend can buy you flowers yeah your married boyfriend. My husband needs to stop buying you flowers cause I don't see you washing an cooking for him you do the dirt you get the dirt get it!!!

name: Melissa Weaver
text: I ordered plants for my mother in law... She loved them and received them very quickly!!! Thank you soooo much!!!

resp.text: Thanks Melissa

name: Zeta Smiles
text: Nice people but I did not receive what I ordered.  Very disappointed with their quality.

resp.text: Ms. Smiles, I am sorry that you didn't receive you what you ordered. We would be happy to fix this issue. Please call us directly.

name: Jose Martinez
text: Good services

name: Lidia Martinez
text:
(Translated by Google) I love it, they serve very well and give you options of everything.

(Original)
Me encanta,atienden muy bien y te dan opciones de todo.

resp.text: Thanks so much

name: Butch Cassidy (Flying Bryan)
text:
Good prices on most items I buy. Selection was great and the produce was very good.  They also have a good selection of local craft beers.
I'm sorry I don't live closer or I would shop here more often.
Clerks were very helpful and pleasant to deal with.

name: Beverly Nelson
text:
I had the Baker that was to Bake my 59th Bday Cake cancel due to unforseen reasons at the last minute. It was too late to order a Bday Cake like I wanted it. So, I went in to the Bakery here and requested (3) 8" round vanilla layers. It was professionally put in a nice carrier for me. ($19.99)
I stopped in their Florist area & bought some beautiful Flowers for $2.00
I came home & did the Decorating myself & here are the pictures on my own Cake Stand....it was delicious!!

name: Phillip Forsyth
text: Excellent selection on pretty much every grocery item we need! We frequent this location a couple of times a week. Great weekly deals on meats and fresh produce. My better half never misses a chance to drop by the bakery section to see if the gourmet cookies are buy one, get one free, which they often are. There is also a great variety of wines and imported beers right by the deli in the back. We love our Winn Dixie and the cashiers are always friendly and helpful.

name: Oscar Mcclenton
text:
Okay so this review is a bit unique, because over all it was an enjoyable experience. I came in with A LOT OF COINS, to cash in with the coin star machine. Mostly pennies, over 10,000 of them actually haha. And the employee (not specifying gender as I don't want to misuse pronouns on someone that I have no clue on their choice of gender or lack thereof) was so kind, patient and professional. Thank you!

Now the not so good, there was an employee that was working the closest register to the coinstar that the other employee refered me to go cash in my coinstar vouchers with, and the employee flatly, rudely, denied exchanging my vouchers, then making a face that one would only expect to see if the employee was changing a babies diaper for the first time and looked behind to the other employee at the second register stating "uuuughh I just don't wannnaaaa I don't liiiikeee ittttt" seriously? Alright, I'll go back to the nice one :) needless to say my vouchers were promptly cashed out and apologies were made, which was so nice, thank you employee at the customer service desk, you were awesome and made my experience Great. You need a raise and a promotion.

name: David Johnson
text: Love the crab legs there always fresh and good. The people are very nice and generous the crab legs are on sale with a winn dixie card for 11.99 until the sale goes off.

name: Christa Morphis
text: Very helpful people and they always have the best items. This Winn Dixie has the BEST selection of foods for those on a strict diet such as Keto, Whole30, gluten-free, Paleo, etc. Vegetables are always fresh and in stock!

name: Donna A
text: I visited my mom in Alabama for about 3 weeks. Winn-Dixie was the only place that I shopped for food. I liked it so much I actually put the app on my phone. I'm back up north. I took my Mom to live with me.. When I go back down there to pack up the rest of her house, I intend to shop at Winn-Dixie so I'm keeping the app on my phone.

name: Jason Masters
text: Their website is inaccessible for those with disabilities, and they chose to spend hundreds of thousands of dollars on legal fees rather than the thousand dollars it would have cost to make their website accessible like every other website on the internet. 1 star for a cruel and callous company.

name: Tomma Padgett
text: Nice clean store. Enjoy shopping there. They have some things you can't find other places and then they don't have other thing that I want or need. A little pricey but still a good place to shop.

name: Sonya Milam Rollins
text: I went in to use Western Union. The young lady was so helpful. I had always used money gram at other locations. The young lady took time to explain the difference. She was nice, patient, and very informative.

name: Sherita Smith Brasher
text: Love this store great selection and good prices

name: Dave Walker
text: There's a lady that work in the seafood section that's out of sight she is so helpful and friendly it just makes you want to 😄 smile all day

name: Suzan Webster
text: So clean and quick, friendly,helpful employees also Bakery has fresh baked bread been trying to get some for days Walmart had been out cuz there Evan wasn't functioning anymore or something anyway thanks Winn-Dixie

name: Sandrs Abbott
text: This mask thing is out of control. I wear mine religiously & wish everyone else would also comply, but they won’t. I had mine on while shopping & while checking out at self checkout today. I needed to ask if I was ringing up the .25 per lbs sweet potatoes, but the employee just plain could not understand me. She was about 15 feet from me & not another soul around us. I pulled my mask down to repeat my question after the 3rd attempt. Her only answer was for me to please put my mask on. I never/ever wanted to slip it down to begin with & I’m truly sorry she is hard of hearing & should be doing a job that her disability doesn’t prevent her from doing safely.  I had to leave, and left my shopping behind. Publix is so much nicer & more helpful.

name: Antonio Andrews
text: Winn-Dixie is a great place to shop a lot of this stuff is also from Chicago California there's no such thing as a fresh salad from California that's all I need to say on that note

name: pearl durant
text: Prices a lil steep.but employees are sweet

name: Teresa Lyons
text: Im disabled and was in a electric cart i think someone should have helped me with my grocery!

name: David Brantley
text:
I been going to Winn Dixie since a toddler.
This was the cleanest one I ever saw.

name: Tami Crews
text: Better this visit..bogo was happening too:)

name: Jim Hardy
text: Last WD in the area. Per usual, great store, premium prices when things aren't on sale.

name: Mandy Johnson
text: The employees were very helpful. The line was quick even though they were really busy.

name: Sandra Auffant
text: Very clean workers always nice

name: David Gramling
text: Kelley and Lindsey in the seafood section are the best!

name: Terry Colenburg
text: Easy to find what I'm looking for and they have great deals!

name: Melda Matson
text: Nice clean store! Friendly employees!

name: Shannon Bates
text: Always friendly, knowledgeable employees.

name: Terry “django” rush
text: My personal fav of the groceries, prob because its the closet to me. But mainly you can find what u want and good prices with a great selection of meats and deals.

name: Rhonda Fraser
text: Great customer service clean well stock store.

name: Nikasha Thomas
text: Good qualityeatsand products

name: Richetta Logan
text: I picked up a beautiful plant! It was just what I needed!

name: Bonnie Turner
text: Great grocery store plus more.  Picked up lunch. It was freshly cooked hot and tasted great!

name: Lana Jackson
text: Good service and good seafood

name: Freda Cobb
text: This has been our only source of groceries for several years, and, would continue to be, if the mask requirement was enforced. I won't be back until it is.

name: Beverly Pugh
text: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE !!!! I love winndixie and enjoy shopping there too  great job winndixie

name: Tim Chappell
text: Good deals on holidays

name: Beverlye Taylor
text: Always my grocery store to shop from! Best prices and a great meat department!

name: Chris Conner
text: It was ok. Store was clean and service was good.

name: Vanessa
text: Arielle was very friendly with me during my visit on today.

name: Senda Moore
text: Everyone was so nice and helpful

name: Amy Lambert
text: Love the selections winn dixie offers and the quality of things they offer too.

name: Paula Haynes Green
text: It's way to expensive !!! And No better than the cheaper chain's of grocery stores !!!!

name: Evo Williams
text: Had everything we needed and employees were very helpful.

name: Sparkles The Cat
text: Store was very clean and very well stocked.

name: Tianni Alvarez
text: yes i love it here

name: Ray L.
text: They are always smiling and polite.

name: vincent bean
text: But the church water most of the time. And love the fresh cut lunch meat here for lunches for work.

name: Alan Atwood
text: Winn Dixie in Golden Springs is great! Cool employees on the register. Clean store. And now they have beer holders on the shopping carts.  I thought that's what they were so I asked.  Young lady said "Yup. Beer holders". 😎😎

name: Daphne Hinds
text: We use the pharmacy for all of our prescriptions.  Their prices cannot be beat.  It is a little bit of a drive but worth the few extra miles!  The grocery side has a lot of harder to find brands and the produce department is very nice.

name: andrew s
text: Great selection and good deals for BYGO! One cashier is the best and the reason I chose to shop here and her name is Kathrine! Honestly I would shop here because of her even without the great prices because her attention to the customer!!

name: Mrs “Melana114” White
text:
On multiple occasions they have not had sale items in stock, even on the first day of a sale.

Made the 60 mile trip to purchase  the whole tenderloin for $7.99 lb. The senior lady who works in the meat department was sarcastic and rude, definitely not in the correct line of work. Said they only had the $16.99 lb tenderloin but the other would be in stock the following morning. Refused our request to allow a substitution at a discount.

So, we make a SECOND 60 mile trip only to be told by another gentleman "oh, we haven't been able to order any".  How it goes from coming in today to never even being ordered is beyond me, but somebody isn't telling the truth. Then the same senior lady remarks, oh yall are the ones from yesterday. No apology for the inconvenience, nothing.

Asked for a manager and explain how we've now made two 60 mile trips. He just shrugs it off saying the ads were made 2 weeks ago and they just weren't able to get it in stock. I asked if we could at least get a raincheck or the $16.99 at a discount. NOPE. "In these times " they just can't predict blah blah blah.  I pointed out that in these times, a simple update to apps and websites would remove misleading sales they know they can't fulfill.

At the same time I was speaking to the manager, my husband was speaking to the butcher about just getting one of the 16.99 lb tenderloins and he says, oh they're all gone, we used them as substitutes for customers yesterday. (WOW. Must have been friends or family because they sure wouldn't do it for us!)

Poorly managed. Poor customer service. No longer worth the trip.

name: Mike P
text: Good store and service

name: Patricia Andrade
text: The food such as the produce section and the meat section is always so fresh, so is the seafood department. The  deli and bakery is a plus too. I really like the buy one get one deals they have alot. Winn Dixie is a good place to shop.

name: Steve Nevins
text: Sale items are priced decently but base cost for single items are full blown marked-up retail. I stayed away from some items due to over pricing. Nice, clean store. Out of stock on a couple items and friendly. Coupon up to fight those mark ups.

name: Wayne Worley
text: I go in for lunch I get the plate that comes with one meat and 2 sides for 6 dollars and I love there banana pudding

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: I love winn dixie . Very clean. The only place I would use western union.

name: Rhonda Rollins
text: Very efficient and friendly . We have used this since 2015.

name: Jeran Kendrick
text: Ordinarily, I would recommend this particular Winn Dixie, but today is not that day. Over the past few months, the amount of out of date product has been very prevalent. Three out of the five items I purchased were out of date (only realizing this after I had gotten home) and the worst one was out of date by six months. Please be mindful of what you're purchasing here. I really hope this doesn't continue to be a thing, because this store really is a good alternative to the other establishments within the area.

name: Larry Daugherty
text: Self check out is terrible.

name: Julia Dobson (Judi)
text: I buy meat and their brand soda. Produce is good, too. I also like their bakery, esp sourdough bread an plain cake donuts,  which I can't find anywhere else.  It's a good,  clean store with helpful employees.  I was disappointed with my checker last visit.

name: Donna Stahmer
text: Great place for hard to find items. Love those BOGOs!  Nice fresh produce and clean store

name: Charlie jones
text: I’ve been coming to this store since I moved to the area and it’s my go to store, prices are usually nice and the store is always clean and two young ladies ones name is Eliza, and she’s always very very nice and helpful through the self checkout and our favorite sierra, she is always very kind and eager to help me and my wife with anything we need we always go to her when we need help and is one of the reasons we choose this store   but lately the attitudes of the other employees aren’t as friendly especially one dark haired girl in the bakery and a few of the people at the cash registers and at the customer service desk it’s still a great store to shop just needs better control over some employees

name: Renita James
text: Love this store

name: Ronald Phaneuf
text: Awesome service

name: Aaron Jenkins
text: Great prices, plenti cardholders get great deals that change often. Very clean, the self checkout is a little bit difficult. All in all great place to get groceries and they have an awesome deli and bakery.

name: Robin Bright
text: Good sells but a little pricey.

name: Linda Jacobs
text: Winn Dixie, Golden Springs is the only one left in this area.  It has a great variety of foods.  It really clean.  The price is competive with other stores.

name: KambiQuake
text: Great environment, pleasant employees, wonderful prices. Love the selection of fresh foods!

name: Kathy Thompson
text: Winn Dixie has always been my place to grocery shop. It is a clea well organized and stocked store. The meats are choice cuts grass fed beef and there is always someone that can assist you, should you need one

name: Antonio Gonzalez IV
text: Clean store with a lot of options. Low everyday prices. Love the wing bar! Much nicer than other Winn Dixie's I have seen in other states. Friendly staff. I usually go here 1-2 times a week.

name: Caz
text: Many stories about a certain manager eyeing underage females, which makes me uncomfortable. Great staff otherwise. Prices are okay but nothing on Aldi. Great place to shop if you need a quick thing on the way home from work.

name: Kimberly Devney
text: Great store.

name: Amanda Parris
text: Great employees but high prices on most items.

name: Brook Magee
text: Love this place. They have a wide variety of items. They staff is always extremely friendly. I have bought items from every department (deli, meat, bakery) and have always gotten exactly what I wanted how I wanted it. The prices are reasonable. I now shop only at this store. Wide variety of all natural organic food

name: Miranda Harmon-Sparks
text: I absolutely love this Winn-Dixie. It is always so clean and everyone is very friendly. The meats are exceptional and so is the deli and bakery. I do wish that they had fewer people walking around asking if you need help. I appreciate the courtesy but sometimes the customers just want to shop in peace.

name: Ian Crafton
text: Used to love this place but its gone downhill. A lot of people in the departments are nice and friendly but a lot of them up front aren't. A lot of the teenagers are constantly messing around and talking real loud instead of working, some of them also cuss out in the open with customers around including myself, its definitely  gotten worse recently and wondering why management hasnt done anything about it. Checking out is usually pretty slow as well, either barely any registers open or the cashiers are just standing around on their phones, why does the management not do anything about this?

name: jimmy Taylor
text: Awesome store always clean always polite and always OfferUp help

name: Cynthia Lane
text: Friendly, helpful staff. Good sale prices. Great meats and fresh vegetables and fruits selection.  Always very clean

name: Carol Martin
text: In and out no lines

name: William Turner
text: Went in the store on Wednesday and it was only one cashier.. Her line was completely backed up. She called for cashier assistance and no one never open up. Matter a fact she got back on and ask clearly for someone else to open up. The manager was there and he walked by and still didn’t open. That open was very poor management and high turnover when it comes to cashier and seems as no one cares.

name: Laurie Walker
text: One of the cleanest grocery stores in town. A great staff ready to help you with everything you need. Great Job Winn Dixie!

name: Karen Love
text: Pharmacy is great priced great. Grocery store way over priced for quality.

name: Dora Webb
text: This is the only Winn Dixie we have in our area.  Customer service is wonderful here. If there's an issue , they get it fixed real quick.

name: Pearlia Garrett
text: Great

name: Secret “Yo mamma” Shopper
text: Cashier  was dumb as a box of rocks

name: Stephen Shipley
text: I like Winn Dixie. I do think they need to offer sanitizer or sanitary wipes though

name: Lolita Mota
text: Best seafood in town 😋

name: Shirley Phillips
text: I love Winn Dixie, it has everything you need at good prices. Store clean which is important to me. Meat market is always stocked, the people that work there is always willing to make your shopping experience a blessed one. Sure miss our Winn Dixie tht was in Saks.

name: Ryan Warmack
text: Worst shopping experience I've ever had in a grocery store.one of the items I was looking for they didn't have, it's obscure so I wasn't thrown off too bad by that.the manager was dressing-down an employee in the middle of an aisle standing in front of a place I thought it may be so I wanted to look there. When I stopped to look he did not move the conversation or anyting he just stood there and continued berating an employee. when I figure it out I was going to have to make my obscure ingredient, onion juice, I asked for cheesecloth was and was taken on a full tour of the store trying to find it.

name: jonathan mcclure
text: Excellent

name: Jon Burt
text: Very pleased with the new look of the store and service is always top notch.  However as I sit here I have been trying to reach the GoldenSprings store on the phone for 25 minutes straight as we speak.  You guys need to answer the phone!!  Other than that all is good!  I purchased a money order for $208 and purchased a jar of expensive pickles, the cold ones in the back!  Anyway, I will be back after dinner to pick them up.  Left them at the counter.  Having worked in retail for YEARS this is a small complaint but just trying to help you guys get just a little better!  Thanks, your truly!  PickleMan!

name: Maranda Story
text:
The deals they’ve had on meats! Yes!!!!
Keep the cranberry oatmeal cookies coming!

name: Bradley Strother
text: Great prices and lots of buy one get one free.

name: Michael Couch
text:
The service has been much better than of late. The recent remodel was really nothing more than a few new display fixtures in the produce and bakery department and basically flipping the store around. It is much harder to locate products you bought on a regular basis. There is a certain individual that works in customer service that provides NO SERVICE. If asked about something she acts as if you are bothering her. Too many times I’ve had issues only to find out the manager on duty was not available. The fact that I enjoy interacting with the younger cashiers and the ones that stock and front the shelves is the only reason I continue to go back. Another large grocery store is only a few miles further and I’ve moved my larger purchases there and only buy small amount of food products to fill in if not available at the other store and I buy medication at Winn Dixie as the pharmacy staff is outstanding.

Two years ago I would give this store 5 stars but today it is hit or miss on quality service and leaning more towards miss most visits.

name: Matt Lawliet
text: Great store to go to right after work to pick up groceries. Very convenient, clean, and well stocked. Everybody here is so nice. My daughter also has the biggest crush on one of the young managers in the white shirt.  Its so cute bless it. She would be so mad at me if she found out I posted this.

name: Jason Welsh
text: Really good beef here, I found cokes on sell 5 6packs of 16.9 oz. For 10 dollars or so. They keep the store clean and the customer service is awesome.

name: Margaret Wilson
text: I used to like coming to this store but today was the last straw. I downloaded the app to get two coupons that were posted by the product but I couldn't find them anywhere on the app. I decided to ask the cashier Carlie to help figure this out and she took my phone out of my hand to find it but it never showed up on the app. She was rude and not helpful at all. Another cashier cane over and asked what she was doing then she took my phone and tried again to find it. Either way it wasn't there and she looked at me like I was crazy instead of just simply going to the aisle to locate the price. She took the items of my bill and told  me I could talk to a manager. Since we've already been in the to long as it was I told her I would talk to the main manager tomorrow but I really think I'm going to continue to Publix.

name: Tim Chapman
text: Best supermarket in Anniston! The weekly specials were great. The store is very upscale and clean with excellent bakery and deli items. The cashier and staff were extremely nice and made for a perfect holiday shopping experience.

name: Tim Morris
text: Clean with large selection of items. Resonably priced.

name: Kayla Smith
text: Their prices are kinda high but they have great deals now and then, but you gotta have a loyalty card to get the deal. They don't have the best selection of fresh produce. I hate the self check out it's more complicated then it should, it's supposed to be quick and simple. Instead it took me e times as long then it would if I went to a register. The one thing I really like is the tiny buggies for kids, they can have their own experience shopping. My LO loves them.

name: Craig Winn
text: Love the weekend meat deals. For the small area that this grocery serves they seem to be well stocked. The store could be cleaner and stocking the store on a Saturday at lunch also does not make good sense.

name: The Throwersx4
text: Good deli peanut butter cookies. Bombbb

name: Trecia Jerome
text: Great service

name: Debbie Ball
text: Good place to go if you can those big one get one free

name: Blake K
text: You may want to check the expiration dates on any food you buy from this winn dixie.

name: rhonda harbison
text: Today was my great grandaughters birthday.I picked up her cupcakes and smash cake and was thrilled. They were better than I could have imagined. Light pink roses on the cupcakes and the smaller cake. They were beautiful and delicious. Thank you so much.

name: Phillip Bryant
text: Wow So tidy and clean...BOGO saved $60.00 also got 10lbs of sugar' for $2.45 I was Winn-ing to Day

name: Regina Smoot
text: Clean friendly

name: Ailsa Dean
text: Love them check drinks. Store was clean and workers was very friendly.

name: Lewisville
text: My only complaint is this store isn't closer to my house. It's run really well.

name: Michael B. Abrams
text: Winn Dixie has hired excellent people to staff the store in Anniston, AL. The store has an excellent selection of grocery items at excellent prices.

name: Emma Carden
text: Great people work in this store! Always clean and friendly. Floral department is excellent and always makes beautiful arrangements! Best floral department in Anniston and Oxford, hands down.

name: Karen Allen
text:
Jim, Margaret and Kelly are exceptional associates. Catherine told us today they are adding organic foods section.
Rachael in the DELI will gladly help you find your favorite Winn Dixie meats and cheeses.

name: Terry Hayes
text: Found everything that I needed. Plus some beautiful flowers. They were so fresh and at a great price.

name: Bonita Moreau
text: We like shopping the meat department for the great deals and quality product.

name: Amanda Conaway
text: They have a floral Dept,  pharmacy, seafood Dept and delicious looking deli. The floral Dept has nice fresh plants and stem flowers and decent selection however it's no like Publix' nice selection. Go for a visit and feel the store out and see if it's what your looking for!

name: Alisa Sterling
text: The only local Winn Dixie we have left. A little pricey but some things are worth paying a little more for.

name: Janice Lozano
text: The assistant manager went out of his way to help me. Always friendly staff and will help in any way they can. Pleasant environment.

name: Cdub 2010
text: Have never had a good experience here. Very high prices and poor selection. Walmart has same brands, lower pricing and better service.

name: D S
text: I drive from Piedmont just to go to this store. ♥️♥️

name: Brian Diaz
text: Great place as always, wish the prices were a little lower though.

name: Bridget Walker
text: High prices on their groceries but love the pharmacy and happy they didn't sell out to Pic n Save.

name: Larry Jones
text: The customer service here is horrible i came in one night to buy some groceries and the deals would not ring up. I went up to the service desk to get it fixed after I noticed it on my receipt and had to wait for awhile, they eventually called for the manager to come to the service desk to fix the problem. The manager was a young girl named Jamie and i could tell she wasnt happy to have to deal with the whole situation. It took a bit to get fixed and after we did and i walked off i heard her call me a dumb*** under her breath, never shopping here again. They don't need to put immature brats in charge.

name: Donavon Keith
text: I used to like this store but i absolutely hate it now. They have been leaving some irresponsible teenage girl in charge some nights and its very annoying. I'll be shopping and some of the co-workers will be standing around in the aisle loafing around  while i'm trying to get around them to get something. Some of them will also just casually cuss our loud in front of customers. This all boils down to poor management and letting an immature child take charge when the adults are gone.

name: Dora Webb
text: Winn Dixie is great. The staff are all friendly

name: Brenda Weeks
text: This place has been absolutely horrible recently.  I'll come in sometimes after work to shop and a lot of the teenage workers are playing around. You can hear a lot of them cussing as well around customers and either they dont notice or dont care. A lot of them seem to have about as much knowledge about where everything in the store is as me. Also takes forever to check out sometimes.

name: Brittany Simzak
text: The store is usually clean and stocked. The employees are nice and helpful. The only bad thing are the lines. They've got a number of self-checkout areas and hardly utilize them at all while each cashier line is maxed out.  Why even have self-checkout if you're not going to utilize it?

name: Colin Hendrickson
text: Good grocery store. Always clean with fresh produce and a good selection of everything. You still have to look for sale items to get great prices.

name: Willard Wagener
text: Excellently clean store.  A bit pricey, but superior in quality to the old Winn Dixies I grew up with!

name: Marcus Miller
text: Always has good quality meats. Very fresh...

name: Bryanna Hurtado
text: The place was really nice and the sales were great. The only bad part was the cashier and the attitude she had.

name: Pat Hayslette
text: Clean, well stocked, friendly and helpful staff but prices need to come down just a little!! I would recommend it to friends.

name: Barry Waddell
text: Very well organized and clean. Staff, very courteous.

name: Kala Brown
text: Great place! My #1 place to shop! Love the rewards!

name: Slick One
text: I've never been find of Winn Dixie. The only reason I went here was because it was convieient to where I was staying.

name: Camo Rockstar
text: I went into the pharmacy...the people were friendly and service was fast

name: Larry White
text: Great store, little pricey but better products than Walmart.

name: Matthew Shelton
text: Nice grocery - they had some plantains that were actually ripe

name: Deven Warmack
text: Love! Low prices and everything is easy to find.

name: Tiffany Birmingham
text: Great hours to where I can go there before I go to work at 7am

name: Michael Rogers
text: The entire store was very clean, well stocked and laid out professionally. It was a pleasure to shop there. Staff was friendly and professional.  LOVED IT! 😄

name: Matthew Brasher
text: Good place to shop. Staff is kind and courteous. Lines are not usually bad. Good meats

name: Becky Robertson
text:
Don't know her name, but she was a middle age white lady working in deli today around 12:30!!  RUDE.RUDE.
RUDE100%.. IN A HATEFUL VOICE ASKED ME WHAT I WANTED AND ADDED TO THAT THEY WERE WORKING ON A BIG ORDER...As if mine didn't really matter. I walked away and walked out..
CUSTOMER SERVICE -100

name: Wade Baker
text: I've worked retail and I know profit is the bottom line but enough staff to get the customer out with a smile is also important. Look at your main service areas

name: Akira Amamia
text: The  best Winn-Dixie around! The management is friendly and super helpful, especially the afternoon/closing manager. Always well stocked, very nice.

name: Judy Mclain

Also in the floral department a very nice lady saw me and my 4 year old daughter looking thru the balloon selection bc her birthday is in a few days and the lady answered all my questions and then allowed my daughter to pick out a balloon of her own and gave it to her for free. I thought that was very thoughtful.  The customer service at this store was excellent and I will definitely be back.

text:
I go to the customer service desk to use western union.. never fails i stand their a good 5 minutes waiting for a employee to assist me and no one ever does...so i go ask a cashier to call someone to help me at customer service... i walk back and wait at the desk.. and wait and wait....i go back to a different cashier to ask again because the first cashier i had ask never called anyone to help me...and when i ask the second cashier....i made sure the first cashier heard what i was saying!!..
This never fails... everytime i go to customer service desk i wait on an average 20 minitues b4 anyone helps me!!! REDICLOUS!!.. for that reason im giving ~Winn Dixie in Golden Springs Anniston Alabama 1💥star !!

text: It ticks all the boxes as a grocery store. They have plenty of food and other home products to keep your home well-stocked. Good location as well, pretty much adjacent to a handful of residential communities, people will encounter it first before Publix or Walmart when heading towards downtown Anniston or Oxford.

text: I am so pleased with Auburn Florist.  I called this morning to order flowers for. My daughters birthday.  I live out of town. The lady I talked to was so nice and a true pleasure to work with. resp.text: Thank you for your kind sentiment. It is our pleasure to help you.

name: Wishing Well Flower
text: I would like to just stop in to say THANK You to you and your amazing staff!! I have ordered twice now from this amazing shop and we florist are the worst customers for florist however this shop has not just amazed me but my beloved customer as well. We posted a photo to the google photos area of the beautiful stunning poinsettia that our customer received back in December. Along with the one request more than anything in the world a balloon! Yes a balloon! You seriously made his year twice! Many thanks to your staff for paying attention to details as well as help connect a family together who is extremely torn from being so far apart. Give yourselves a pat on the back you all deserve it! -Cheers, -Wishing Well Flowers

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. Adding that personal touch and paying close attention to detail are important to our success. We are happy to help you anytime you need us.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your continued support.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words. We appreciate your support.

text: These folks are great. They helped me out over the phone and delivered everything right on time. The arrangement was gorgeous and the email updates were really nice. Thanks!

name: A Brandon
text:
Great customer service and fast service. Since I was out of town I was unsure of which arrangement to get delivered to an Auburn local address. The rep explained the services available and helped me throughout the process. I asked if I could get a photo of the arrangement and the rep was able to send me a photo to my phone.

I’ll definitely suggest the flower shop for anyone in the Auburn area or anyone out of town looking for a place in Auburn. Thanks for all the help.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback!  We appreciate it.  :-)

name: John B
text:
I ordered this beautiful arrangement from these wonderful people.  I originally wanted painted roses, but they said they couldn't do it. They even offered some of their competition to help.  Well no one paints them around here.  Most were not very friendly want it either.  So I decided to give auburn flowers my business after all.  They were extremely polite even though they didn't offer the service i wanted.
Fast forward to the day of pick up. I had pre paid for my arrangement as a GameDay surprise for a special lady.  Well the night before she decided she didn't want to be so special lol.  I know it's what I get, for being a bama fan behind enemy lines lol.  So, I told them to just donate to the hospital.  I'm sure it would have made someone's day.
After I week or so goes by and I'd completely forgot about the flowers and was forgetting about the special lady lol.  I noticed when I checked my bank that day.  They had sent me a refund for my order.  I can't stress this enough,  I DIDN'T ASK FOR ANY MONEY BACK.  So, long story short.  These guys do great arrangements and even better customer service.  They'll always have my business, even with auburn in the name!

resp.text: Thank you so much, John. Please let us know if we can help you again. It is our pleasure.

name: Mike Blanchard
text: They were great. I ordered a bouquet of carrots for my friend’s horse who was having surgery. I knew it was a weird request but they were very accommodating and created a beautiful carrot arrangement. I wish I knew more people in Auburn so I could use them more often!

name: Morgan Rehm
text: I used Auburn Flowers and Gifts as my wedding florist and had the BEST experience! Leah is amazing! I went in with an idea of what I wanted, and she brought it to life. I was floored by how gorgeous my flowers were. Leah was such a pleasure to work with. She kept me updated constantly, from dealing with my many questions (I live in another state!) to always being available to talk. Her prices are fantastic and her personality makes her extremely easy to work with. She took care of everything regarding the flowers on my wedding day (she set them up and moved them around for me!) I would HIGHLY recommend her! Thank you so much, Leah!

resp.text:
It was a complete pleasure working with you!!  Thank you for trusting us and for the kind words.  Honored to be a part of such a great day.
~ Leah

name: Alpha Chi Omega
text: Highly recommend!! Auburn Flowers & Gifts provided our sorority's chapter with floral services during the entire week of sorority recruitment and everyone in the store was incredibly easy to work with! Our arrangements were always delivered on time and communication was simple and easy. The arrangements were BEAUTIFUL and aligned perfectly with the vision that we had when we ordered them.  Family owned and operated with reliable, family service- there couldn't be more to love!!

name: Angie Medlock
text: I tried all day to get same day flowers delivered to friends going through some really hard times.  I online ordered through Auburn Flowers and Gifts, knowing that they closed in three hours and my delivery likely wouldn’t make it until the next day.  They assembled a gorgeous vase of flowers and had them delivered in less than two hours!!!  I was so amazed and the friends that received them were so happy.  Thank you for a job well done, better than anoyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much! I'm glad we could help.  We try to make it really easy and pleasant to shop local here in the Auburn/Opelika area.  Thanks for ordering from us!
