name: UnbiasedReport
text: I just let myself in. No, my whole family and I just let ourselves in. The room was unlocked. No one was around. No one was on site to be reached about reserving the space. Perhaps it was just bad timing.

name: Crystal Ogletree
text: Absolutely amazing! When we were going through the different flowers and what we could do, I was excited but when I showed up at the funeral home I was blown away. By far exceeded my expectations, everyone there commented on the arrangements. Thank you for putting a smile on our faces during this hard time for us.

name: She Mac
text: Hastily created a beautiful arrangement, provided additional petals and flower tops to float for us.  Accommodating our request all the while indicating a shortage of stock.  All were ready for pickup on time...

name: Jamie Winborn
text: Everyone here is so nice!  The whole ambiance is so soothing. Highly recommend!

name: Anthony Harlan
text: Absolutely amazing from start to finish. Top-notch staff willing to help at every turn, prices that don't make you dread calling a florist, and incomparable service. You've got a new lifetime customer.

name: Sandra Love
text: Love it...

name: vickey tomas
text: They wrap your gift so nice, kind staff

name: Angelica Rodriquez
text: What beautiful flowers and a beautiful store and great customer service

name: Bob Gibson
text: There is something about a new Publix that makes you want to shop there. The meats, seafood, fruits and vegetables all looked good. I only purchased veggies and spicy wings this time. The beer and wine selection is good and chilled in some cases. Clean store and friendly staff. You won't be disappointed and if something is not right Publix will make to make it right. That is the Publix difference!

resp.text: Thanks for your kind feedback and for shopping with us, Bob! ¤Angel

name: Girli Green
text: This was possibly the worst shopping experience I have EVER had. The cashier and the gentleman that helped bag my groceries were pleasant. He was even friendly. My thoughts on every single other employee I encountered would require a long tirade of profanity. I will NEVER go back there. I can barely believe Publix would allow this crew to operate their store. Such a shame.

resp.text: Can you please reach out to our Customer Care line: 1-800-242-1227, or private message us on Facebook here: https://www.facebook.com/publix/, and we will be happy to help get this concern addressed with the Store Manager. ➳Cinthya

name: Winston Smith
text: Shopped at the Publix at the Morgan Road Plaza on 6/1/2021 at about 5:30pm. From the deli, we bought sushi and "Quick Shrimp Bites". While the sushi was really pretty good, the shrimp bites is why there is a "1 star" rating. My wife and I ate in the parking lot. The shrimp was cold as were the potato wedges. I really cannot understand how a brand new, flagship, Publix  serves cold shrimp and potatoes that were supposed to be hot.

resp.text: Can you please reach out to our Customer Care line: 1-800-242-1227, or private message us on Facebook here: https://www.facebook.com/publix/, and we will be happy to help get this concern addressed with the Store Manager. ➳Cinthya

name: Michael Ray
text: Love the new store and layout. Always a good shopping experience.

resp.text: Thanks for the love and for shopping with us, Michael! ¤Angel

name: Emily Ewing
text: I cannot say enough good things.  I ordered flowers at 1:20, they were delivered by 3pm. The bouquet was stunning and very fairly priced! I will 100% order from Linda again if delivering flowers in the area in the future and I highly recommend her! Linda was easy to work with and very kind.

name: Laura Abell
text:
Linda's Florist was amazing for me.  I went into her store I really had no idea what I wanted for my husband's funeral. I only knew I wanted something with Alabama Football and Golf. He was also a Marine.  I left there with the best arrangements I ever saw. It was beautiful.
Thank you Linda
Laura Abell

name: Tyler Ward
text: Ms. Linda was so sweet. Her personality is refreshing and her arrangements are beautiful. If you're close by, check her out.

name: Connie Estes
text: My goodness!! How kind and helpful she was! Living out of town, you never know who to call. Linda’s Florist will be my go to from now on.

name: Linda Castle

In a panic, Linda’s flowers was recommended to us and she made us a corsage last minute and even delivered it to us. The corsage turned out gorgeous! We will be using her again!! Can’t say enough good!

name: Carol Donica

text: I love this store!! I don't go to Publix to much since I've moved. When I do I always get my favorite lunch meat and cheese from the deli. I also get the bread from the bakery. Plus Publix always have great deals. It's an awesome store.

name: Carol Roberts
text: This is a very well stocked and clean grocery store. You can find just about anything you need here. The staff is friendly and helpful. The pharmacy is the best. The bakery is very good and everything they make is delicious. We have ordered flowers here (for the prom) before, and birthday cakes. The prices run higher than some other places but you get what you pay for and their are frequent coupons.

name: Mz. T. McKitt
text: Store was stocked pretty well. A few items I wanted were not in stock😯. That is very unusual for PUBLIX. Usually can locate most if not all items, but there were 3 items they were out of. Staff was friendly & food looked fresh as usual.

The best shopping grocery store in the world

The associate said that she would drop some and it should be ready within 30 minutes. I came back 25 minutes later and another associate said that it had just been dropped. She said it would be another 20 minutes. I left.

Nice clean and friendly atmosphere.

name: M T
text: Each employee in the deli section had their nose below their masks during a pandemic with a highly contagious virus. I shop and publix and am willing to pay publix prices because you treat your employees well, and I expect professionalism and care for me as a customer at publix locations. Wearing a mask without covering ones nose is the same as not wearing one at all. I hope that a manager sees this and addresses the issue. Otherwise you have lost a customer.

name: Cultured Rogue
text: I haven't been to a Publix I did not like. This store is always clean and well organized. The staff are friendly enough to ask if they can help you find anything, but also are not invasive.

name: Soull Pepe
text: The MOST well managed store I have been to in this state so for. Most of them are well kept but you can eat off the floor in this one. And 4 stars for across the board professionalism!

name: Jamie Glass
text: Prices are going sky high in publix. The service is great but OMG at the beef. They must have put the butchers fee, taxes, social security for the cows family on the price tag. I have never seen beef that expensive before. Everything in the store has gone up since the pandemic.  How are we going to continue to support Publix when money is low, Bill's keep coming,  job is iffy iffy, and kids are hungry. Oh, gas is going through the roof as well so you tell me, how am I going to continue to shop at publix?

The Pharmacy is also super convenient. I have used them for 5 years.

I said I am need of 3order of 100 piece chicken for an event.. Associate reply oh that's 85.00 per 100. I'm like okay that's fine.. she left me at the counter and started helping someone else.. so I walked off  went to the produce department where I asked customer for a bag of greens.. he stated oh it down there where the squash are.. its 6 rolls of them.. like I am knowledgeable of the store..I will never shop at this location again..

text: The people are great there. There's one thing I do not understand every person that comes through the lanes has to pick up heavy items and set them on the counter I myself or an older person and I don't appreciate having to pick up heavy items especially from under my buggy so they can run them over the scanner I do not understand why in the world they do not have a hand scanner for these things. I would appreciate someone calling me and telling me why they do not have a hand scanner.

name: Paul Simmons
text: This is a great grocery store. They have not only the usual great selection but also great management and staff. They are always on the move, filling the aisles, sweeping and cleaning, and there's always a warm greeting when you enter the store.

name: Gene Brooks
text: Love their deli. Buffalo Chicken is  awesome.

name: Gerard
text: For the most part I am satisfied with this Publix. Unfortunately I much prefer the deli down the road at Taylor Junction. Everyone working there knows exactly how to slice and present the deli meats and cheeses. You may not believe this but the smoothest parking lot is the one closest to me, Dalraida Commons. When I say smooth it doesn't mean it is not a little rough but it is the best! Now here is something some might not notice, I have never seen a filthy dirty trash can going into any of Montgomery's Publix. I thank whoever is keeping them clean!

name: Becca Scott
text: Always find exactly what I need!

name: Event Horizon
text: I like the store but stopped shopping there after a Very Bad experience with Produce and the attitude of the Produce Mgr. I picked up one, then a other and then another peach only to find they were Green&Fuzzy...gave up on the peaches and showed them to the produce mgr who just shrugged his shoulders like he didnt care at all. So I went to buy a bag of tangerines. Guess what, when I picked up the bag all the ones on tbe bottom were Green & Fuzzy too. I went back to the mgr and he rolled his eyes and said "what do you want? I check everyday...it happens". That level of rot does Not happen over night and his attitude was the worse. Publix customers Pay More and I dont mind for better quality and service. After 14 yrs shopping at Publix for my Family of 4, I quit and found out that I get quality produce and other things at Piggly Wiggly for half the cost and great service. That's approx $600/month of my money Publix has lost. This particular Publix is not in as affluent an area as the one I used to shopping for 14 years but I would hate to think that the lack of $$ is why the products and service are inferior

name: Corkey Hawk
text: Pharmacy has a problem with their pharmacy techs not acknowledging customers waiting to be served. Stood in place for five or more minutes while two techs were typing away on their computers without even an acknowledging I was there. Pharmacist was working nearby again nothing. This has happened several times now. My spouse has already changed pharmacy so I'm next after 11 years. No problems with any other departments!!!

Thanks for ruining my daughter's birthday

name: morgan wallace
text: I love this Publix. All Publix are amazing, but this is my regular, go-to grocery store. The cashiers and stockers are always friendly and welcoming to me and my baby. Any time I've needed help finding something someone would go out of their way to help me. The only complaint I have is that SOMETIMES the baggers seem to want to only put one or two items in one bag. I bring my own cloth bags and they'll act like my bags are full and start using their plastic bags. This problem isn't just at Publix though, Walmart does this to a really excessive level. This is really just a minor issue, not a big enough deal to take a star away. Overall, everyone is friendly and helpful and I truly enjoy going grocery shopping here.

name: Chris Wrhel
text: Very friendly and helpful. I was over charged for 2 items and went to the service desk. They appologized, corrected the problem and ABC of the mix up they gave me one of the items for free then refunded me the difference..

name: Vairy Ann Plum Boutwell
text: Publix the best place to shop. The cashiers and other employees are super friendly and always there if you need help. . Whomever the person was that gave this Publix a bad review is either a butt or just out to make Publix sound bad.. the deli is awesome best fried chicken you could ask for. Thank you Publix for the great service. .

text: I'm a Shipt shopper and just yesterday I had a new customer who ordered only 19 things. You were out of or didn't carry 4 of those items. That's not a very good average. They were understanding but I  felt bad because I couldn't deliver what they asked for.

name: Coven of the Live Oak
text:
Poor selction, claims they can't get products that every other Publix in Montgomery regularly stocks as well as local Wal Marts.
Claims the distributors can't get them. How does this publix have a different distributor than the others. Has one employee that will blatantly argue that you are wrong about what you  payed for an item as you are trying to show them on your receipt to prove to them "they" are wrong. Management just makes excuses for her. This has been this way for over 2 years. Corporate office simply contacts the store Manager and the cycle of excuses starts all over.
Do yourself a favor and visit any of the other Publix in Montgomery and stay away from this one!

Might as well go to Walmart with this particular publix.  The ad items are always gone.  And the last three times I visited, I had to wait in a line of 5 or more people.

The pharmacy used to be great but now they are giving medication from a manufacturer that I told them makes me sick.  So I felt like they didn't care.  I think in this case I just have to leave because I've seen this kind of customer service downfall before.

3/6/2019
The Pharmacy tech just actually threw my medicine at me when I asked what was she giving me.  I did nothing to deserve to be treated this way.

Even cashier didn't speak until I asked her a question. Hmm? Maybe it's a full moon or this Publix store has fallen in with majority of Mtg other stores in their customer service... which would be sad & disappointing. Store was neat, clean, well stocked and organized. Meat dept guy did help me after about 5+ mins when I stopped him from washing dishes.

Still nothing from her...and nd I am 3 feet away... then the long braids parted and I saw she had ear buds in attached to her phone..... oh well.... a guy in the next isle didn't.... and was very pleasant and told me the info. Everybody else (all men)   I saw working there went out of their way to ask if I needed anything. Appreciated that.

text: Always my go to for flowers for my better half. Great selection and the arrangements always seem to last longer than I expect. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful. They are a bit pricier than some other shops but the quality and service makes the price a guaranteed bargain.

name: Leah Highgate
text: Zimlich has done nice work for me in the past but now they've gotten too busy to handle small orders. I was made to wait 5 days to place a very small order on a time sensitive job as they had a bigger order to fill first. Too busy to spend 5 minutes with me just listening and writing down a few notes. Five minutes tops. They apparently don't need my business.

name: SHaun Rogers
text: They were very friendly and helpful. They took their time and helped me out with great concerns. I would recommend them anytime. Very satisfied.

name: Mike Sullivan
text: Ordered and paid for 25 Rose's for our 25th anniversary, delivered 24 and when I called them the next day when I saw what they did they offered to one more rose. NEVER USE THIS FLORIST!

name: Shannon Reed
text: I recently placed a same day order around mid-day, and within the hour Zimlichs had already delivered the beautiful bouquet! They quality of the product and customer service was amazing. I will definitely order from them again!

name: Jay Friday
text: One of the most professional businesses I have ever worked with.  I use their flower delivery service on a regular basis and every order has been on time and beautiful.  I highly recommend Zimlich's!

name: Daj Bee
text: Zimlich did a great job on my sympathy arrangement. I was undecided on my selection but the people at Zimlich took their time with me and helped me decide what might be a good match and combination. When I saw it, I thought it was beautiful. It was obvious much time and thought went into the arranging of the flowers. Definitely recommend this florist!!

name: Sandy Peterson
text: Excellent service.  They always make the most beautiful arrangements.

name: Michelle Cox
text: Ordered a sympathy arrangement for a co-worker who had very recently lost her husband.  Instead, she received a "Happy Anniversary" arrangement.  (Really?!)  I realize mistakes happen, but there was nothing done on Zimlich's end to mitigate the damage.  We were still charged the full amount ($153.00) and barely even received a "sorry."

name: Kim Woodham
text:
We used Zimlich the Florist for my daughter's wedding and reception October 9, 2015. The floral arrangements were absolutely perfect and just beautiful!! A huge "Thank You" to Dennis for his attention
to detail and seeing that everything was done right. He even put the tablecloths on the tables at the reception venue when the rental company delivered the cloths but neglected to put them on even though they had been paid extra to do so. When he is in charge, there is no need for worries and this was a great blessing as mother of the bride. I would highly recommend Zimlich the Florist to any future bride. You will not be disappointed.

name: Amber Dees
text: We worked with Crystal at Zimlich the Florist. She helped us get exactly what I wanted for my wedding! They did a beautiful job and we are so appreciative!

name: william bell
text: Wonderful service. Great atmosphere very nice people.

name: donnie barnette
text: Frustrated to say the least. I get off work early and head over to zimlich. In the store they were very nice, although I've never seen a florist so under stocked. I order a dozen roses to be delivered to my wife at work. I never hear anything from wife so i call zimlich. They tell me that the driver has called in and my flowers have been delivered. I then call my wife and give her every opportunity to tell me tat she has them. She never does, so i ask her if she has gotten anything from me. She say no. While i have my wife on hold, i call zimlich from my other phone. A different lady answers and tells me my wife's flowers haven been delivered yet. So now the surprise is ruined and zimlich doesn't care because they have their money. I've bought from them many times before but will not again.

name: Kbg
text: My bestfriend's grandmother passed and I needed a florist who would deliver specifically two beautiful plants. I know that shouldnt be hard but you never know. I really wanted the big plant commonly known as the peace lily (the actual name is something longer starts with an s) but I wanted a big beautiful plant and I wanted something for my friend to take back home with her to Texas. Zimlich really truly delivered. The terrarium was gorgeous and just what my friend needed. Something low maintenance for sure since she definitely doesnt have a green thumb. I asked her to send me pics and you be the judge. Dianne...i think thats her name or maybe Dianna was wonderful when I placed my order. It was worth every penny for my friends heartfelt reaction. Thanks Zimlich

name: Joey Allen
text: They suck

text: Wonderful and friendly florists who listen to what you want and gives you what you ask for - and more! A great experience from start to finish. The 2 floral headpieces I asked for weren't quite what I was hoping for so they made up new and better ones AND drive them to my location at no extra charge!!! Highly recommended, they're my new go-to florist from now on.

resp.text: Thank you!

text: I purchased a bridal bouquet on a 2 day notice. I was disappointed, but maybe I was expecting too much, I have attached a picture and would appreciate opinions on if I should have expected more.

text: Ordered the cross funeral arrangement for a dear friend that had passed.  The cross and flowers were prettier than what is pictured on the site.  Will definitely use Elizabeth’s florets again.  Thank you for going all out on this arrangement.

resp.text: We are honored to help with your loved one's tribute.

text: Elizabeth's Garden never disappoints! This was a last minute order that they delivered promptly. My friend explained everyone in the office stopped to comment on how unique and gorgeous the flowers are. Thank y'all for the wonderful experience!

resp.text: Thank you! We truly appreciate your business and look forward to helping you again!

name: Terena Bonham
text: My car broke down in front of this establishment and I was unable to get it towed right away. The ladies were so nice and accommodating to my situation.  I would never go anywhere else for the most beautiful floral arrangements.

name: Linda Sternberger
text: Elizabeth's Garden did the flowers for my daughter's wedding.  They were outstanding.  I am still getting compliments on them months after.  All of the arrangements were beautiful and the staff was amazing.  Thanks for making her day so special!!

name: Christian Chapman
text: I ordered some flowers for my mom and not only did they match the image on their website, they went above and beyond. This will definitely be my primary florist moving forward. Elizabeth's Garden does a fantastic job. I can't recommend this Florist highly enough.

resp.text: Thank you Christian! We truly appreciate your business!

name: Chris Reeves
text: Great staff, great prices, and supporting local small business! The staff can make truly unique arrangements. I’ve also had the privilege of seeing a few weddings they’ve decorated for and they are out of this world!

name: Celine Bufkin
text: I use them to send flowers to my Mom a couple times a year. You give them just a little guidance and they do beautiful, creative arrangements. I always ask for something kinda funky, and they come up with a really cool bouquet every time. Plus, they're just super sweet and easy to work with. Recommended! (p.s. I love to go into the shop when I am in town - great gifrs, garden stuff and housewares.)

resp.text: Thanks Celine, and thanks for the wonderful comments. We strive to do unique and "funky" floral designs for cool customers like yourself. And please do hurry back to town, we will be waiting to see you.

name: Danielle Porter
text: I called to order flowers at 730 valentines morning. I know that's a little late but it happens to all florists. Her attitude was horrible. She told me a dozen roses was 100 so I said I wanted half dozen and I was gonna purchase some other things to go with it her attitude got worse and stressed a dozen instead of half. The way she was speaking to me when I was telling her where to deliver was like she didn't want my buisness. I never seen a buisness discourage customers. Thank you Rose Bud florist great attitude from beginning of call. I ordered a beautiful half dozen arrangement with chocolate covered strawberries for less than the plain flowers she was trying to force on me.In future if you can't take someone's buisness lead with that nicely  and you may get that customer back one day. I hope nobody uses you. Your shop 100% answered the phone before 8 it was 7:39 to be exact. You can be in denial all you want but what I said is the truth!!!!!!! Not the wrong flower shop I called early trying to make sure I got my order in on valentines because I was late. You were rude and didn't want my service late you need to own it because I'm not mistaken!!! When you rudely asked where they were going like I was unconvincing you I said I would go else where you rudely said ok.  What a joke it was 99$ total not 79.

resp.text: I'm sorry you had a bad experience this morning, BUT this shop was not answering the phone at 7:30 and our roses are $79. Per dozen. You have posted this information about the wrong flower shop.

name: Ann Michele West
text: Unique, beautiful floral arrangements!

name: Randy Miller
text: Ordered with a budget, they knocked it out of the park!!! Will definitely be buying from again!!

name: Margaret Davis
text: The product was well received, but the employee was not wearing a mask. I asked about it and she said she had "health issues," then walked away and had someone else wait on me. That's the end of this store for me!

resp.text: Ma’am, I’m sorry you had a bad experience, but the woman who helped you at first has gone through things that you can’t possibly imagine, therefore she does not wear a mask. She even told you she has issues. That is why she got someone else to help you when you started acting like you were the mask police. I do not work there anymore, but I personally know the people that do. They are hardworking and try their hardest to please everyone and produce great arrangements. Before you go running to Google to post something bad, think about it from all sides first.

text: Strawberries were old, browning, mushy, not fresh. Paid $60 for inferior quality. Wasn’t sweet tasted like water. Definitely asking for a refund.

Get to the store at 6:15 and the store is closed.  Go to the store the next day and not one apology but blame placed on me that it was my fault I wasn’t their at exactly 6:00 pm. Worst customer service I’ve ever dealt with.

text: I ordered a mothers day arrangement over 100.00 and I asked to have a couple things chocolate  dipped, I was told NO. Even if I paid extra.  I placed my order 5 days before I needed it....so I had to cancel my entire order....they would not work with me at all

text: Not really sure why it takes three hours to get 12 chocolate covered strawberries. Order has been placed since very early a.m. for pick up at 2 p.m. can’t understand why these are not being made until we have arrived and checked in. This place seems under and poorly staffed. As a first time costumer I’m am not impressed and from here on out I will most likely use Shari’s Berries.

text: The platter i received 1 do not look like the picture on site the cookies are not even cooked al the way and the cheese cake is nasty im not happy with this company right now

text: Had placed an order as a surprise for my sister's birthday today. I had begun to get worried when nothing was delivered at 4pm, but the lady on the phone assured me it would be delivered once the driver got back. It is now 6:39 and not only has nothing been delivered, but they are now CLOSED. I am highly infuriated and had to ruin the surprise in attempts of figuring out what all is going on. I definitely will be requesting a full refund and cancellation, as well as making a call to corporate. As I had spent over 80 dollars to be inconvenienced, even though the order was placed ahead of time.

name: Prudence Knight
text: My strawberries were old and at first; they didn’t want to take my order over the phone because I sounded “black”, I heard them whispering in the background, and when they did, the presentation was horrible. They barely wanted to open the door for me because one of them said I was going to rob them. What a mess.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Delicious! They have a ready-to-eat case with single items and a menu to order from in-store. I was looking for something healthy but fun and got the donut, which is a cross-section of an apple dipped in chocolate with coconut on top. Young woman clerk in here was super patient, friendly and helpful. Pine Brook shopping center is a good substitute mall experience, sort of going up and down the sidewalk, and had never been in here.They have three ready-to-go larger arrangements in the refrigerated case. They have balloons and cards, and deliver for a fee. My companion got a chocolate-dipped piece of pineapple in the shape of a star on a stick. They also offer fruit parfaits in a cup @$5, and cones of fruit which are the best deal, and have a binder of other items you can order. The woman answered all of my questions and wasn't in a rush and not phased when chocolate fell on the floor. Fun contest with their photo cardboard cutout.

name: Tracey Quinsey
text: My gift chocolate covered strawberries were devine.

name: Leslie Phillips
text: I placed an online order at 9:00 AM and my friend received her arrangement by lunchtime (same day).  She absolutely LOVED it .  I was very happy with the product, the ease of ordering online, and the quick (same day) delivery.

name: Bearofkratos

text: A bit pricey but sometimes it is the perfect gift in the summertime!

name: Carla Owens
text: I’m a frequent customer, amazing customer service, beautiful and fresh product! Never disappointed!

name: Roland Hayes
text:
READ THE REVIEWS-YOU WILL SEE I'M NOT THE ONLY ONE WITH THIS PROBLEM!
I placed my order on Wednesday, August 15, 2018 for an arrangement for my Brother and Sister-in-law who's daughter had died 25 years ago this week and I just wanted to send them something to let them know I was thinking about them.  I ask the representative when was the soonest they could deliver the arrangement?  She told me they could deliver it around 12 Noon on Thursday, August 16, 2018.  I told her that would be great and to please get it there as close to Noon as possible.  She said they would.  I called Edible Arrangements at 12:30pm to see if my order had been delivered. The lady told me it was on the table being finished.  I told her it was supposed to be delivered at Noon and asked her when would it be delivered.  She told me by 2pm.  Bottom line, they did not get the arrangement delivered until 4:45pm and where they had to deliver it to was less than 3 miles from the Edible Arrangements shop.  I called and spoke to the manager and she didn't care at all about the problem and said there was no way they could have gotten it there by Noon.  I ordered it the day before. They open at 8am and you can't fix, arrange and deliver an arrangement by Noon and it is less than 3 miles from your place of business?  Something is wrong with your Business Plan then.  I called and complained to corporate  and they said they would have the owner call me from the Mobile, Alabama location but, I have not received a call yet.  I spent over $100.00 and the business delivered it when they wanted to not, when I wanted them to.  If I don't hear from the owner this week, I'm sending it to my attorney. I know it's just a $100.00 but, it's about the principle of the matter.  This business did not do what they said they would do and they have not even offered an apology, much less a refund.  Well, I expect a call and if I don't get one, it will most certainly cost them more than$100.00.  I don't want to have to do this but, it's time people are held accountable for their actions and it starts now for Edible Arrangements in Mobile,  Alabama.

name: Phil Jones
text: I have never had any problems with any Edible Arrangements location except this one.  After waiting in line on Valentine's Day for almost TWO hours for an order I had placed online, I finally had to leave and get a different V Day present.  Nobody ever came outside to give updates or give reasons for anything. People who had previously ordered days before were coming out saying their order wasn't even done!  It was so disorganized and confusing, and NOBODY was coming out happy.   I would personally like my money back, but the only thing we got was management sending a letter a week later saying they were "sooooo sorry" (actual quote, which shows how "professional" they are).  They should have had a line for order pick-ups, and then a different line for people last minute ordering. Or they could have at least had someone come out and explain whatever the heck was going on inside the store. Very disappointed and I was definitely not the only one.

name: Bailey Whittington
text: I spoke with a Mr. Colten today who was perfect and gave me every bit of information i needed and more. His customer service skills are excellent. Highly recommended!!

resp.text: Bailey Whittington, we're so glad everything worked out for you! Would you like us to enter a compliment to the location on your behalf. If so, please e-mail us at orderteam@edible.com. We'd love to share this with that management team!

name: Angela Haynes
text:
Terrible customer service, ordered for Valentine's day, went to pick up at my arranged time, stood in line 2 hrs, still not ready. Won't order from this store
ever again. Will order from Shari's berries.They don't even deserve 1 star

name: Andrew Conant
text:
Called the day before my wife's birthday to get her some strawberries, pineapples, and bananas all covered in chocolate. For whatever reason they thought I said no bananas and add apples. I'm sure it was a misunderstanding of some sort. MAKE SURE YOU DOUBLE CHECK YOUR ORDER WHEN YOU ORDER OVER THE PHONE.
I contacted the store to tell then what happened and the last laughed and said "well the apples and pineapples are really good." That's not the point. My wife loves chocolate covered bananas and she didn't get any of them.
I called back and spoke with a man who said I could come back by and pick up the bananas, thus salvaging later purchases from me.

resp.text: Andrew Conant We’re very sorry we disappointed you. Please email us at orderteam@edible.com with your order details, and we will look into this farther for you.

text: Great place!

name: Brandon Barnes
text: Terrible place Valentine’s Day order three days prior and when I arrived I was greeted to a long line and waited over 3hrs for my order we were never told the hold up or what was going on manager never came out and answered any customer questions poor and very under staff customer service was awful

name: Alexis Washington
text: Ordered and wanted something delivered paid over $200 to have it delivered today and was told over and over it was out for delivery but it was never delivered I’m very disappointed and will be looking to get my full refund back being that I never received my items at all but I already paid Smh never order anything from this place or place a delivery because you won’t get it at all 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

name: J Hennessy
text: They take forever to make deliveries

name: md cullighan
text: I have never had a better experience or more beautiful flowers than from Flower Betty in Vestavia Hills.  The most amazing part is the arrangements are like works of art and the owners genuinely care about their customers and community. You cannot  go wrong with these folks!

name: Becky Johnson
text: They make beautiful arrangements that are more unique than I've seen from any other florist. I highly recommend them. Service is great.

resp.text: Thank you so much Becky! -Marilee

name: Amy Brunson
text: My flowers are always stunning! They are not your average florist. They use only the best flowers. They always make artful arrangements in beautiful distinctive containers. They are kind, generous and very involved in our community as well.

name: Mary Teague
text: I received the most gorgeous arrangement of roses, sunflowers,hydrangeas and willow a week and 2 days ago.  The flowers are still show stoppers! Flower Betty is the best!

name: Natalie Crowder
text: Excellent owners who provide top quality floral arrangements and services at a fair price. Highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you Natalie!!!! It was fun working with you

name: Michael Frost
text: Had a spring arrangement delivered this morning for my wife. They're beautiful and the delivery was quick.  Will be ordering again.

resp.text: Thank you so much! Congratulations again to your wife!

name: katherine manush
text: Flower Betty has absolutely gorgeous arrangements! They are not just run-of-the-mill arrangements either! Service is excellent too!

resp.text: Thank you so much Katherine!

name: Jill Copeland
text: We have been getting weekly deliveries from Flower Betty at The Retreat Day Spa and each one has been more stunning than the last.  Each week is a surprise with a new unique form of floral artistry.

name: Amanda Yazdani
text: I am from the Birmingham area and have been living out of the country for many years. It’s such a relief to know I can maintain connections to a trustworthy and reliable florist. Whether it be for a celebratory occasion or the somber event of a funeral, I never have to worry that when I request flowers to be sent to or for someone, it will be anything less than perfect.

resp.text:
Katherine, thank you for your sweet review! We are so happy to help in any way!
-Marilee

name: Katy Burton
text: The staff at Flower Betty always go WAY above and beyond to create the most beautiful flower arrangements for me every time I’ve ordered. Marilee is always so easy and kind to work with and I am so excited to see how this new brand grows! I’m a florist as well in another state so I hope that gives this endorsement an extra boost. Flower Betty ROCKS!

resp.text:
Katy, YOU rock!!! We always love chatting with you when you call an order in!
-Marilee

name: Branden Saccomani
text: Have used Flower Betty several times and each time, the arrangements are more stunning than the last (if that’s possible!) They are so friendly, accommodating and incredibly artistic. If you want something that doesn’t look generic, and makes the recipient feel special- then, this is the place to order from!

resp.text:
Awe!! Thank you so much Branden! That means so much!
-Marilee

name: Hope Marshall
text: Absolutely stunning flowers and the most exceptional service one could ask for. This family owned business is the best florist in the Birmingham metro area. I highly recommend giving them a call for all your floral needs!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Hope!!

name: Leslie Hogue
text:
They do the most beautiful work! They really listen to what the client wants and then create wonderful unique arrangements and bouquets.
I can’t imagine going anywhere else

resp.text:
Leslie, customers like you make our job wonderful! You are awesome!
-Marilee

name: Frank Gribbon
text: Homewood Flowers delivered several arrangements for my sister's funeral in January, 2020 and all were perfect and beautiful. We could not have had better and the ordering process was easy and efficient. Nothing was left undone, all questions were answered and we got perfect service and assistance. We are grateful, pleased and know were to find flowers in the future.

resp.text: Frank, thank you so much for your kind words!

name: Paige Morrison
text: So wonderful to work with and fun to visit!

resp.text: We love having you visit! Come see us again soon!

name: Manda Beth
text: The most beautiful flowers I’ve ever been given! The floral arrangements are always gorgeous. Plus, the owners give so much back to the Homewood community. I don’t get flowers from anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for your sweet review!

name: Eric Life
text: Well i like going to places to shop where I'm familiar with the people truly if I'm going to need some professional help and that's why i tracked this place down and got over there as fast as i could because i knew that they could help me in the situation that i was in, my back was up against the wall, my hands was sweating, my heart was aching, i was nervous, i was scared, i had to do something and i had to do something fast and i knew that Brad and his wife could help me along with the help of God! I had messed up and dropped the ball with and high profile client and friend and i had to do something oh i had to do something today! The first thing that i did was pray and cry but after talking to older gentleman they said look! Do this but don't let it happen again and i would tell you exactly what happened but really and truly this world is just too small and the minds of people are very curious and they never rest and hardly sleep and without this place and the people in it i would've lost this rose for forever when it happened it truly hurt my heart i felt as if my heart had dropped during the process of me standing on the edge of a cliff and i truly had to be as humanly creative as i possibly could I'd rather go far too much further over to save a relationship with a client and close friend than far too far under and completely loose her all together and im still not telling you who they are or exactly what happened or where there from because this world is too small and the state of Alabama is even smaller either I'm not telling people are way far much more smarter than what most people realize how did this happen i have no idea but with everything in me I'm going to fix this i promise.

resp.text: We were so happy to help!

name: Shealynn Seaman
text: 2nd time we have had our beautiful flowers come in a gorgeous but leaky vase. Almost ruined our end table two times now. Never had the need to check a vase for leaks from any other florist but have had two vases that seeped small amounts of water from the bottom. The first time we overlooked and thought that’s odd but sometimes things like this happen. The 2nd time has caused us to no longer give Homewood florist our business. I thought my flowers were beautiful - and they were but my husband said he requested roses, daisies and many other flowers in pastel colors. The arrangement that was delivered had only star gazer lilies, white hydrangeas and lots and lots of greenery. Not the custom order he had placed.

resp.text:
Hi Shealynn! I am so sorry about the vases leaking! Can you describe what they looked like, so we can check them? I do wish you had let us know the first time it happened, because it definitely sounds like a defect!
If you can give me a call at 205.413.6965, that would be great!
Thanks!
Marilee

name: Virginia Porter
text: Bradley has been my florist for years and I have never been disappointed. Beautiful arrangements, always fresh. He is such an awesome designer. Turn him loose and let him design a unique arrangement for you. He can do cookie cutter stuff, but who wants that when you can get something unusual and amazing!

name: Sabrina Friedman
text: So pleasant to work with.  Able to deliver on short notice and was exactly what I wanted.   I would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Sabrina!

name: Gina Jones
text:
Flowers were beautiful!!!

Even took the time to send me pics so I could see the arrangement ❤️

resp.text: We were so happy you loved the arrangement!

name: Ty Webb
text: Excellent experience owner is helpful, knowledgeable, and kind. Just a nice person to talk to.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a great experience with us! Bradley is the best! Thank you again for choosing us! See you soon!

name: Travis Rainbolt
text: This shop is very unique. Offering Antiques, Specialty Gifts, AND a wide selection of fresh flowers... you won't find another business like it. The staff is friendly, and knowledgeable, and have always provided excellent customer service when I speak to them. I highly recommenced them for any gift or floral needs.

name: Matt Waters
text: Very beautiful arrangement for my soon-to-be wife. Working with Bradley was great and I couldn't be happier!

resp.text: Bradley is the best!

name: Marilee Howard
text: To put it simply, this flower shop has the most beautiful and unique arrangements I have ever seen. I would give it 10 stars if I could.

name: Caitlyn Smith
text: I just had major surgery, and my mother had a stroke so one of our dear friends sent us a large, beautiful bouquet. The flowers themselves are so beautiful. If I was rating on flowers alone I would give them 5 stars! However, the lady who delivered my flowers was absolutely mean. As she was handing me the flowers, my elderly dog ran out the door. She starts sniffing the lady's leg and wagging her tail. The lady starts to walk away and my dog followed her. She said "You better come get your dog!" Well, I just had major surgery and can't get down the stairs of my front porch. She then says "If you don't come get your dog, I will kick it!!!" My dog is 18 years old and doesn't have an aggressive bone in her body. My dog then walked over to the grass, away from the lady to do her business. I told the lady "Merry Christmas" to which she she said "uh huh" and walked back to her car. So rude. If you're considering having flowers delivered to someone's door, and they have a dog, DO NOT USE HOMEWOOD FLOWERS.

resp.text:
Caitlyn. I am so sorry you had such a horrific experience with the last owner of Homewoood Flowers. I am Bradley Gilbert. I bought Homewoood Flowers January 2018 and have since moved the shop to Vestavia Hills and Changed the name to Flower Betty.
I would like to offer you a replacement floral arrangement and get a chance to meet you. (Which is what the previous owner SHOULD have done). Please call me at your convenience. 205-694-9229.
I am so sorry you were treated badly, as well as your sweet pup.

name: Stephenie Higgins
text: Beautiful arrangements!!! Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks Stephanie!!!

name: Bradley Gilbert
text:
Come see us at our new location called "Flower Betty" in Vestavia Hills.
2531 Rocky Ridge Road suite 101 in the Shops at Oak Park

name: Charles Cope
text: Great place to shop

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Lisa Marie Lyons
text: Ordered flowers for a graduation celebration. Wow! Beautiful, artistic, and eye catching. Delivered as requested. Thank you.

name: Miles Hudson
text: Great service with incredible flowers!

name: Luis Rosas
text: Beautiful Roses and decoration , very sweet lady , for a long time I’ve been trying to find a good florist every time I go see my girlfriend, and I think I finally found the one , my girlfriend love her roses and especially the chocolate they sell , I would give this 10 stars ⭐️... very satisfied with the product and will definitely will come again

name: Drew Harcrow
text: My wife uses them often for gifts and/or flowers. She loves the girls that work in there.

name: James Duvall
text: Beautiful arrangement, fair price. She really helped us out for my grandfather's funeral. Very satisfied.

name: Gary Braden
text: No thank you

name: Sean Mantler
text: Absolutely beautiful Christmas decorations and displays! Very friendly and attentive staff.

name: Elliott Varner
text:
So.... I was told by the owner of Tiger Lilly that he did his job and those flowers and exactly what I ordered. He then went on to tell me he went above and beyond by upgrading the vase and adding a bow. He then tells me that it isn't fair to him for me to bash him on social media. The post is on tiger Lilly's Facebook page under community comments. I am yet to see where I bashed him. Then he continues to inform me how you just cant make some people happy. Not one time did he offer any reparations, exchanges, refunds, discounts, or even an apology. So that's my experience with Slade Carden and Tiger Lilly.
When I pointed out that he had not apologized he offered a half hearted apology. I cancelled my other orders and will not do business here again.

name: Kyle Cochran
text: Tiger lily is the best  in town! They always exceed my expections! Make sure to call them for all your flower needs!

name: j play
text: Nice. Very accommodating

name: George Preussel
text: Received a wonderful beautiful arrangement today from Glenn's.  Same day made and delivered.  Wonderful and local thank you for the amazing flowers.

name: Kristian Starlin
text: My husband requested roses and sunflowers for my birthday because they're my favorite. Sunflowers can be hard to come by sometimes, but they absolutely outdid themselves. They are all long stemmed and STUNNING! THANK YOU SO MUCH!

name: Goldie Frost
text: Last month I ordered a sympathy spray from Glenn's long-distance from Texas. This has been my go-to florist since 1995, and as always, they sent beautifully designed flowers that were exceptionally fresh. I heard from the family and others that the arrangement was absolutely gorgeous. Having moved away from Huntsville, it's comforting to know that I can order flowers for significant events back home and know they'll be of the highest quality. Thanks very much!

name: John Fox
text: I had two bows custom made there. Love them and they made them while I waited. Beautiful place with great customer service!

name: Judy Smith
text: A word of caution to anyone who is considering ordering flowers from Glenn's. I ordered flowers for the birth of my daughter's first baby, who is also my first grandchild. I saw a beautiful pink bouquet on the website and ordered it. The arrangement we received looked nothing like the picture. It was about 2/3rds greenery and there were very few flowers. The outer petals of the few and small roses were already turning brown. The arrangement didn't even look as nice as something that you would pick up at a grocery store. The picture I posted was the arrangement's good side. The other side was much worse and more green. I tried emailing them that very day with pictures but apparently the email address provided was down. I was too busy to continue pursuing this and called a week later. They said they could only address the problem within 24 hours after delivery and were neither sympathetic or helpful. I was left feeling very deceived  and cheated. I will never order flowers from them again.

name: Helen Neal
text: Glenn did a spectacular job with my wedding flowers! He truly went above my expectations. The price was very affordable. He made my wedding even more perfect! 😍 Thank you!!

name: Pamela Hebert
text: Best florist in town ❤️

name: Karla Lowe
text: I ordered an arrangement for my mother's birthday.  I am not local to the area so I just ordered online. The bouquet that they delivered looks nothing like the one I had ordered. Looks like they replaced what were supposed to be flowers with greenery.  Not only that but some of the flowers they did put in the bouquet were not fresh flowers. Looks like leftovers they just threw together.  I will not order from them again and I would like a refund. Here are pictures of my mothers flowers and also a picture of what I ordered.

name: JOSE RINCON
text: Great experience with Glenn's. An employee of ours, mother passed away. We tried to get an arrangement send the same day of the viewing by calling 1800 flowers and they were not able to have any sort of arrangement even a small one sent that day. I called Glenn's and Lily was happy to assist me and  told me the owner Glenn would make the arrangement himself for the funeral viewing. I can not express how grateful  we are for their customer service and promptness.

name: Denise Bourg
text: Beautiful designs, nice selection of gifts and easy to work with staff

name: Libby
text: My mother's day arrangement arrived today from my son in Atlanta. He sends flowers every year for at least 10 years. This arrangement is mostly greenery. There are 3 pretty flowers and that's all! No baby's breath, no bow. Nothing about it is special!  They look like they were fixed up 3 days ago. I called to explain my dismay. The woman said, if your son wanted a bow, he should have asked for one. (WHAT??) His money was refunded, but I didn't get any mothers day flowers. The woman on the phone was so rude and hurtful.  My son is hurt, too.

name: Shawnna Williams
text: I will give them 2 stars for same day delivery, delivering to the right location, and answering my phone calls. I will give them Zero stars if I could for their product. I know florist sometime have to change the order a bit , but the plant ordered and the plant received was not even close.

name: sarah micah
text: Very rude. The employee seemed irritated for having to speak with me. She declined to show me pictures of what I was looking for when I asked. She just kept asking what color. I wanted to see examples so I could make the best decision. Then she tells me there are no flowers available. Terrible customer service. Don't let the nice facility fool you. The employees do not reflect that pride or pleasant atmosphere.

name: Jack Yates
text: Awesome, always picked my flowers for my wife, she loved them. They are very very nice. The one and only place I will go!

name: aangelinaabv
text:
It is a shame that such a gorgeous location with beautiful arrangements has ladies that should not work in customer service.
Very rude over the phone and have an attitude in person.
When you pay over 150$ for flowers you’d expect them to wait for you to explain what you want, not rush you and grab your money without you even seeing what you paid for.
Sorry but I won’t be returning even though the store is amazing.
The only man who was working at the time was very helpful and carried the arrangement to my car and made sure it did not spill .

name: La Guera
text: Fabulous! I was a walk in ( I know better, sorry) but my boss wanted an arrangement at the last minute. So they pulled one out and i just wasn't feeling it. SO THEY CUSTOMIZE AN ARRANGEMENT FOR ME!! I was floored! Great customer service. They thrive on satisfaction. WOW ! $$$ but it's worth it..

name: Linda Wilcoxon
text: I needed a sympathy arrangement at the 11th hour for a family very dear to us.  I called Glenn's and they were so very patient and helpful - Excellent customer service.  The arrangement they created was gorgeous with beautiful fresh quality flowers.  We were very pleased and would use them again!!

name: Jennifer Wright
text: Glen’s has always done a great job. They did the flowers for my wedding and I couldn’t have been happier with the results!

name: Patrick
text: My go to Huntsville Florist.  Thanks so much for always taking care of me!

name: Tina Pynes
text: My Christmas centerpieces are absolutely perfect!  Valerie understood what my wishes were and the staff made those wishes reality. I will definitely be back again!

name: Randomly Russell
text: Glenn does the most amazing work I've ever seen. If you need flowers in Huntsville,  it's just a given that you have to go see Glenn! Everyone knows they can't have anyone take care of this kind of business for them except Glenn's. Great gift shop in the front as well!

name: Desi B
text: I ordered flowers at the last minute for a same day event and Glenn's came through! Beautiful arrangement! Highly recommend Glenn's!

name: Marcome Yates
text: Wanted to send flowers to my best friend, who lives in Alabama, to wish her the best of luck on her new job, and because yesterday was friendship day. Googled florists in that area and found this place is on the same road as the animal hospital where she works. Called this morning and the woman I talked to was very nice and they delivered by lunchtime. They did a beautiful job. Highly recommended them.

name: DanaTrains
text: My husband is the frequenter of this florist! He comes home with unique and quirky items filled with beautiful flowers. One time he bought a pencil holder that is a dog with baskets on either side (that holds pencils but were filled with flowers). He knows I don't like "ordinary" so he goes in and shops for a different piece then asks them to make something pretty from it! They have never disappointed to rise to the task!

name: Elizabeth Barnes
text: Very good service. Had a nice selection in the shop. I have ordered several times from them, and have always been pleased. Very dependable florist, even last minute.

name: Revien Knight
text: Glenn’s used to be great - and still is so long as you’re going in and seeing what they offer in person, but their online images are very deceiving. The person who sent me flowers was quite upset when I shared photos of the bouquet.

name: Sophia Bronston
text: I need flowers for my work place pretty often and I appreciate the arrangements this place provides.  Very reasonable and quality service.  It is my one stop shop. Don't need to go anywhere else.

name: Reggie Warner
text: Called on Tuesday to order some flowers to pick up on Friday for Valentines Day.  Told that I couldn't get anything shown on their site, only a spring mix, valentines mix or roses.  Maybe you should advertise that on your site.

name: Kim Golden
text:
I've ordered from this shop a few times now, usually online. I've always been satisfied with what I've ordered, but today was even better. Late in the morning on a Friday I called to order some flowers for a coworker in the hospital. I was interested in some slight modifications to one of the items I saw on the website. Glenn took my idea and ran with it a little, making it even better than I imagined, AND had it delivered same day. I've had other shops give me a hard time about hospital deliveries same day.
I was thrilled, the recipient was thrilled, and I now have a shop I consider my flower destination in Huntsville. Definitely recommended!!

name: Timothy Bailey
text: Cool cast to handle my needs! #yasss

name: Christyn McCormick
text: Ordered flowers for a co-worker and specifically said that I wanted the majority of the arrangement to be daisies. When I picked it up, there was not one single Daisy in it , so they took it to the back to add some. What they brought me back looked like they had gone in someone's back yard and picked a bunch of weeds and threw them in a vase! VERY unsatisfied for what I paid for this and will NOT return as a customer!

name: J M
text: Glenn's did our flowers for our small, intimate family wedding and reception this past weekend.  They were absolutely beautiful!  Delivered right on time.  Gorgeous bouquets, excellent service... what else could you ask for?

name: Christopher Bolton
text: If you are looking to wow someone with an amazing floral arrangement there is simply no better choice than Glenn's of Huntsville. The store is beautiful and they have ready-made arrangements as well as the ability to make up just about anything while you wait.

name: chris toups
text: Wonderful place have an assortment of things for your home besides flowers but their flowers are outstanding!!

name: Frank Digesu
text: I needed flowers at the very last minute on a Saturday.  Called Glenn's and they delivered a perfect sympathy arrangement. Great Job.

name: Brianna Blankenship
text: Love this place. Glenn makes the best arrangements in town!

name: Anne Wynn
text: I ordered flowers from their website at 4:30 p.m. the day before my mother's birthday and the flowers arrived promptly in the morning the next day.   Great service!

name: nbnHuntsville
text: Amazing customer service, beautiful arrangements and the best prices in town. Thank you, Glenn's!

name: Jeanne Renfro Miller
text: The best design and personnel .

name: Darren Cannell
text: Only florist I use and I have never had a bad arrangement. I use them quite a bit!

name: James Stull
text: Rude on the phone, finally just just had to hang up and to another florist.

name: Elaina Ritenburgh
text: Where do I even begin? From the moment Coastal Flowers & Design answered the phone and took the order I placed to the absolutely gorgeous corsage and boutonniere made, this company proved they were in it to win it. A friendly voice of amazing staff member politely tended to me when I called. She asked me to text her a picture of the dress that I was trying to color coordinate with to make sure she got the color right. On the morning of Prom, she called me to remind me to come pick up the order before closing. Oh how I wish I could post a picture of the corsage this company made. It matched perfectly. My son's girlfriend received so many compliments from other moms of the kids as we took group pictures of the kids. She also received so many compliments from other girls going to Prom who were dining at the same restaurant ❣️ We will definitely be using them again for all our floral needs.

name: K Mash
text: Happy Customer. Will use these folks again. Service was helpful and friendly.

name: Alycia Holloway
text: Whomever created my Mama’s flowers did an incredible job!! She loves them so much, as did her coworkers. I’ll be using y’all from now on! Thank YOU all!

name: Airicka Krauss
text: I sent flowers from Missouri today, and they had the best customer service I have ever experienced. The pictures my mom sent me were above and beyond my expectations. I will ONLY be ordering here from now on for my Mom.

name: Chief Wickware
text:
Superb experience.  We moved to Orange Beach in July of 2017.  Like most men I send flowers probably 4 - 6 times a year.  I have been using the 800 number and trial and error.  The lady that worked with me took the time to show me examples of Reg, Med, and Large arrangements.  Guys, you must go for the medium at least.  It was gorgeous!  Earned the biggest beautiful smile from my wife.  Take the time and stop in if you can.  Well worth the trip in.
My wife raved about the nice guy that delivered the flowers too.  She said he was so nice, and even wished her a happy birthday.  I HAVE FOUND MY LOCAL FLORIST FROM NOW ON!

name: Becky W
text: The flower arrangement was absolutely beautiful! Thank you so much!

name: Megan Haynes
text: We went in the morning of our wedding day and Jill made us a perfect bouquet right on the spot! She was so kind and friendly and understanding!

name: Angela Rodgers
text: Hands down the best customer service I’ve ever experienced with a florist. If you’re requiring absolute attention to detail and a florist that truly cares about your arrangement- Jill is your florist.

name: T.D. Taylor
text:
We have used Coastal Flowers for years. The owner and her family are an asset to our community in Gulf Shores and Baldwin County. The designs turned out by this shop are incredible. We have lived in Atlanta, Los Angeles and now making Gulf Shores home. Pricing is unbelievable for the quality and expertise of design aesthetics. Coastal Flowers adds that bit of class that’s hard to find with many florists.
After 30 years of running a business and sending over a thousand arrangements all over the country to clients. I really appreciate the details. and speciality design from Coastal Flowers. Amazing Christmas wreaths, Christmas Trees, Roses, Spring fall arrangements, We have purchased them all. Please join our family in supporting Family owned Coastal Flowers. You will not be disappointed.

name: Jim kachelmuss
text:
Their flowers are beautiful - their customer service is outstanding!!!
Have ordered a valentine flower arrangement for my wife from Coastal Flowers the last two years - the arrangements are out of this world - flowers are fresh - the roses are huge and so bright and the lilies are just as beautiful!
Thank you Coastal Flowers for making a guy look good🤓🤓🤓🤓

name: Cheryl Spruill
text: Janet created a fruit basket and silk floral arrangement exactly as I requested.  She was able to comprehend what I was looking for and nailed it! This means a lot since she is 500 plus miles away from me and this gift was for a very special friend in Foley. Thank you Coastal Flowers  for making a friend happy after surgery. You did an excellent job!!!

name: Slavko Djukic
text: Absolutely superb service for our last minute wedding. We called them just 4 days before it and all came out perfect.

name: Dan Dennis
text: For the 2nd year in a row, I set up delivery of two arrangements on two separate days during my vacation stay in Fort Morgan.  Coastal sent roses on my Anniversary and over two weeks (and an 1100 mile road trip) later they're still holding on.  For my Wife's Birthday I let them have free reign to create a tropical arrangement and my wife was completely blown away.  The flowers are beautiful and the overall arrangement is absolutely gorgeous.  I highly recommend Coastal.  They're very easy to deal with (even with special requests) and their flowers are superior.

name: Jim Wehler
text: Called from the doctors office in Michigan and asked if they could deliver a flower arrangement that day.  I asked them to put together an arrangement for a gender reveal of our twins to my mom and dad.  They were delighted to help.  Within an hour a perfect and beautiful flower bouquet were delivered to our family. They are top notch!

resp.text:
Jim,
Thank you for your kind words and candor.  It was our pleasure to create and deliver your parents arrangement. We appreciate your business and congratulations on your twin girls!!

name: Justin Breaux
text: I would highly recommend Jyl and Coastal Flowers to anyone local or those vacationing from out of town. I called Jyl and asked if she could have flowers delivered to a condo upon our arrival as a birthday surprise for my wife! Jyl called me when the flowers were going out for delivery so we could time our arrival to the condo. The flower bouquet was gorgeous, the customer service was great, and my wife was very happy! Will definitely use Coastal Flowers in the future.

name: Emily Holland
text: My brother and I ordered flowers for my grandmother for Mother's Day and they were delivered when they were supposed to be and they were just beautiful! She loved them! This is a great business, I would recommend them anytime and I will definitely order from them again!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your business!

name: Angelic Essentials
text: We are very disappointed in our order, For Mother's day we ordered the "Spring Please" bouque which looks very colorfull and beautifull on the web site,  my mother-in-law was delivered a bouquet with 4 roses, four small carnations, maybe two lillies and very sparce greens and definetly not colorfull and springy, rather embarresing really.  We paid a total of $ 67.00.  Back home in Denver we picked my mom up a beatifull full bouque at Costco with far more flowers in it for $20.00.  It is very unfortunate that they mis-advertise what you are getting for your money.  upload the picture of what was received.

resp.text: We are deeply apologize for your disappointment with the flowers your mother received for Mothers Day. We take customer satisfaction very seriously. As of today, we have fully refunded the credit card used to place your order. Please call us at 251-968-7673 with any questions you may have. Again, please accept our apologies.

name: Brittney Davis
text:
She did the flowers for my wedding, so sweet and captured exactly what I wanted with only a few pins and texts swapped between us. I forgot to review originally but I loved working with this shop and had a wonderful
experience!

name: April Tharp
text: They went above and beyond for me so my girl could be happy at her banquet. The lady helped me with flowers after hours just to make sure my little girl was happy. They were gorgeous flowers. Thank you for all your help.

name: Peter wentz
text:
I needed to send flowers sight unseen to a mother in need. Jill and her flower shop completely surpassed my expectations. I am so great full I found them searching online. Thank you again and again costal flowers. They were so accommodating and gave me the help I needed several hundred miles away. I put my trust in them and it definitely paid off. I’m very impressed and the money was well worth it. Take it from a chemical engineer, let this florist choose flowers for you. I’ll stick to engineering these ladies have proven they know way more then I ever would on making gorgeous flower arrangements.
Thank you thank you thank you

name: Carl Brackett
text: The team at Coastal Flowers & Design made an absolutely fabulous centerpiece for my wife’s surprise birthday party!  If you need flowers this is the place to shop!

name: Jeremy Edgar
text: This place by far has the best customer service I have ever had at a florist. We ordered flowers to be delivered the Friday before Mother's day and found out she wasn't going to be there that weekend or the next week. We called them the day of the delivery and were able to reschedule a time that would work best for my mother. Thanks for the great service.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Jeremy! It was our pleause to create the arrangement for your mother!

name: E Pitts
text: Ordered flowers for my sisters Birthday.  Jill was very friendly and helpful. My sister raved about them. Very happy customer.

name: Dan S
text:
Had this business do the flowers for our wedding. They were able to meet our budget and make an absolutely beautiful design. They had the flowers we wanted in stock while other shops didn't (or couldn't match the color). I would absolutely recommend them to anyone who needs flowers. Every guest that cared about flowers commented on how great they were, including the boutonnieres we wore.

Hope this helps you make your decision for any event! I will be posting pictures later when we get them from the photographer!

name: Tammy Smith
text: My husband bought my Valentine's flowers here, they were beautifully arranged and the entire bouquet lasted two weeks, and some of the flowers even lasted 3 weeks! Highly recommend!!

name: Chantle Uthe
text: A great place to get your flowers.

name: James Robinson
text: Due to a problem with another company, I had to get last minute flowers sent to my mom for Mother’s Day. Coastal was great. They were able to put an arrangement together and deliver before Mother’s Day. It was beautiful!  Thank you!

name: vicki ralston
text: The girls are nice, fun and knowledgeable. Place is tastefully decorated  and reasonable rates.

name: chris griggs
text: Flowers were to be delivered on Saturday before Mothers Day to a condo that we were staying at in Orange Beach, ordered by my children. Flowers were delivered to the wrong condo, NOT just the wrong condo but another condo complex that was next to ours. Phone # was put on the card (which was visible)in case the delivery person needed to make contact for any questions, card had the correct condo complex and unit , so in essence the delivery person NEVER even looked to make sure they had the correct complex. The only reason I got my flowers on Sunday at 5pm, was because a kind lady in the condo next to the unit they were delivered to (it was not occupied by the way) called the # on the card and got my husband and told him that the flowers were sitting there outside the unit next to hers and had been knocked over twice, she told him the card read to be delivered to the complex we were staying in, and not their building, she held onto them for us until we could meet with her and pick them up. When I called Monday morning to let them know of the mistake, I spoke with the owner, NOT ONCE did she apologize and didn't seem to care at all, indifferent really. I WOULD NOT advise to use their services if you want accuracy and efficiency, not to mention professionalism!

resp.text: We do apologize for the delivery error. We are also sorry that you felt our owner was indifferent to your situation as that was not the case at all. We realize that we are not perfect and deeply regret our error. Again, our apologies.

name: Daniel Humphries
text: Very helpful and gorgeous flowers - thank you for helping to save my anniversary!

name: April Michener
text: The flower arrangement that was delivered, while pretty, was not as advertised. However, when the owner learned what had happened, she called me, apologized profusely and made the situation right - I believe that speaks a lot about a business. Things don't always go right. We all make mistakes; it's life. I appreciate her actions to resolve the matter and would order flowers from them again.

resp.text:
April,
Thank you for your review. We never recieved your email stating your disappointment. We have looked in our junk and all other folders and we never got it. We absolutly would have made things right with you as soon as you emailed us. We are sorry for our error. We had temporary delivery drivers and designers that should have notated the no substitution on your order. There is no excuse for this mistake. Please call us at 251-968-7673 so we can discuss this with you.

name: Eric De Bartolo
text: I had some flowers delivered to my wife and they looked amazing on the website but in person it was not worth the $66 I spent on them. I am very disappointed with the produce and will not be buying anything from them in the future

name: Kathryn Emerson, REALTOR
text: One of the most beautiful arrangements I have ever received!

name: Jeremy Foust

name: Kelly McRae
text: The owner Jyl and I will be friends for life after she saved my Wedding day by putting together the most beautiful arrangements in just 3 days!! I sent her ideas and she called me back immediately to tell me "awesome, I got this, no problem at all!" And I finally felt like I could breathe again! Go to Jyl for all of your floral needs!! Even with a tropical storm coming in- she gave me all the reassuring and confidence that I needed to keep from having a breakdown!! I will forever remember these amazing moments! Oh, and the moment I saw my bouquet I cried they were so breathtaking!

If you cannot do the job requested then say you  cannot instead of disappointing a family during grief. Guess they got a 200 bonus.

Only negatives the exterior conditions, you definitely would not know it was a florist by the outside plants around the building.

text: I like to shop locally, so I chose Pinedale Gardens as my florist. I'm glad that I did, because of their good selection, friendly and helpful staff, and nice prices. Highly recommended!

name: Sean miller
text:
I always send my wife flowers. This was my first time using Hoover Florist though and while she was pleased to see flowers for her at work, once I showed her what she was SUPPOSED to receive, she was just as let down as I was.
Subtle differences are to be expected, I understand that. Hers was night and day from the photo used to select her arrangement. Flowers sloppily grouped, colors grouped together instead of evenly distributed, not even the same type of greenery - the picture shows tiny and dainty leaves- hers looks like they came from Jurassic Park. The photo shows the flowers neatly run down towards the base of bowl shaped vase, matching the bowl shape and trimmed back as they get lower as to not stick out. The flowers look as though they mirror the shape of bowl - hers are all crammed in the top. I’ve used other company’s that put out nearly identical bouquets to their photo selections.
When I called to let them know, I had no real intention of refunds or expectations but the woman defended the bouquet say the only difference was the flowers weren’t as opened. I tried to explain that it looked sloppy, rushed and waaaaay too full of green filler plant. Still, defending their product, I was told my only option was for them to pick up the flowers and issue a refund....right...let me just snatch the flowers away from my wife in front of everyone at work, that’s a viable solution. Thanks!!!
I was honestly just hoping she would look at them and say “yes, those are not what we would like to say are our best work” bet she remained steadfast that it looked good. So...no Hoover Florist for me.
Side note - I always send her $100 and up arrangements. More money means more time should be spent to make sure it’s perfect for somebody’s loved ones.
Oh I almost forgot - she continuously told me “we put in what the recipe calls for”.....My 6 year old daughter can add in all the ingredients for a cake but she can’t bake yet so it’s just a bowl of ingredients until her mother or I put it in the oven and finish it...I was given a bowl of ingredients, not a finalized arrangement put together with care.

name: Brenda Carlisle
text: Great florist!!! Their arrangements are always gorgeous and creative.  I live in Mobile and I use Hoover Florist to send beautifully arranged flowers to my daughters and granddaughters!

name: Brian Mishkin
text: Have ordered from them twice and had great results. One was a same day delivery too. Reasonable price. Great presentation. I’ll keep using them. Two thumbs up

name: Tom Erwin
text: I have been a customer of Hoover Florist for several years. They always provide exceptional customer service each time that I make a purchase. Today, they went above and beyond what was expected to ensure a nice birthday for my mother. Thank you!

name: Marlon Gardner
text: Friendly and helpful always. They'll always make sure you get what you want and need.👍🏽

resp.text: Thank you Marlon, it is always our pleasure!

name: Stephanie James
text: Carol was very nice. I called very last minute for flower delivery to a coworker who was attending a burial service out of state. She was very helpful in recommending what to send and when to send it. I would highly recommend the friendly service received here! Thank you times 1 million exclamation exclamation

name: Catherine Chaney
text: Great experience with Hoover Florist.  Called from Florida on Thursday for a special order -- an orchid.  Florist explained that it might take some time, they don't keep orchids in stock.  He warned me it could take a couple days.  They delivered the orchid within 24-hours.  The recipient took a photo and sent it to me -- gorgeous orchid.  Thanks so much to Hoover Florist.

name: Kyle Mavin
text: Beautiful arrangement - they lasted 2 weeks after event - will be on the top of my list for future events!!

name: Janie Hannah
text:
I don't know what has happened to this business over many years but what I have received that was arranged by them the last couple of years has been pitiful.  My sweet husband surprises me with roses that I then have to re-arrange.  Today is our anniversary and, I think, these are worse than the ones that I received on Valentine's.  At least on Valentine's you understand they have more orders than they can fill well.

Hoover Florist used to do such good work.... some years ago.

Really??  These flowers are from a florist?

text: Very sweet and fairly priced.

name: Kayla Ross
text: Thank you so much for the beautiful flowers and gifts you sent my niece in the hospital. You made her day and mine.

text: Ordered some fresh flowers to be delivered to my cousin. The folks at the shop kept me posted on the process until the flowers were delivered. Pretty amazing since this was my first order with them. My cousin was thrilled & sent me a photo as soon as they arrived. They were gorgeous & the best part is they lasted over 2 weeks! Will definitely use them again.

text: Very friendly and helpful. It was Valentines day and they where very busy but still took excellent care of me.

name: CJ Seals

name: Sheri R.
text: Placed an order online Sunday night. Received a call that my vase and specialty item was not in stock and was it ok to replace it with a comparable item. I said of course. Flowers delivered later that day and my friend loved them. Great service, easy site and fresh beautiful arrangements! Thanks all the way from Texas!!!

name: Seaview 3
text: I ordered a basket arrangement for a funeral. I picked them up the next morning. They were more than beautiful and the basket was packed with fresh flowers. The quantity and variety of the arrangement was well worth the money paid. I will use them again.

name: Kathie Poole
text: This is the most awesome arrangement I have ever had. I did not not about this florist. Lisa did everything that I had in my head. Thank you so much.😄!!

name: Taylor H
text:
Ordered flowers for my wife's birthday through their website.  Hoover Florist was able to provide same-day delivery without an extra fee and the flowers were delivered within 3 hours of being ordered.

I am always concerned when I order flowers through a website that the flowers will come in a box, so I was happy to see that Hoover Florist arranged these flowers in the vase that was advertised and hand delivered them. Very satisfied customer.

name: Ryan Parr
