Told them what I wanted to spend and a general description of what I wanted them to look like and they were PERFECT! Could not be happier with the price or the arrangement. My fiance was so happy. +1 for me! 😀

resp.text: Thanks so much for the awesome review, so glad you were pleased!

name: Carleton Armbrester
text: 5 star service, I ordered an arrangement of Red Roses to be delivered for a "Just Because" moment.  The customer service was excellent and the smile that the arrangement evoked on her face was priceless.

name: Nate

name: D Corbin

text: Just off the phone with a wonderful person who helped me create a unique and beautiful arrangement for a colleague of mine.  When I mentioned I also wanted to something special for another colleague, such as send doughnuts, she offered to pick them up and deliver them too.   Wow, that is going the extra mile.  Thank you, thank you.  Considering I am in Florida, this is much appreciated!!!!

text: I ordered an arrangement the Friday before Mothers Day to be delivered to my mom's job (like every other person in Alabama). They were able to do the arrangement and get it there in the late hour. I am so appreciative.

resp.text: Thanks Angalise!  So glad we could be of service!

name: Andy Hoke
text: Beware of the hidden "wire fee"!  After you order your flowers on the web they charge you a $5 wire fee.  What the heck is that?  I'm not "wiring" anything.  List your real prices, don't bait and switch.

name: Mark McCay
text:
Should have read the reviews before I ordered Valentines flowers for my wife. They were delivered so late that she did not get them until the next day. Very disappointed!!!! We do not recommend and will not use again!!!!!

Update - Hoover flourist called to apologize and take accountability for the late delivery. they offered to refund half the purchase price. I changed the rating from one star to four. We will consider using them in the future.

name: Leslie Keith
text: I called on Monday and went through my ideas, something young and unique, for a freshman Sadie Hawkins dance to be picked up on Saturday. Flowers are dreadful, colors are not as requested. Will be calling first thing Monday for a refund. How does a florist in business for so long do SO badly????

resp.text: Dear Ms. Keith, I am so sorry that you were disappointed with the corsage that you ordered.  When you called, you asked us for a wrist corsage with red daisies and to make it  unusual and funky.  We explained that daisies don't come in red and that we would have to spray them and we were told that was fine.  We sprayed the daisies red, added hypericum berries, loops of flexigrass, purple statice and the red and black ribbon that you requested.  When it was picked up we were told it was perfect.

name: Nicholas Gregory
text: Today was my first time using Hoover Florist. My girlfriend thinks they are beautiful and I appreciate the customer service. Highly recommended.

name: Sandye Nance
text: Ordered corsage for Sunday Prom for special needs adults so I had to pick it up on Saturday.  By Sunday, the roses had opened all the way and edges were trying to turn brown.  Not only was it small, but 10 minutes after being worn, the flowers fell off the wristband.  Looks like it was glued but not enough glue was used, there was a small dot in the middle.  I expected a lot more for $45 and from a florist.  Sadly, the corsage was thrown in the garbage within 30 minutes of arriving at the dance.  I'm going to go back to using Publix.......never had a corsage fall apart on me there!

resp.text:
Hi Tristan,
This is the owner and I am so sorry that you had a bad experience with our shop.  I tried to look up your order so that I could call you about it, but found no orders under Tristan.  Please give me a call I would love to talk with you about it and fix the problem.
Sincerely,
Karen Jenkins, Owner

text:
The manager is an extremely nice gentleman and a very  charitable one as well. My concern is with the produce section. I cook almost every night and we like to have somewhat fresh produce. I’ve complained numerous times to the staff about flies and other bugs in the produce area and nothing seems to be done about it. The produce is also typically old and starting to turn. The ladies in the deli are always delightful and other than the produce section I would say that it’s a decent grocery store

It does concern me that the Google review shows great produce because this has not been the case for years.

name: Nita Bbw
text: Today was my first time shopping at the Winn-Dixie and I can say everything is very cheap and I loved the sale they was having. I couldn’t beat the prices I paid for because the prices I would of paid for in the city I live in would have been higher. As far of today I will be shopping here from now for groceries, water, and laundry detergent etc, and snacks. The workers were very friendly and helpful. It was my first time using the digital coupons (app) to receive discounts and I already gained points. ❤️❤️❤️ I love this store already!!!!

name: Chris Hanes
text:
Winn Dixie is not exactly known for its cleanliness but this store ranks up there with any Publix or other fancy grocery store in terms of being clean, well-lit and staffed by friendly folks.

There is a Public right down the road but I often find myself here instead when visiting town as the prices are great and the staff is friendly. Sometimes during the later hours, things aren't quite as great, thus the 4 star review instead of a 5 star review.

Also, sometimes on Friday nights they have the smoker going out front and music is playing and it's a party at the local WD and it doesn't get much better than that.

I didn’t get her name ...(but she has long hair )

name: Brandi Bolton
text: My family and I are on first a first name basis with both pharmacist's and the pharmacy technician's. They are like this with all of their regular customers. Our prescriptions ate always ready when we walk in. They will each take the time to listen to any concerns you may have it answer any questions you may have regarding any medicines you've been prescribed but are not familiar with and their customer service in general is just absolutely amazing. They other employees are also very polite and helpful, if something you need isn't on the shelf, whomever is working in that section will always go to the back stock to get what you need if it's available.

text: I couldn't find my card and the girl was new and she wouldn't give me the discounts because, apparently she wasn't putting my phone # in correct. She never asked my name, my check has all my info on it. I came to get the spiral ham half price. I had to pay full price. I am on fixed income and I needed the extra sixteen dollars she cost me. I have been there before and couldn't find my card and the person at the register used a store card. I have never had a problem before! I can't give a rating!

name: Jason Yeager (Jason)
text: Good store to shop, but there have been too many times that I have visited and left without the items I went to get. It seems they have difficulty keeping stock of sale items. Deli food items are often gone before mid-afternoon so don't go searching for a fully cooked rack of ribs or rotisserie chicken for dinner after 1:00 or so. They also mislabel fish in the seafood market. I have seen them selling the lane snapper species labeled as the higher quality, better tasting and more expensive red snapper. This is a federal law violation so they might want to be careful what they call their fish. They usually have a decent selection of meats,  but they often have an attitude if something is not out there and you ask them to get you the item.
